                    <h4 class="section-header">
                     <span class="term-number">
                      13.
                     </span>
                     <span class="header-title">
                      Indemnity and Limitation of Liability
                     </span>
                    </h4>
                    <div class="section-holder">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       13.1. Indemnity
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      You hereby agree to indemnify and hold harmless us, our directors, officers, employees, shareholders, agents and affiliates, our ultimate parent and parent companies and any of our subsidiaries against any and all costs, expenses, liabilities and damages (whether direct, indirect, special, consequential, exemplary or punitive or other) arising from any Participation by you, including without limitation:
                     </p>
                     <ol class="cms-content-list--lv2">
                      <li>
                       Visiting, use or re-use of the Website;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Use or re-use of the Website by means of telecommunication services;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Use or re-use of any materials at, or obtained from, the Website or any other source whatsoever;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Entry to, or use or re-use of the Website server;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Facilitating or making a deposit into your account at Betrally;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Wagering or gaming at Betrally through any delivery mechanism offered; and
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Acceptance and use of any winnings or prize at or from Betrally.
                      </li>
                     </ol>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       13.2. Limitation of Liability
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The total liability of our directors, officers, employees, shareholders, agents and affiliates, our ultimate parent and parent companies and any of our subsidiaries to you in contract, tort, negligence or otherwise, for any loss or damage howsoever arising from any cause, whether direct or indirect, or for any amounts (even where we have been notified by you of the possibility of such loss or damage) shall not exceed the value of the bets and/or wagers you placed via your account in respect of the relevant bet/wager or product that gave rise to the relevant liability.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       13.3. Links
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Betrally shall not be liable in contract, tort, negligence, or otherwise, for any loss or damage arising from or in any way connected with your use of any link contained on the Website. We are not responsible for the content contained on any internet site linked to/from the Websites or via the Services.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       13.4. Negligence
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Nothing in these Terms &amp; Conditions will operate so as to exclude any liability of the Operator for fraud, death or personal injury that is caused by the Operator’s negligence.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="section-header">
                     <span class="term-number">
                      14.
                     </span>
                     <span class="header-title">
                      Betrally Not a Financial Institution
                     </span>
                    </h4>
                    <div class="section-holder">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       14.1. No legal or tax advice
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Betrally does not provide advice regarding tax and/or legal matters. Customers who wish to obtain advice regarding tax and legal matters are advised to contact appropriate advisors.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       14.2. No arbitrage
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      You are strictly prohibited from utilising Betrally and it systems to facilitate arbitrage through currency exchange transactions or otherwise. Where Betrally deems that you have deliberately used the systems for financial gain through arbitrage, any gains will be forfeited and deducted from your balance without warning or notification.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       14.3. Anti-Money Laundering
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Customers are strictly prohibited from using Betrally and its systems to facilitate any type of illegal money transfer. You must not use the Website for any unlawful or fraudulent activity or prohibited transaction (including money laundering proceeds of crime) under the laws of any jurisdiction that applies to you. If Betrally suspects that you may be engaging in, or have engaged in fraudulent, unlawful or improper activity, including money laundering activities or any conduct which violates these Terms &amp; Conditions, your access to Betrally will be terminated immediately and your account may be blocked. If your account is terminated or blocked under such circumstances, Betrally is under no obligation to refund to you any money that may be in your account. In addition Betrally shall be entitled to inform the relevant authorities, other online service providers, banks, credit card companies, electronic payment providers or other financial institution of your identity and of any suspected unlawful, fraudulent or improper activity. You will cooperate fully with any Betrally investigation into such activity.
                     </p>
                    </div>
                    <h4 class="section-header">
                     <span class="term-number">
                      15.
                     </span>
                     <span class="header-title">
                      Termination/Suspension of Account
                     </span>
                    </h4>
                    <div class="section-holder">
                     <p>
                      15.1. Betrally hereby reserves the right to cancel your account for any reason whatsoever at any time without notifying you. Any balance in your account at the time of such a cancellation will be credited to your credit/debit card or financial account.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      15.2. Without limiting section 15.1, we hereby reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to cancel or suspend your account (notwithstanding any other provision contained in these Terms &amp; Conditions) where we have reason to believe that you have engaged or are likely to engage in any of the following activities:
                     </p>
                     <ol class="cms-content-list--lv2">
                      <li>
                       If you have more than one active account at Betrally;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If the name registered on your Betrally account does not match the name on the financial/bank account and/or the credit/debit card(s) used to make deposits on the said Betrally account;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       You become bankrupt;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you provide incorrect or misleading information while registering a Betrally account;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you attempt to use your Customer account through a VPN, proxy or similar service that masks or manipulates the identification of your real location, or by otherwise providing false or misleading information regarding your citizenship, location or place of residence, or by making bets or wagers using the website through a third party or on behalf of a third party;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you are not over 18 years old;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you are located in the Excluded Territories;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you have allowed or permitted (whether intentionally or unintentionally) someone else to Participate using your Betrally account;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you have played in tandem with other Customer(s) as part of a club, group, etc., or placed bets or wagers in a coordinated manner with other Customer(s) involving the same (or materially the same) selections;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If Betrally has received a “charge back” and/or a "return" notification via a deposit mechanism used on your account;
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If you are found to be colluding, cheating, money laundering or undertaking any kind of fraudulent activity; or
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If it is determined by Betrally that you have employed or made use of a system (including machines, computers, software or other automated systems such as bots) designed specifically to defeat the gaming system.
                      </li>
                     </ol>
                     <p>
                      15.3. If Betrally closes or suspends your Customer account for any of the reasons referred to in 15.2 above, you shall be liable for any and all claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs and expenses incurred or suffered by Betrally (together “Claims”) arising therefrom and shall indemnify and hold Betrally harmless on demand for such Claims.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      15.4. If we have reasonable grounds to believe that you have participated in any of the activities set out in clause 15.2 above then we reserve the right to withhold all or part of the balance and/or recover from your account deposits, payouts, bonuses, any winnings that are attributable to any of the practices contemplated in clause 15.2. In such circumstances, your details will be passed on to any applicable regulatory authority, regulatory body or any other relevant external third parties. The rights set out here are without prejudice to any other rights that we may have against you under these Terms &amp; Conditions or otherwise.
                     </p>
                    </div>

                      </strong>

A notification message advising that changes have been made to our Terms &amp; Conditions will appear upon a Customer’s next login to the Betrally Website and the Customer is required to accept the changes to the Terms &amp; Conditions before being able to continue to Participate at Betrally.
                     </p>

                      </strong>

                      </strong>

                      </strong>

                     </p>

                       16.7. No agency
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Nothing in these Terms &amp; Conditions shall be construed as creating any agency, partnership, trust arrangement, fiduciary relationship or any other form of joint enterprise between you and us.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       16.8. Severability
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If any of the Terms &amp; Conditions are determined by any competent authority to be invalid, unlawful or unenforceable to any extent, such term, condition or provision will to that extent be severed from the remaining terms, conditions and provisions which will continue to be valid to the fullest extent permitted by law. In such cases, the part deemed invalid or unenforceable shall be amended in a manner consistent with the applicable law to reflect, as closely as possible, Betrally’s original intent.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       16.9. Explanation of Terms and Conditions
                      </strong>
                     </p>

                      We consider these Terms &amp; Conditions to be open and fair. Should you need any explanation regarding these or any other part of our Service, please contact

                   <div class="help-right-section terms-block isHidden help-accordion" id="casino-and-games-rules">
                    <h2>
                     Casino and Games Rules
                    </h2>
                    <ol class="cms-content-list">
                     <li>
                      These Casino Rules are inseparably linked to our Terms &amp; Conditions, of which they form a part, and acceptance of these Casino Rules is a prerequisite to account registration. Any capitalized terms used herein which are not defined shall take their meaning from the Terms &amp; Conditions.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      A Customer’s total Account Balance is comprised of the aggregate of their Sports Cash Account, Casino Cash Account, Sports Bonus Account and Casino Bonus Account. Withdrawals cannot be made from either of the Bonus Accounts, but they can both be used to make wagers. Funds from the Sports Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Sports”, “Live Betting” and “Games” products and funds from the Casino Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Casino” and “Live Casino” products.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Withdrawals may only be processed from your Sports Cash Account. Any withdrawals from your Casino Cash Account can only be made by first transferring your withdrawal amount to the Sports Cash Account and then requesting the withdrawal be processed from the Sports Cash Account. Please note however that any transfer of funds from the Casino Cash Account to the Sports Cash Account will be construed as a Withdrawal from the Casino Cash Account and may consequently result in the forfeiture or voidance of Casino Product bonuses and promotions.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Please note that any of the “Casino” and “Games” products offered within the Website are subject to additional specific terms and conditions, which are made available and accessible through each respective game. You hereby acknowledge that any use of such “Casino”, “Live Casino” and “Games” products is further subject to such specific terms and conditions as shall apply from time to time.
                     </li>
                    </ol>

                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23483">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Betting Rules
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23483">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23483">
                   <!-- EN Betting Rules -->
                   <div class="help-right-section terms-block isHidden" id="betting-rules" style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
                    <h2>
                     Betting Rules
                    </h2>
                    <ol class="cms-content-list conuter-list">
                     <li>
                      These Betting Rules are inseparably linked to our Terms &amp; Conditions, of which they form a part, and acceptance of these Betting Rules is a prerequisite to account registration. Any capitalized terms used herein which are not defined shall take their meaning from the Terms &amp; Conditions.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      These Betting Rules apply to Betrally’s “Sports”, “Live Betting” and “Virtuals” products.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      The minimum amount for a bet on “Sports” or “Virtuals” is €0.10 (or currency equivalent). The minimum amount for a bet on “Live Betting” is €1.00 (or currency equivalent). Your maximum amount for a bet differs between sports, leagues and bets. You will see the exact value specified in the field where you enter the stake amount, when placing a bet. We make no guarantee that any bet placed within or for the maximum stake shall be accepted.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally accepts bets made online. Bets are not accepted in any other form (email, telephone, fax, etc.) and if received will be void, win or lose.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to refuse/cancel any bet or part of a bet before the game starts and to make ambiguous bets void, without providing any justification.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Customers cannot cancel or change a bet once the bet has been placed and confirmed.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Bets will be accepted up to the advertised start time. If a bet is inadvertently accepted which includes an event after its start time, unless it is a live-betting event, the match/bet will be treated as a non-runner.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      We also reserve the right to correct obvious errors with the input of betting odds. In such cases we could apply revised odds for final settlement on pre-live betting.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Irrespective of which betting odds format you select for odds to be shown in your Customer account, all bets will be settled based on American odds.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Where we have reason to believe that a bet is placed after the outcome of an event is known or after the selected participant or team has gained a material advantage (e.g. a score, sending off etc.) we reserve the right to void the bet, win or lose.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to cancel any bets from customers who place money on an event where they are in any way involved, as participants, referee, coach etc.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to withhold payment and to declare bets on an event void if we have evidence that the following has occurred: (i) the integrity of the event has been called into question or (ii) matchrigging has taken place. Evidence may be based on the size, volumes or pattern of bets placed with Betrally across any or all of our betting channels.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      When an event is cancelled, all related bets will be void automatically and accounts refunded.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      If any match is abandoned due to injury, bad weather, crowd trouble etc. all bets that have already been settled up until the time of abandonment will stand. For example: If a football match is abandoned in the second half, all bets involving the 1st half will stand. What’s more, if there has been a goal scored, the first goal scorer market will stand, but the last and any time goal scorer bets will be void. For tennis: if a player retires injured in the 3rd set, all bets to win the 1st and 2nd sets will stand.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally does not accept any responsibility for typing, human or palpable errors, which lead to obvious price errors. In such cases all bets will be deemed void.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Multiple bets that combine different selections within the same event are not accepted where the outcome of one affects or is affected by the other. If such a bet is taken in error, the bet will be cancelled.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally offers you the ability to bet in-play on a variety of global sporting events and while we do make every effort to ensure all live betting information is accurate, there may be situations where such information is incorrect, due to delays or otherwise. When checking live betting odds, live event start times or any other live event markets, please be aware that such information is provided as a guide only and we accept no liability for the outcome of any inaccuracies which may occur. It is the sole responsibility of the customer to check such information is accurate at the time of publication.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      The official result is final for settlement purposes except where specific rules state the contrary. The podium position in Grand Prix racing, the medal ceremony in athletics and any similar official ceremony or presentation in other sports are to be treated as the official result.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Winnings will be credited to the Customer’s account following confirmation of the final result.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to void any or all bets made by any person or group of persons acting in an attempt to defraud us.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to void any bet that may have been accepted when the account did not have sufficient funds to cover the bet. If an account has insufficient funds as a result of a deposit that has been cancelled by the payment processing party, Betrally reserves the right to cancel any bet that may have been accepted retroactively.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      The maximum total winnings which may be accrued by a given Customer on any day (any 24 hr period) across all products offered by Betrally is €50,000.00 or currency equivalent (hereafter the “Maximum Daily Payout”).
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      The maximum Withdrawal amount for any given month (any 30 day period) is €20,000.00 or currency equivalent.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Fraud and Collusion:
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      <ol class="cms-content-list--lv2">
                       <li>
                        A number of bets may be treated as being one when a Customer places multiple copies of the same bet. When this occurs all bets may be voided apart from the first bet struck. A number of bets that contain the same single selection may be treated as being one. When this occurs all bets may be voided apart from the first bet struck. An example would be where 1 particular selection is repeatedly included in multiple bets involving other short-priced selections.
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Where there is evidence of a series of bets each containing the same (or very similar) selection(s) having been placed by or for the same individual or syndicate or individuals, Betrally reserves the right to make bets void and suspend relevant accounts. This rule applies to both settled and unsettled bets.
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        If you have played in a professional capacity, or in tandem with other Customer(s) as part of a club, group, etc., or placed bets or wagers in a coordinated manner with other Customer(s) involving the same (or materially the same) selections; in this instance we further reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to restrict the total maximum pay out for the combined total of any such bets, to the equivalent of the Maximum Daily Payout limit permitted for a single Customer (as outlined at section 22 above). Betrally is for sole use on an individual basis and for personal entertainment only.
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Betrally allows only one account per person. Any subsequent accounts opened under the same postcode/personal details/IP address that are found to be related to any existing account may be closed immediately and any bets will be voided at Betrally's discretion. Betrally reserves the right to reclaim any winnings attained by these means and we reserve the right to withhold all or part of your balance and/or recover from your account deposits, pay outs, bonuses, any winnings that are attained by these means.
                       </li>
                      </ol>
                     </li>
                    </ol>
                    <p class="last-update">
                     Version 2.0 Last updated: 23 May 2018
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23483,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23483","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23483"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23483");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_26222">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  American Football
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26222">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26222">
                   <!-- EN American Football -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="betting-rule" id="american-football">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     <span class="br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-3">
                     </span>
                     American Football
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Abandoned or postponed matches are void unless rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. An exception is made if incorrect kick off time is announced on our website.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      All bets on the game include overtime scoring unless stated otherwise.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Games must go at least 55 minutes of play for bets to have action. If a game is suspended before 55 complete minutes are played, all bets on the outcome of the game are refunded unless otherwise stated, except for bets on any markets that have been unconditionally determined.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      In 2-way markets push rules apply unless otherwise stated below. Stakes on single bets are returned and in multiples/parlays the selection is treated as a non-runner.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a match venue is changed, bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.
                     </p>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Live-Betting
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Live betting game bets include overtime.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Points are considered regardless of whether they are scored before or after the bet is placed.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Teasers
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Teasers/Super Teasers/Monster Teasers allow adjustment of points spread and game totals on two or more teams.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       A fixed number of points are bought on all selections in the teaser. The number of teams selected and the number of points selected determine the payout odds:
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        6-point Teasers:
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Two teams = -110/1.9
                       <br/>
                       Three teams = +170/2.7
                       <br/>
                       Four teams = +290/3.9
                       <br/>
                       Five teams = +450/5.5
                       <br/>
                       Six teams = +650/7.5
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        6.5-point Teasers:
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Two teams = -120/1.83
                       <br/>
                       Three teams = +150/2.5
                       <br/>
                       Four teams = +240/3.4
                       <br/>
                       Five teams = +400/5
                       <br/>
                       Six teams = +550/6.5
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        7-point Teasers:
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Two teams = -130/1.76
                       <br/>
                       Three teams = +130/2.3
                       <br/>
                       Four teams = +190/2.9
                       <br/>
                       Five teams = +350/4.5
                       <br/>
                       Six teams = +450/5.5
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        10-point Teasers (Super)
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Three teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        13-point Teasers (Monster)
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Four teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       All selections must be successful in order for the bet to win.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If a selection in the teaser is a push, the teaser will drop to the next lower level, in case a lower level is offered for that particular teaser.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       A push in a two team teaser without a loss will make the entire bet lost.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       When placing a bet on a super/monster teaser a push will result in a lost bet.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Teaser bets will only be allowed on pre-match events and for selected leagues, including:
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       1. Regular teasers for NFL and NCAAF: 6, 6½ and 7 points
                       <br/>
                       2. SUPER TEASERS: 3 teams teaser - buying 8 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83
                       <br/>
                       3. MONSTER TEASER: 4 teams teaser - buying 10 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Buying points
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Buying points allows you to change the point-spread or the game total of an American Football game. You can move the point-spread in order to get more points when betting on the underdog, and fewer points when betting on the favorite. You can move the total in order to get a higher total when betting on under or a lower total if betting on over.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Winner
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner of the game. Bets include overtime if played. If the game ends in a draw, 2Way bets on Winner will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Spread
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner of the game, applying the given spread (handicap).
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Over/Under/Total Points
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict if the points scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1
                       <sup>
                        st
                       </sup>
                       Half
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on the first half result only.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Bets will be void if the match is abandoned before halftime.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If a match is abandoned during the second half then all first half bets are still valid.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       2
                       <sup>
                        nd
                       </sup>
                       Half
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on the second half result only include overtime.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1
                       <sup>
                        st
                       </sup>
                       /2
                       <sup>
                        nd
                       </sup>
                       /3
                       <sup>
                        rd
                       </sup>
                       Quarter
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on the quarters result only.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If the entire game is not completed, wagers on quarters will have action in case the relevant period was completed.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       4
                       <sup>
                        th
                       </sup>
                       Quarter
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on the 4
                       <sup>
                        th
                       </sup>
                       quarter result only include overtime (unless otherwise stated).
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Halftime/Fulltime
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the result of a match at halftime and fulltime.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Example: If you choose 1/2, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the away team to win the game.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Bets on Halftime/Fulltime exclude overtime.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Odd/Even
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated points in a game will add up to an odd or even number.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       First to score/Last to score
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       First/Last team to score means betting on which team will score the first or last point in a match.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If an event is abandoned after a point has been scored, then all bets on First team to score will stand, while bets on Last team to score will be void.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If an event is abandoned without any points being scored, then all wagers on First/Last team to score will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Total team points
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       "Total team points" is similar to Over/Under Wager.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Win/loss is determined by the points accumulated by a named team.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       To Qualify
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification bets will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Over Time
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict whether the game will go to overtime or not.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Highest Scoring Half/Quarter
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Highest Half/Quarter bets include overtime.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Push rules apply.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Touchdowns
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       "Touchdowns" is similar to Over/Under Wager.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Win/loss is determined by the number of Touchdowns accumulated by both teams.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Touchdown Scorers
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets on players not taking part in the match will be void.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If a match is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless a Touchdown is already scored. Then all bets for First Touchdown scorer will stand, Last and Anytime Touchdown scorers will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Winning Margin
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the team to win the match and the margin of victory. Overtime is included (if played).
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Race to 10
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict which team will be the first to score 10 points in the game. If the game is abandoned or finishes before 10 points are scored by any team, bets will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":26222,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26222","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26222"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_26222");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_26223">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Aussie Rules
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26223">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26223">
                   <!-- EN Aussie Rules -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="betting-rule" id="aussie-rules">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     <span class="br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-41">
                     </span>
                     Aussie Rules
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      All bets shall be settled on official AFL result only.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      All Australian Rules bets shall be settled including overtime if played, unless otherwise stated.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      In the event that extra time is played all head to head betting will be settled inclusive of Extra time.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a match is abandoned before the end of normal time, all bets on the match are void, except for those markets which have been unconditionally determined.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a match is postponed and rescheduled to take place within 48 hours of the original start time, all bets on the match will stand.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a match is no longer playing at the venue advertised, all bets will stand unless the venue has been changed to the opponent’s home ground, in which case all bets will be void.
                     </p>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       AFL betting rules
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       All wagers shall be settled on the officially declared result from the AFL. This includes match winners and goal kicking statistics.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Regular season fixtures and the Grand Final do not include extra time. Any draws that occur where a draw market is not offered shall be void. For pre-season fixtures such as NAB cup and the finals series (excluding the Grand Final) where extra time is offered, bets shall be settled on the regular time result. Extra time will not be included.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       For the purposes of determining futures markets such as Make the Grand Final/Minor Premiership/Premiership/Top 4/ Top 8, all deductions of points by the AFL due to breaches of regulations shall stand.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Brownlow Medal betting will be paid on official results as presented at the awards night. In the event of two or more players having equal points, the Dead Heat rule shall apply.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Coleman Medal betting shall only take in the regular season – NAB cup and any other preseason fixtures shall not apply. Finals series do not apply.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       For first goal scorer markets, bets on players taking no part in the match shall be void. If your player is an unused substitute, or takes the field as a designated substitute after a goal has been scored then bets on your player to score the first goal shall be made void.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Wire-to-Wire market is based upon a selection leading the match at the end of each quarter.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Time of first goal markets are based upon official AFL clock.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       For all Futures markets that are determined by an outright winner, the Dead Heat rule shall apply.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Gameplay specifics
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Scoring à Points = Goals (scores 6 points) + Behinds (score 1 point)
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Like many other codes of football, the way to score points is to score goals. In Australian Football, there are two types of scores: a goal and a behind.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       A goal umpire judges whether a goal or behind is scored.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Game length
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       The length of a game of Australian Football can vary from league to league, but is generally around 15 to 25 minutes per quarter. In the AFL, each quarter runs for 20 minutes plus time on – which makes up for time occupied in stoppages, such as when the ball going out of bounds, injuries, goals (or behinds) being kicked, or when the umpire is setting the angle of a free kick on goal. Time is kept by two off-field officials, known as "timekeepers", who sound the siren at the start and end of each quarter. A typical AFL quarter might run from 27 to 33 minutes, but may be even longer if, for instance, injuries cause delays. AFL breaks after the first and third quarters are six minutes, with a 20-minute break at halftime.[5] Thus, a match with quarters averaging 30 minutes would last about two and a half hours.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        1st Quarter / 2nd Quarter / 3rd Quarter / 4th Quarter
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on 1st/2nd/3rd/4th – Quarter Result final result only.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If a match is abandoned at any time those Quarter markets that are already determined will stand.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        1st Half / 2nd Half
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on the first/second half result only.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Bets will be void if the match is abandoned before half time.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If a match is abandoned during the second half all first half bets are still valid.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Outright
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       As stated in the AFL regulations above and overall Outright settlement – bets are declared valid for settlement as stated on official final league position.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        First / Last to Score
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <ul class="next_markets_ul">
                       <li>
                        Points – first / last to score any kind of point – goal or behind;
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Goals – first / last to score Goal;
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Behinds – first / last to score Behind;
                       </li>
                      </ul>
                      <br/>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Total Points / Goals / Behinds
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Predict how many Points (combined between Goals &amp; Behinds), Goals or Behinds (counted as separate scoring) – will be scored during the match.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Winning Margin
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Predict the Team to win the Match and the victory margin.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Race To (Points / Goals / Behinds)
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Predict the Team to reach first to selected number of Points, Goals or Behinds during the match.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 2. Last updated: 2 October 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":26223,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26223","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26223"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_26223");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_26224">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Bandy
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26224">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26224">
                   <!-- EN Bandy -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="betting-rule" id="bandy">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     <span class="br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-39">
                     </span>
                     Bandy
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      All games must start on the scheduled time for bets to have action. An exception is made if incorrect start time is announced on our website. Abandoned or postponed matches are void, unless rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. If a match venue is changed, then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If scheduled playing time is changed from 2 halves x 45 minutes, to 3 periods x 30 minutes, full time bets will be considered valid and half time bets will be void.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      All markets are based on the result at the end of the regular time – excluding overtime, if played, unless otherwise stated.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a market is offered as 2Way and happens to finish in a draw, Push rules apply.
                     </p>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Outright
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner of the league/tournament. Bets will be settled according to the final standings, including playoffs (if played), unless otherwise stated.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1x2
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the outcome of the game. There are 3 possible results:
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       1 – Home team wins
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       X – Draw
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       2 – Away team wins
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Spread
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner of the game, applying the given handicap (spread) to the result.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Over/Under
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict whether the total goals scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":26224,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26224","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26224"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_26224");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_26225">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Baseball
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26225">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26225">
                   <!-- EN Baseball -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="betting-rule" id="baseball">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     <span class="br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-7">
                     </span>
                     Baseball
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action. If a game does not start on the scheduled start date then all bets will be void. The exception is if we advertise an incorrect start time.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a game is suspended and completed on a subsequent day then all bets will be considered void (unless otherwise stated in these rules).
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      An exception is made for games in which a Mercy Rule is used: the result at the time of the Mercy Rule call will be used for settlement purposes.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      All bets include extra innings unless otherwise stated.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      There must be at least 5 full innings of play unless the home team is leading after 4½ innings, for bets on Money Line to have action. If a game is called or suspended, the winner is determined by the score after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the winner is determined by the score at the time the game is called. Monies will be refunded if the home team ties the game and it is then suspended. suspended games will not carry over to the following day.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets on Over/Under or Run line to have action with the exception of when a result has already been determined.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      For 7 innings games the game must go at least 7 full innings (or 6½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets on Over/Under or Run line to have action unless specified otherwise.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      In 2-way markets push rules apply unless otherwise stated below. Stakes on single bets are returned, and in multiples/parlays the selection is treated as a non-runner.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If a match venue is changed then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed then bets placed based on the original listing will be void.
                     </p>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Live-Betting
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       All bets are action regardless of pitching changes. Extra innings count.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       MLB wagers
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       If one or both of the starting pitchers are not exactly as specified at the time of the bet, the wager will be deemed "no action".
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Money line
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict which team will win the game.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Run line
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Win/loss is determined by the number of runs accumulated by both teams and then comparing with the run line given before the game start.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Run line -1.5
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       You win if your team wins the game with a run difference of two or more.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Run line +1.5
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       You win if your team wins or losing with in exactly a one run difference.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       O/U / Totals / 2W Total Line
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the total runs achieved in a match.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Over 9.5
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Your bet wins if there are more than 9 runs in the match otherwise your stake is lost.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Under 9.5
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Your bets wins if there are less than 10 runs in the match otherwise your stake is lost.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Under 9
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Your bets wins if there are less than 9 runs in the match.
                       <br/>
                       If there are 9 runs exactly the stake is returned otherwise your stake is lost.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Over 9
                       </strong>
                       <br/>
                       Your bet wins if there are more than 9 runs in the match.
                       <br/>
                       If there are 9 runs exactly the stake is returned otherwise your stake is lost.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st Half (5 innings)
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       All bets on baseball first half will be determined by the score at the end of five full innings.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The game must go at least 5 full innings for bets to have action.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Odd/Even
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated runs in a game will add up to an odd or even number.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets to have action.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Series betting
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets are void if the statutory number of games (according to the respective governing Organizations) are not completed or changed.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st To 3 Runs
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict which team will be the first to score 3 runs.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If neither team scored 3 runs bets on 1st To 3 Runs will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st / Last Home Run
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       First/Last home run means betting on which team will score the first / last home run.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If an Event is finished without any home run being scored then all wagers on First/Last home run will be void.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       If an Event is abandoned after home run scored then all bets on First home run will stand while bets on Last home run will be void. If an Event is abandoned without any home run being scored then all wagers on First/Last home run will be void.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Total Team Runs
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Total Team Runs is similar to Over/Under Wager. Win/loss is determined by the number of runs accumulated by a named team.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets to have action.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st Inning Winner (pre-match) and 1-9 inning money-line 3way (live)
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner at the end of the first inning. Bets can be made by either selecting a Home Win, a Draw or an Away Win.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st Inning Run Line (pre-match) and 1-9 inning line-handicap (live)
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bet type to predict the winner at the end of the first inning which includes preset advantage.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st inning O/U (pre-match) and 1-9 inning line-totals (live)
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the number of total runs accumulated by both teams at the end of the 1st inning.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       1st inning O/E
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict if the total runs accumulated by both teams will be odd or even.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Team with highest inning
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Which team will score most runs in an inning. Push rules apply.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Total 3/5/7 Innings
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the number of total runs accumulated by both teams after 3/5/7 Innings.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       3W Run Line and 3W Handicap
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the winner with preset game advantage. There are 3 possible outcomes that include the preset game advantage – Home win, Draw and Away Win.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       3W Total
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict if the total runs accumulated by both teams will be Over, Under or Exactly preset number.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Winning Margin
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict which team and with how many runs exactly will win from given options.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Total Team O/E
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict if the number of runs accumulated by the relevant team will be odd or even.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Double Result / HTFT
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Predict the result of a match at half time(after 5 Innings) and fulltime(after 9 innings). Example: If you chose 1/X, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the match ending in draw. Extra Innings do not count.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       To Qualify
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification/win the cup bets will be void for.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       Outright
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       Bets settled on final league position include play offs.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":26225,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26225","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26225"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_26225");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_26227">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Basketball
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26227">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_26227">
                   <!-- EN Basketball -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="betting-rule" id="basketball">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     <span class="br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-2">
                     </span>
                     Basketball
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action. An exception is made if incorrect start time is announced on our website.
                     </p>
                     <p>
