                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23675,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23675","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23675"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23675");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23671">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Each-way
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23671">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23671">
                   <!-- EN Each Way -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="bet-type" id="bt-each-way">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     Each-Way
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       What is an Each-Way bet?
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      An Each-Way (E/W) bet is a bet consisted of two separate parts - a win part and a place part. The win part of the bet is on your selection to win the event, and the place part is on your selection to finish either first or within the race's specified place terms (e.g. 2nd, 3rd, 4th, etc). The bet is very popular in horse racing since it allows you to gain returns even if your horse doesn't finish first.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       How do Each-Way bets work?
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      When you place an Each-Way bet (by ticking the e/w check box), your stake is doubled, with half allocated to the outright win, and the other half allocated to your runner finishing within the place terms. Each race has specified place terms depending on the number of runners, eg. ¼ 1-2-3. In this example, an Each-Way bet placed on a runner that finishes 1st will pay in two ways: you will win the outright portion of the bet, but you will also win the place portion at ¼ the outright odds as it finished in the top 3.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       Example:
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      You place a 2 EUR Each-Way bet on a 12/1 shot in a race with E/W terms ¼ 1-2-3
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If your selection finishes 1st:
                     </p>
                     <ul>
                      <li>
                       You win 12 EUR plus your stake for the outright win
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       You also win 3 EUR (quarter the outright odds: 3/1) plus your stake for placing (ie. finishing in the top 3)
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      If your selection finishes 2nd or 3rd:
                     </p>
                     <ul>
                      <li>
                       The outright portion of the bet will lose
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       You win 3 EUR plus your stake for placing
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      If your selection finishes outside the place terms for the race, both bets lose.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       How do Each-Way Accumulators work?
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      In the case of settling Each-Way Accumulators, the win portion of the first bet will be carried over to the win portion of the following bet, and similarly, the each-way portion of the bet will be carried over to the each-way portion of the following bet.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       Example:
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      You place a 1 EUR e/w accumulator on selection A in Race A and selection B in Race B. This means you have an outright (win) accumulator and a place accumulator
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If selection A wins and selection B only places, the outright portion of the accumulator will lose, but the place portion will win.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      If selection A only places and selection B wins, again, the outright portion of the accumulator will lose, but the place portion will win.
                     </p>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23671,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23671","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23671"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23671");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23672">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Fast Markets
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23672">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23672">
                   <!-- EN Fast Markets -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="bet-type" id="bt-fast-markets">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     Fast Markets
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      Fast Markets allow you to bet on whether you think a specific event will happen within the next 1 or 5 minutes of a live football match, giving you the incredible potential to win on every minute of your favourite live games!
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Think Rooney's about to lose it? Bet on a booking!
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Think the goalie's lost his grip? Bet on a corner!
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      You can choose to bet on goals, corners, bookings, penalties, throw-ins, free kicks and goal kicks to happen during the game's next 1 minute or 5 minutes:
                     </p>
                     <table class="help-table">
                      <tbody>
                       <tr>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          Event
                         </span>
                        </th>
                        <th>
                         Description
                        </th>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Goal
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a goal is scored
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Corner
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a corner is awarded
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Booking
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a yellow or red card is shown to a participating player
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Penalty
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a penalty is awarded
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Throw-In
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a throw-in is awarded
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Free Kick
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a free kick is awarded
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Goal Kick
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         The time at which a goal kick is awarded
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                      </tbody>
                     </table>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      1 minute refers to 00:00 – 00:59 seconds of the relevant 1 minute period.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      5 minutes refers to 00:00 – 04:59 seconds of the relevant 5 minute period.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Asian Handicap betting with these figures means you're essentially splitting your bet to cover certain outcomes.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Injury time is not included.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Here's how it works:
                     </p>
                     <ul>
                      <li>
                       Select the live match you want to bet on
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Choose the specific Fast Market from the list of options
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Select your bet
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Enter your stake on your bet slip and click on 'Place bets'
                      </li>
                     </ul>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      Turn up the heat on your live betting experience: try Fast Markets now.
                     </p>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23672,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23672","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23672"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23672");

                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23673">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Handicap
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23673">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23673">
                   <!-- EN Handicap -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="bet-type" id="bt-handicap">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     Handicap Betting
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      The Asian Line is a special type of handicap used for soccer matches. Depending on the strength of each team, a handicap is issued for the game. This enables the odds for each side to be more similar, allowing for more competitive betting opportunities. All bets on the Asian Handicap in live betting (including 1st/2nd half bets) are settled according to the score line. Any goals prior to the bet being placed are ignored for settlement purposes.
                     </p>
                     <table class="help-table">
                      <tbody>
                       <tr>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          Asian Handicap
                         </span>
                        </th>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          What it means
                         </span>
                        </th>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         0
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match. If there's a draw (0 goals difference), you are refunded your stake.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         0.25
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match. If there's a draw, your bet is split in half: one half is considered a win, the other half is considered a draw and its stakes are refunded.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         0.5
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team draws or wins the match.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         0.75
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins or draws the match. If it loses with a one goal difference, you lose half of the amount staked.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         1
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins or draws the match. If it loses with a goal difference of one, your stake is refunded.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         -0.25
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match. If it draws you lose half of the amount staked.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         -0.5
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         -0.75
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more. If it wins with one goal your bet is split in half: one half is considered a win, the other half is considered a draw and its stakes are refunded.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         -1
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more. If it wins with a goal difference of one, your stake is refunded.
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                      </tbody>
                     </table>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      Live betting example:
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Juventus vs Man.United - Live score 1:0
                     </p>
                     <table class="help-table">
                      <tbody>
                       <tr>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          Team
                         </span>
                        </th>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          Asian Handicap
                         </span>
                        </th>
                        <th>
                         <span>
                          Odds
                         </span>
                        </th>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Juventus
                        </td>
                        <td class="tdasian">
                         -0.75
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         5/6 (1.80)
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                       <tr>
                        <td>
                         Manchester
                        </td>
                        <td class="tdasian">
                         +0.75
                        </td>
                        <td>
                         23/20 (2.15)
                        </td>
                       </tr>
                      </tbody>
                     </table>
                     <br/>
                     <p>
                      Final score 3:0
                      <br/>
                      If you bet on Juventus €100, your net win is €80
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      Final score 2:0, 3:1
                      <br/>
                      If you bet on Juventus €100, your net win €40
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      <br/>
                      Final score 1:0, 1:1, 1:2, 1:3,2:1, 2:2, 3:2, 3:3
                      <br/>
                      If you bet on Man. United €100, your net win is €115
                     </p>
                     <h4>
                      3-Way Handicap
                     </h4>
                     <p>
                      In a 3-Way Handicap, the line is set so that there can also be a draw outcome, giving you 3 potential bets.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Handicap (-1) - You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more.
                      <br/>
                      Tie: You win if the team with (-1) Handicap wins the match with exactly one goal difference.
                      <br/>
                      Handicap (+1) - You win if your team draws or win the match.
                     </p>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>

                 </script>

                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="bet-type" id="bt-single-accumulator-system">

                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>

                     </p>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">

                          19
                         </td>

                         <td>
                          20-Fold
                         </td>
                         <td>
                          20
                         </td>
                        </tr>
                       </tbody>
                      </table>
                      <br/>
                      <p>
                       In all cases, all selections must be successful to be a winner. If one or more selections from the accumulator are cancelled, the bet stands as soon as at least one of the remaining selections is settled as a winner or loser.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Push
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       This is a game / selection that is tied after taking the handicap/spread into account. All bets will be void.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Non-Runner
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       A non-runner is a selection that is named but doesn't take part in the event. If your selection is a non-runner, your bet will be void (and your stake returned). If the selection is part of a accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        Void
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       In all cases where the term ‘void’ is used, settlement will be as follows:
                      </p>
                      <ul>
                       <li>
                        Single bets - stakes will be refunded.
                       </li>
                       <li>
                        Accumulator (Multiple) bets - void selections will be treated as non-runners within the bet, meaning If the selection is part of an accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.
                       </li>
                      </ul>
                     </div>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       System Bets
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       <strong>
                        What is a system bet?
                       </strong>
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       System bets are similar to accumulators or accumulators in that you choose several selections within one bet, but all possible combinations of bets from those selections are covered, with the advantage of winning even if not all picks are winners.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       Systems bets are presented as two numbers separated by a slash: eg. 2/4, with the first number denoting the type of bets involved (in this case, doubles), and the second number denoting the number of selections involved.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       For example, in a 2/4 system bet, you would choose 4 selections and click on the System tab at the top of the bet slip, where you would then see your system bets options. The 2/4 system bet is made up of the 6 possible combinations using your 4 selections, so a stake of €0.50 would cost €3. Even if only 2 of those possible combinations were winners, your bet would win, with the return amount dependant on how many possible combinations actually win. If none or only one of your picks wins, your system bet loses. When you place your system bet, the amount of winnings shown is the maximum winnings possible if all picks win.
                      </p>
                      <p>
                       You can see the details of active system bets by checking Open Bets under My Account.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <h3>
                      Systems involving 3 selections
                     </h3>
                     <h2 class="section-header inner-header">
                      <span class="header-title">
                       System 2/3
                      </span>
                     </h2>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <p>
                       A 2/3 system consists of 3 bets involving 3 selections in different events - 3 doubles. Any two winning bets guarantee a return. More winning bets means a higher return. Please note that a €1 System 2/3 costs €3.
                      </p>
                      <table class="help-table help-table-vertical">

                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23675,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23675","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23675"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23675");

                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23674">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Teaser Bets
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23674">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23674">
                   <!-- EN Teaser Bets -->
                   <div class="rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion" data-type="bet-type" id="bt-teaser-bets">
                    <h2 class="section-header firstHeader">
                     Teaser Bets
                    </h2>
                    <div class="section-holder firstHolder">
                     <p>
                      A teaser bet allows you to adjust the points spread and game totals on two or more American Football or Basketball teams by choosing a fixed number of points. The number of teams and points selected determines your payout odds.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      <strong>
                       How do teaser bets work?
                      </strong>
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      All selections must be successful for the teaser bet to win. If a selection in a two team teaser is a push, the bet will be a loser. A push in teasers of more than two teams will result in the bet dropping to the next level down, if available, or losing if not.
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      Teaser bets will only be allowed on pre-match events and only for selected leagues, including:
                     </p>
                     <p>
                      i. Regular teasers for NBA, NCAAB, NFL, NCAAF or any other league in which teaser bets are allowed (4, 4.5 and 5 for Basketball and 6, 6.5 and 7 for American Football)
                      <br/>
                      ii. SUPER TEASERS: 3 teams teaser - buying 8 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83
                      <br/>
                      iii. MONSTER TEASER: 4 teams teaser - buying 10 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83
                     </p>
                     <h4>
                      Buying points
                     </h4>
                     <p>
                      Buying points allows you to change the point-spread or game total of an American Football or Basketball game. You can move the point-spread so you get more points when betting the underdog, and fewer points when betting on the favourite. You can move the total so you get a higher total when betting the under or a lower total if betting the over.
                     </p>
                     <p class="last-update">
                      Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017
                     </p>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <script>
                  jsRequire('/JSComponents/Mobile/FreeHtmlBlock.js');
             Application.registerBlock("help-section", new FreeHtmlBlock({"ID":23674,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"HTMLContanerID":"html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23674","MasterContainerID":"master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23674"}), "Center_HTMLBlock_23674");
                 </script>
                </div>
                <div class="isHidden" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block" id="block-wrapper-Center_HTMLBlock_23477">
                 <h4 class="myacc-block-heading" data-uat="my-acc-resp-block-header">
                  Promotions Terms
                 </h4>
                 <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23477">
                  <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23477">
                   <!-- EN Promotion Terms -->
                   <div class="help-right-section terms-block isHidden help-accordion" id="promotion-terms">
                    <h2>
                     Betrally General Promotion Rules
                    </h2>
                    <ol class="cms-content-list">
                     <li>
                      These Betrally General Promotional Rules, Sports Bonus Terms, Free Bet Terms and No-Deposit Bonus Terms are inseparably linked to our
                      <a class="help-inner-link" data-action="Application.blockAction" data-params="help-section, Center_MyAccountResponsiveBlock_22802, onNavigationChanged, 27" href="javascript:void(0)" rel="terms-and-conditions">
                       Terms &amp; Conditions
                      </a>
                      , of which they form a part, and their acceptance is a prerequisite to account registration. Any capitalized terms used herein which are not defined shall take their meaning from the
                      <a class="help-inner-link" data-action="Application.blockAction" data-params="help-section, Center_MyAccountResponsiveBlock_22802, onNavigationChanged, 27" href="javascript:void(0)" rel="terms-and-conditions">
                       Terms &amp; Conditions
                      </a>
                      .
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      All customer offers are limited to one per person, family, household address, email address, telephone number, same payment account number (e.g. debit or credit card, Skrill and etc.), shared computer (e.g. school, public library or workplace) and shared IP.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      A Customer’s total Account Balance is comprised of the aggregate of their Sports Cash Account, Casino Cash Account, Sports Bonus Account and Casino Bonus Account. Withdrawals cannot be made from either of the Bonus Accounts, but they can both be used to make wagers. Funds from the Sports Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Sports”, “Live Betting”, “Virtuals” and “Games” products and funds from the Casino Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Casino” products.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Withdrawals may only be processed from your Sports Cash Account. Any withdrawals from your Casino Cash Account can only be made by first transferring your withdrawal amount to your Sports Cash Account and then requesting the Withdrawal be processed from the Sports Cash Account. Please note that any transfer of funds from the Casino Cash Account to the Sports Cash Account will be construed as a Withdrawal from the Casino Cash Account and may consequently result in the cancellation and forfeiture of “Casino” product bonuses and promotions.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Any wagers made are deducted from the Sports Cash Account or Casino Cash Account first, as the case may be. Real money funds will always be used to place wagers/bets before bonus funds.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      All Betrally bonuses and promotions are intended for recreational players and Betrally may, in its sole discretion, limit the eligibility of Customers to participate in all or part of any promotion. Where a Customer transfers funds from their Sports Cash Account to Casino Cash Account for the sole purpose of realizing game play with funds from their Sports Bonus Account, and then transfers such funds back to the Customer’s Sports Cash Account without wagering them twice, such transfer shall be deemed as bonus manipulation (i.e. outside of recreational play) and the amount of the originally awarded sports bonus shall be deducted from the Customer’s account.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      When: (1) you have no open bets; (2) the remaining balance of your Sports Bonus Account is less than €1.00; and (3) your total sports balance is also less than €1.00; then the balance of your Sports Bonus Account shall automatically be transferred to your Sports Cash Account. This will have the effect of removing the active Sports bonus from your account so that you can take up another promotion.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Unless otherwise specified, all bonus and promotion offers are only redeemable once per Customer and a Customer may have no more than one active Casino bonus and one active Sports bonus on his account at any given time.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Any bonus and any associated winnings will be automatically removed from a Customer's account upon the Customer requesting a Withdrawal before meeting the rollover or eligibility requirements of the applicable bonus.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Cashed-Out (including Partial Cash-Outs) bets shall not contribute to meeting the rollover or eligibility requirements of any Sports promotion.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      If you wish to find out how much rollover requirement remains in respect of a given bonus, please contact
                      <a class="color" href="mailto:support@betrally.com">
                       support@betrally.com
                      </a>
                      .
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      If you wish to cancel an active bonus, please contact
                      <a class="color" href="mailto:support@betrally.com">
                       support@betrally.com
                      </a>
                      . Please note that in such circumstances, any amount (in the Casino Bonus Account or Sports Bonus Account, as the case may be) attributable to the active bonus will be removed, including any associated winnings.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      All Betrally bonuses and promotions are intended for recreational players and Betrally may, in its sole discretion, limit the eligibility of Customers to participate in all or part of any promotion. Betrally reserves the right to request identification verification documents, including a photograph of the Customer with his identification document, prior to crediting a bonus to a Customer’s account.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      Betrally reserves the right to amend, cancel, reclaim or refuse any promotion at our discretion.
                     </li>
                     <li>
                      All management decisions are final.
                     </li>
                     <h4 class="section-header" id="sports-bonus-terms">
                      Sports Bonus Terms
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="16">
                       Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of your deposit and the corresponding Sports Bonus funds five (5) times before the funds in your Sports Bonus Account are transferred to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Unless otherwise specified, you must fulfil the rollover requirements within 15 days of the bonus being taken up, otherwise the funds held in your Sports Bonus Account will be forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Unless otherwise specified, to fulfil the bonus rollover requirements, all wagers must be made on odds of at least 3/5 (1.60) or higher, excluding any type of handicap (except 3Way Handicap), Forecast/Tricast and on Over/Under bets.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Bets will only count towards rollover requirements once they have been finally settled.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any bet ‘win’ resulting from funds wagered from the Sports Cash Account is credited into the Sports Cash Account as 'stakes and winnings' up to the amount of the initial deposit used to claim the bonus. Any further realised gains (stake and winnings) exceeding the initial deposit amount, are credited to the Sports Bonus Account and continue to be subject to the remaining applicable bonus rollover requirements.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any bet profit resulting from mixed Sports Cash Account and Sports Bonus Account funds wagered, is credited into the Sports Bonus Account as ‘stake and winnings’ and is subject to the remaining applicable bonus roll-over requirements.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Only once the roll-over requirements are met in their entirety, within the designated period of time, shall the Sports Bonus Account funds associated with the bonus be automatically transferred from the Sports Bonus Account to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Unless otherwise specified, should a Withdrawal from the Sports Cash Account be requested while there are funds in the Sports Bonus Account, the balance of the Sports Bonus Account shall be cancelled and forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Betrally reserves the right to cancel the bonus eligibility, bonus amount and any associated bonus winnings of a customer or a group of customers following suspicious common betting patterns that could result in generating guaranteed profit and/or guaranteed bonus eligibility. This suspicious activity might include, without being limited to, common betting patterns across identical events/markets/selections that could be identified in one or across several accounts.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Without derogating from anything stated herein, detection of an apparent relation between users, common betting pattern or any other abusive betting strategic which unfairly exploits or manipulates one or more bonuses or promotions offered by Betrally (to be determined at Betrally’s sole discretion) may result in the cancellation of the applicable promotion and any associated winnings, and may further result in the irreversible suspension of promotion and bonus eligibility.
                      </li>
                     </div>
                     <h4 class="section-header">
                      Sports No-Deposit Bonus
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="26">
                       Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of the No-Deposit Bonus awarded ten (10) times before the funds in your Sports Bonus Account are transferred to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of any of these funds may be made.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The Customer shall have five (5) days (unless otherwise stated in the specific promotion T&amp;Cs) to meet the rollover requirements, at which time the bonus shall be cancelled and forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The maximum withdrawable winnings from a Sports No-Deposit Bonus shall be five times (5X) the amount of the Sports No-Deposit Bonus credited to the Customer’s account.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       A Customer must make a deposit of at least €10 before he is permitted to withdraw any winnings derived from a Sports No-Deposit Bonus
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any winnings from No-Deposit Bonus credited to a Customer’s Sports Cash Account may only be the subject of a Withdrawal upon the Customer making a deposit into his Sports Cash Account no less than the amount of the Sports No-Deposit Bonus from which the winnings were derived.
                      </li>
                     </div>
                     <h4 class="section-header">
                      Free Bet
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="31">
                       Unless otherwise specified, any winnings earned from a Free Bet shall be credited to a Customer’s Sports Cash Account, and are withdrawable. The Free Bet amount shall not be stake-returned.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       A Free Bet shall only be valid on specified bet types, sports, leagues or events – as stated in the specific promotion terms.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       No Free Bet may be used in portions. For example, if a €10 Free Bet is used for a €5 bet, then the unused €5 shall be forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The Free Bet shall always be used prior to real money funds from the Sports Cash Account - for example, if a customer is placing a €20 bet and selects a €10 Free Bet token, while having a balance of €100 in his Sports Cash Account, then the total amount of the Free Bet will be used (€10) and €10 will be drawn from the Sports Cash Account.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any bet that satisfies the eligibility requirement to be awarded a Free Bet may not later be the subject of a Cash-Out.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any bet the subject of a Cash-Out shall not contribute to any eligibility requirement to receive a Free Bet.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Bets placed on Asian Handicap or Over/Under, and are half-lost, shall not count towards the eligibility requirements of a Free Bet, when such conditions are considered for lost bets only or for missed selections in an accumulator.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If a bet which contributed to the eligibility of a Free Bet or which was placed with a Free Bet has been cancelled, Betrally reserves the right to remove the Free Bet from the Customer’s account and shall, in its sole discretion, determine whether the Customer may be eligible for the promotion again.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       If a bet contributing to the eligibility of a Free Bet and a bet placed with the Free Bet cover opposite selections of one and the same event, any winnings shall be cancelled and forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Combo and System Bets, regardless of the number of individual bets placed, may contribute to the eligibility requirement for only for one Free Bet. For example, if a customer places three singles, as one bet, they shall contribute to the eligibility requirement for only one Free Bet. Further, if a Customer places a system of three doubles and one treble, the bets shall contribute to the eligibility requirement for only one Free Bet.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any bets which contributed to eligibility requirement for a Free Bet shall not contribute to the eligibility requirement of any other offer.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Unless otherwise specified, any bets placed shall contribute to the eligibility requirements of a Free Bet first, before contributing the eligibility requirement of any other offer.
                      </li>
                     </div>
                     <h4 class="section-header">
                      Casino Bonus Terms
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="43">
                       Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of Casino Bonus funds thirty five (35) times before the funds in your Casino Bonus Account are transferred to the Casino Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Betrally may, at its sole discretion, exclude Canadian Customers depositing with € as a currency, from being eligible for promotions
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Unless otherwise specified, Customers must meet the rollover requirements within 15 days of the bonus being taken up.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Stakes from all game categories on the Betrally ‘Casino’ product will contribute towards the rollover requirements. However, some game categories will contribute towards roll-over requirements more than others.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The contributing percentages are as follows:
                       <br/>
                       <br/>
                       <table class="help-table">
                        <thead>
                         <tr>

                       <br/>
                       <p>
                        Examples:
                       </p>
                       <ul>
                        <li>
                         A bet of €5 in Slots will be calculated as €5 for wagering requirements.
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         A bet of €5 in Roulette will be calculated as €1 for wagering requirements.
                        </li>
                        <li>
                         A bet of €5 in Blackjack will be calculated as €0.5 for wagering requirements.
                        </li>
                       </ul>
                       <br/>
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any win resulting from funds gambled from the Casino Cash Account are credited into the Casino Cash Account as 'stakes and winnings' up to the amount of the initial deposit used to claim the bonus. Any further realised gains (stake and winnings) exceeding the initial deposit amount, are credited to the Casino Bonus Account and continue to be subject to the remaining applicable rollover requirements.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any Casino bonus amount awarded shall be available for wagering purposes only. The amount of such bonus funds shall be automatically deducted from the Customer's account upon satisfaction of the rollover requirements, unless specifically stated otherwise.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Winnings resulting from wagers made from the Casino Bonus Account are credited back to the Casino Bonus Account. Any profit resulting from mixed Casino Cash Account and Casino Bonus Account funds gambled, shall be credited into the Casino Bonus Account as ‘stake and winnings’ and is subject to the remaining applicable bonus rollover requirements.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The use of funds from the Casino Bonus Account solely to progress faster through the bonus stages of multi-level games such as Castle Builder, Devil's Delight, Champion of the Track, Robin Hood, the Wishmaster, Eggomatic and Big Bang, in order to trigger winnings accumulation into the Casino Cash Account without meeting the necessary bonus roll-over requirements, may result in the forfeiture of any final bonus round profit and all subsequently generated winnings from the latter irrespective of whether the player’s balance had an active bonus part at the time of the bonus round activation.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any winnings deriving from "free spin" or "bonus" features initiated with funds from the Casino Bonus Account but completed after the bonus has been wagered, lost or forfeited, will be removed.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Casino bonus rollover requirements are removed only upon the cancellation or expiration of the applicable bonus. When the remaining balance of your Casino Bonus Account is less than €2.00 and your total casino balance is also less than €2.00, the balance of your Casino Bonus Account shall automatically be transferred from your Casino Bonus Account to your Casino Cash Account. This will have the effect of removing the active Casino bonus from your account so that you can take up another promotion. In the event that Customer makes subsequent deposits into his Casino Cash Account while still having a balance in his Casino Bonus Account (greater than €0.00) the Customer shall contact
                       <a class="color" href="mailto:support@betrally.com">
                        support@betrally.com
                       </a>
                       and ensure that the funds in his Casino Bonus Account are cleared from his balance prior to placing bets – otherwise, the initial bonus rollover requirements shall remain valid.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any winnings resulting from a Casino promotion which are then transferred from the Casino Cash Account to the Sports Cash Account, shall not, when transferred back to the Casino Cash Account, be a qualifying deposit for the purpose of any Casino promotion. Any winnings resulting from such transfer being inadvertently accepted as a qualifying deposit, shall be considered as a result of irregular gaming.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Before any Withdrawal is processed, your play will be reviewed for any irregular playing patterns. In the interests of fair gaming, equal, zero or low margin bets or hedge betting, shall all be considered irregular gaming for the purpose of meeting any roll-over requirements. Other examples of irregular game play include but are not limited to (1) placing single wagers (a) equal to or in excess of 5% more of the value of the bonus credited to their account; or (b) equal to or in excess of 5% more of the value of the deposit used for claiming the bonus or (c) equal to or in excess of €6.25 (US$6.25) (whichever is lower of a, b or c) until such time as the wagering requirements for that bonus have been met; and (2) placing large bets which result in a substantial gain followed by a drop in bet size equal to or more than seventy five percent of the previous average bet size until the bonus roll-over requirements have been met. Should Betrally deem, at its sole discretion, that irregular game play has occurred, it reserves the right to withhold any Withdrawals and/or confiscate any associated winnings.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Betrally considers all of the above General Promotional Rules, and Sports and Casino terms to be fair. Should you require any clarification or advice regarding them, please contact
                       <a class="color" href="mailto:support@betrally.com">
                        support@betrally.com
                       </a>
                       .
                      </li>
                     </div>
                     <h4 class="section-header">
                      Casino No-Deposit Bonus
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="57">
                       Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of Casino No-Deposit Bonus funds fifty (50) times before the funds in your Casino Bonus Account are transferred to the Casino Cash Account and a Withdrawal of any of these funds may be made.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The Customer shall have five (5) days (unless otherwise stated in the specific promotion T&amp;Cs) to meet the rollover requirements, at which time the bonus shall be cancelled and forfeited.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The maximum withdrawable winnings from a Casino No-Deposit Bonus shall be ten times (10X) the amount of the Casino No-Deposit Bonus credited to the Customer’s account.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       A Customer must make a deposit of at least €10 before he is permitted to withdraw any winnings derived from a Casino No-Deposit Bonus
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Any winnings from Casino No-Deposit Bonus credited to a Customer’s Casino Cash Account may only be the subject of a Withdrawal upon the Customer making a deposit into his Casino Cash Account no less than the amount of the Casino No-Deposit Bonus from which the winnings were derived.
                      </li>
                     </div>
                     <h4 class="section-header">
                      Free Spins
                     </h4>
                     <div class="section-holder">
                      <li value="62">
                       Any winnings from the Free Spins shall be credited to the Customer’s Casino Cash Account, with no rollover requirement. The value of the Free Spin shall not be stake-returned.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       The maximum withdrawable winnings from Free Spin, credited as a result of a single promotion, shall be €50. For example, if 50 Free Spins are credited together, then the maximum cumulative withdrawable winnings shall be €50.
                      </li>
                      <li>
                       Customers must make a deposit of at least €10 before they can withdraw any winnings associated with Free Spins.
                      </li>
