We make no guarantee that any bet placed within or for the maximum stake shall be accepted.</li>\n        <li>Betrally accepts bets made online. Bets are not accepted in any other form (email, telephone, fax, etc.) and if received will be void, win or lose.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to refuse/cancel any bet or part of a bet before the game starts and to make ambiguous bets void, without providing any justification.</li>\n        <li>Customers cannot cancel or change a bet once the bet has been placed and confirmed.</li>\n        <li>Bets will be accepted up to the advertised start time. If a bet is inadvertently accepted which includes an event after its start time, unless it is a live-betting event, the match/bet will be treated as a non-runner.</li>\n        <li>We also reserve the right to correct obvious errors with the input of betting odds. In such cases we could apply revised odds for final settlement on pre-live betting.</li>\n        <li>Irrespective of which betting odds format you select for odds to be shown in your Customer account, all bets will be settled based on American odds.</li>\n        <li>Where we have reason to believe that a bet is placed after the outcome of an event is known or after the selected participant or team has gained a material advantage (e.g. a score, sending off etc.) we reserve the right to void the bet, win or lose.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to cancel any bets from customers who place money on an event where they are in any way involved, as participants, referee, coach etc.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to withhold payment and to declare bets on an event void if we have evidence that the following has occurred: (i) the integrity of the event has been called into question or (ii) matchrigging has taken place. Evidence may be based on the size, volumes or pattern of bets placed with Betrally across any or all of our betting channels.</li>\n        <li>When an event is cancelled, all related bets will be void automatically and accounts refunded.</li>\n        <li>If any match is abandoned due to injury, bad weather, crowd trouble etc. all bets that have already been settled up until the time of abandonment will stand. For example: If a football match is abandoned in the second half, all bets involving the 1st half will stand. What’s more, if there has been a goal scored, the first goal scorer market will stand, but the last and any time goal scorer bets will be void. For tennis: if a player retires injured in the 3rd set, all bets to win the 1st and 2nd sets will stand.</li>\n        <li>Betrally does not accept any responsibility for typing, human or palpable errors, which lead to obvious price errors. In such cases all bets will be deemed void.</li>\n        <li>Multiple bets that combine different selections within the same event are not accepted where the outcome of one affects or is affected by the other. If such a bet is taken in error, the bet will be cancelled.</li>\n        <li>Betrally offers you the ability to bet in-play on a variety of global sporting events and while we do make every effort to ensure all live betting information is accurate, there may be situations where such information is incorrect, due to delays or otherwise. When checking live betting odds, live event start times or any other live event markets, please be aware that such information is provided as a guide only and we accept no liability for the outcome of any inaccuracies which may occur. It is the sole responsibility of the customer to check such information is accurate at the time of publication.</li>\n        <li>The official result is final for settlement purposes except where specific rules state the contrary. The podium position in Grand Prix racing, the medal ceremony in athletics and any similar official ceremony or presentation in other sports are to be treated as the official result.</li>\n        <li>Winnings will be credited to the Customer’s account following confirmation of the final result.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to void any or all bets made by any person or group of persons acting in an attempt to defraud us.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to void any bet that may have been accepted when the account did not have sufficient funds to cover the bet. If an account has insufficient funds as a result of a deposit that has been cancelled by the payment processing party, Betrally reserves the right to cancel any bet that may have been accepted retroactively.</li>\n        <li>The maximum total winnings which may be accrued by a given Customer on any day (any 24 hr period) across all products offered by Betrally is €50,000.00 or currency equivalent (hereafter the “Maximum Daily Payout”).</li>\n        <li>The maximum Withdrawal amount for any given month (any 30 day period) is €20,000.00 or currency equivalent.</li>\n        <li>Fraud and Collusion:\n            <br>\n            <br>\n            <ol class=\"cms-content-list--lv2\">\n                <li>A number of bets may be treated as being one when a Customer places multiple copies of the same bet. When this occurs all bets may be voided apart from the first bet struck. A number of bets that contain the same single selection may be treated as being one. When this occurs all bets may be voided apart from the first bet struck. An example would be where 1 particular selection is repeatedly included in multiple bets involving other short-priced selections.</li>\n                <li>Where there is evidence of a series of bets each containing the same (or very similar) selection(s) having been placed by or for the same individual or syndicate or individuals, Betrally reserves the right to make bets void and suspend relevant accounts. This rule applies to both settled and unsettled bets.</li>\n                <li>If you have played in a professional capacity, or in tandem with other Customer(s) as part of a club, group, etc., or placed bets or wagers in a coordinated manner with other Customer(s) involving the same (or materially the same) selections; in this instance we further reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to restrict the total maximum pay out for the combined total of any such bets, to the equivalent of the Maximum Daily Payout limit permitted for a single Customer (as outlined at section 22 above). Betrally is for sole use on an individual basis and for personal entertainment only.</li>\n                <li>Betrally allows only one account per person. Any subsequent accounts opened under the same postcode/personal details/IP address that are found to be related to any existing account may be closed immediately and any bets will be voided at Betrally's discretion. Betrally reserves the right to reclaim any winnings attained by these means and we reserve the right to withhold all or part of your balance and/or recover from your account deposits, pay outs, bonuses, any winnings that are attained by these means.</li>\n            </ol>\n        </li>\n    </ol>\n\n    <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.0 Last updated: 23 May 2018</p>\n</div>","Id":23483,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22813,"LinkTitle":"Betting Rules","LinkType":29,"SubItems":[{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26222","Code":"resp-br-american-football","Content":"<!-- EN American Football -->\n\n<div id=\"american-football\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-3\"></span>American Football</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.</p>\n        <p>Abandoned or postponed matches are void unless rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. An exception is made if incorrect kick off time is announced on our website.</p>\n        <p>All bets on the game include overtime scoring unless stated otherwise.</p>\n        <p>Games must go at least 55 minutes of play for bets to have action. If a game is suspended before 55 complete minutes are played, all bets on the outcome of the game are refunded unless otherwise stated, except for bets on any markets that have been unconditionally determined.</p>\n        <p>In 2-way markets push rules apply unless otherwise stated below. Stakes on single bets are returned and in multiples/parlays the selection is treated as a non-runner.</p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed, bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Live-Betting </span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Live betting game bets include overtime.</p>\n            <p>Points are considered regardless of whether they are scored before or after the bet is placed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Teasers</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Teasers/Super Teasers/Monster Teasers allow adjustment of points spread and game totals on two or more teams.</p>\n            <p>A fixed number of points are bought on all selections in the teaser. The number of teams selected and the number of points selected determine the payout odds:</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>6-point Teasers: </strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -110/1.9\n                <br> Three teams = +170/2.7\n                <br> Four teams = +290/3.9\n                <br> Five teams = +450/5.5\n                <br> Six teams = +650/7.5</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>6.5-point Teasers: </strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -120/1.83\n                <br> Three teams = +150/2.5\n                <br> Four teams = +240/3.4\n                <br> Five teams = +400/5\n                <br> Six teams = +550/6.5</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>7-point Teasers: </strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -130/1.76\n                <br> Three teams = +130/2.3\n                <br> Four teams = +190/2.9\n                <br> Five teams = +350/4.5\n                <br> Six teams = +450/5.5</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>10-point Teasers (Super)</strong>\n                <br> Three teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>13-point Teasers (Monster)</strong>\n                <br> Four teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)</p>\n\n            <p>All selections must be successful in order for the bet to win.</p>\n            <p>If a selection in the teaser is a push, the teaser will drop to the next lower level, in case a lower level is offered for that particular teaser.</p>\n            <p>A push in a two team teaser without a loss will make the entire bet lost.</p>\n            <p>When placing a bet on a super/monster teaser a push will result in a lost bet.</p>\n            <p>Teaser bets will only be allowed on pre-match events and for selected leagues, including:</p>\n\n            <p> 1. Regular teasers for NFL and NCAAF: 6, 6½ and 7 points\n                <br> 2. SUPER TEASERS: 3 teams teaser - buying 8 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83\n                <br> 3. MONSTER TEASER: 4 teams teaser - buying 10 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Buying points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Buying points allows you to change the point-spread or the game total of an American Football game. You can move the point-spread in order to get more points when betting on the underdog, and fewer points when betting on the favorite. You can move the total in order to get a higher total when betting on under or a lower total if betting on over.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the game. Bets include overtime if played. If the game ends in a draw, 2Way bets on Winner will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the game, applying the given spread (handicap).</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under/Total Points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the points scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on the first half result only.</p>\n            <p>Bets will be void if the match is abandoned before halftime.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during the second half then all first half bets are still valid.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on the second half result only include overtime.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup>/2\n                <sup>nd</sup>/3\n                <sup>rd</sup> Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on the quarters result only.</p>\n            <p>If the entire game is not completed, wagers on quarters will have action in case the relevant period was completed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">4\n                <sup>th</sup> Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on the 4\n                <sup>th</sup> quarter result only include overtime (unless otherwise stated).</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Halftime/Fulltime</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of a match at halftime and fulltime.</p>\n            <p>Example: If you choose 1/2, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the away team to win the game.</p>\n            <p>Bets on Halftime/Fulltime exclude overtime.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated points in a game will add up to an odd or even number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First to score/Last to score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>First/Last team to score means betting on which team will score the first or last point in a match.</p>\n            <p>If an event is abandoned after a point has been scored, then all bets on First team to score will stand, while bets on Last team to score will be void.</p>\n            <p>If an event is abandoned without any points being scored, then all wagers on First/Last team to score will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total team points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\"Total team points\" is similar to Over/Under Wager.</p>\n            <p>Win/loss is determined by the points accumulated by a named team.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Qualify</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether the game will go to overtime or not.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Highest Scoring Half/Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Highest Half/Quarter bets include overtime.</p>\n            <p>Push rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Touchdowns</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\"Touchdowns\" is similar to Over/Under Wager.</p>\n            <p>Win/loss is determined by the number of Touchdowns accumulated by both teams.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Touchdown Scorers</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets on players not taking part in the match will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless a Touchdown is already scored. Then all bets for First Touchdown scorer will stand, Last and Anytime Touchdown scorers will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Margin</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the team to win the match and the margin of victory. Overtime is included (if played).</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race to 10</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the first to score 10 points in the game. If the game is abandoned or finishes before 10 points are scored by any team, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017</p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26222,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22814,"LinkTitle":"American Football","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26223","Code":"resp-br-aussie-rules","Content":"<!-- EN Aussie Rules -->\n<div id=\"aussie-rules\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-41\"></span>Aussie Rules</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n\n        <p>All bets shall be settled on official AFL result only.</p>\n        <p>All Australian Rules bets shall be settled including overtime if played, unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        <p>In the event that extra time is played all head to head betting will be settled inclusive of Extra time.</p>\n        <p>If a match is abandoned before the end of normal time, all bets on the match are void, except for those markets which have been unconditionally determined.</p>\n        <p>If a match is postponed and rescheduled to take place within 48 hours of the original start time, all bets on the match will stand.</p>\n        <p>If a match is no longer playing at the venue advertised, all bets will stand unless the venue has been changed to the opponent’s home ground, in which case all bets will be void.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">AFL betting rules</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All wagers shall be settled on the officially declared result from the AFL. This includes match winners and goal kicking statistics.</p>\n            <p>Regular season fixtures and the Grand Final do not include extra time. Any draws that occur where a draw market is not offered shall be void. For pre-season fixtures such as NAB cup and the finals series (excluding the Grand Final) where extra time is offered, bets shall be settled on the regular time result. Extra time will not be included.</p>\n            <p>For the purposes of determining futures markets such as Make the Grand Final/Minor Premiership/Premiership/Top 4/ Top 8, all deductions of points by the AFL due to breaches of regulations shall stand.</p>\n            <p> Brownlow Medal betting will be paid on official results as presented at the awards night. In the event of two or more players having equal points, the Dead Heat rule shall apply.</p>\n            <p>Coleman Medal betting shall only take in the regular season – NAB cup and any other preseason fixtures shall not apply. Finals series do not apply.</p>\n            <p>For first goal scorer markets, bets on players taking no part in the match shall be void. If your player is an unused substitute, or takes the field as a designated substitute after a goal has been scored then bets on your player to score the first goal shall be made void.</p>\n            <p>Wire-to-Wire market is based upon a selection leading the match at the end of each quarter.</p>\n            <p>Time of first goal markets are based upon official AFL clock.</p>\n            <p>For all Futures markets that are determined by an outright winner, the Dead Heat rule shall apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Gameplay specifics</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Scoring à Points = Goals (scores 6 points) + Behinds (score 1 point)</p>\n            <p>Like many other codes of football, the way to score points is to score goals. In Australian Football, there are two types of scores: a goal and a behind.</p>\n            <p>A goal umpire judges whether a goal or behind is scored.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game length</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>The length of a game of Australian Football can vary from league to league, but is generally around 15 to 25 minutes per quarter. In the AFL, each quarter runs for 20 minutes plus time on – which makes up for time occupied in stoppages, such as when the ball going out of bounds, injuries, goals (or behinds) being kicked, or when the umpire is setting the angle of a free kick on goal. Time is kept by two off-field officials, known as \"timekeepers\", who sound the siren at the start and end of each quarter. A typical AFL quarter might run from 27 to 33 minutes, but may be even longer if, for instance, injuries cause delays. AFL breaks after the first and third quarters are six minutes, with a 20-minute break at halftime.[5] Thus, a match with quarters averaging 30 minutes would last about two and a half hours.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>1st Quarter / 2nd Quarter / 3rd Quarter / 4th Quarter</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>Bets settled on 1st/2nd/3rd/4th – Quarter Result final result only.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned at any time those Quarter markets that are already determined will stand.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>1st Half / 2nd Half</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>Bets settled on the first/second half result only.</p>\n            <p>Bets will be void if the match is abandoned before half time.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during the second half all first half bets are still valid.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Outright</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>As stated in the AFL regulations above and overall Outright settlement – bets are declared valid for settlement as stated on official final league position.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>First / Last to Score</strong>\n            </p>\n            <ul class=\"next_markets_ul\">\n                <li>Points – first / last to score any kind of point – goal or behind;</li>\n                <li>Goals – first / last to score Goal;</li>\n                <li>Behinds – first / last to score Behind;</li>\n            </ul>\n            <br>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Total Points / Goals / Behinds</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>Predict how many Points (combined between Goals & Behinds), Goals or Behinds (counted as separate scoring) – will be scored during the match. </p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Winning Margin</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>Predict the Team to win the Match and the victory margin.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Race To (Points / Goals / Behinds)</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>Predict the Team to reach first to selected number of Points, Goals or Behinds during the match.</p>\n\n        </div>\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2. Last updated: 2 October 2017</p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26223,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28215,"LinkTitle":"Aussie Rules","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26224","Code":"resp-br-bandy","Content":"<!-- EN Bandy -->\n<div id=\"bandy\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-39\"></span>Bandy</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled time for bets to have action. An exception is made if incorrect start time is announced on our website. Abandoned or postponed matches are void, unless rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. If a match venue is changed, then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such.</p>\n        <p>If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n        <p>If scheduled playing time is changed from 2 halves x 45 minutes, to 3 periods x 30 minutes, full time bets will be considered valid and half time bets will be void. </p>\n        <p>All markets are based on the result at the end of the regular time – excluding overtime, if played, unless otherwise stated. </p>\n        <p>If a market is offered as 2Way and happens to finish in a draw, Push rules apply. </p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the league/tournament. Bets will be settled according to the final standings, including playoffs (if played), unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1x2</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the outcome of the game. There are 3 possible results:</p>\n            <p>1 – Home team wins</p>\n            <p>X – Draw</p>\n            <p>2 – Away team wins</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the game, applying the given handicap (spread) to the result.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether the total goals scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26224,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28216,"LinkTitle":"Bandy","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26225","Code":"resp-br-baseball","Content":"<!-- EN Baseball -->\n<div id=\"baseball\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-7\"></span>Baseball</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action. If a game does not start on the scheduled start date then all bets will be void. The exception is if we advertise an incorrect start time.</p>\n        <p>If a game is suspended and completed on a subsequent day then all bets will be considered void (unless otherwise stated in these rules).</p>\n        <p>An exception is made for games in which a Mercy Rule is used: the result at the time of the Mercy Rule call will be used for settlement purposes.</p>\n        <p>All bets include extra innings unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        <p>There must be at least 5 full innings of play unless the home team is leading after 4½ innings, for bets on Money Line to have action. If a game is called or suspended, the winner is determined by the score after the last full inning unless the home team scores to tie, or takes the lead in the bottom half of the inning, in which case the winner is determined by the score at the time the game is called. Monies will be refunded if the home team ties the game and it is then suspended. suspended games will not carry over to the following day.</p>\n        <p>The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets on Over/Under or Run line to have action with the exception of when a result has already been determined.</p>\n        <p>For 7 innings games the game must go at least 7 full innings (or 6½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets on Over/Under or Run line to have action unless specified otherwise.</p>\n        <p>In 2-way markets push rules apply unless otherwise stated below. Stakes on single bets are returned, and in multiples/parlays the selection is treated as a non-runner.</p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed then bets placed based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Live-Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets are action regardless of pitching changes. Extra innings count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">MLB wagers</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If one or both of the starting pitchers are not exactly as specified at the time of the bet, the wager will be deemed \"no action\".</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Money line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will win the game.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Run line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Win/loss is determined by the number of runs accumulated by both teams and then comparing with the run line given before the game start.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Run line -1.5</strong>\n                <br>You win if your team wins the game with a run difference of two or more.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Run line +1.5</strong>\n                <br>You win if your team wins or losing with in exactly a one run difference.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">O/U / Totals / 2W Total Line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total runs achieved in a match.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Over 9.5</strong>\n                <br>Your bet wins if there are more than 9 runs in the match otherwise your stake is lost.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Under 9.5</strong>\n                <br>Your bets wins if there are less than 10 runs in the match otherwise your stake is lost.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Under 9</strong>\n                <br>Your bets wins if there are less than 9 runs in the match.\n                <br>If there are 9 runs exactly the stake is returned otherwise your stake is lost.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Over 9</strong>\n                <br>Your bet wins if there are more than 9 runs in the match.\n                <br>If there are 9 runs exactly the stake is returned otherwise your stake is lost.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st Half (5 innings)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets on baseball first half will be determined by the score at the end of five full innings.</p>\n            <p>The game must go at least 5 full innings for bets to have action.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated runs in a game will add up to an odd or even number.</p>\n            <p>The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets to have action.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Series betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are void if the statutory number of games (according to the respective governing Organizations) are not completed or changed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st To 3 Runs</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the first to score 3 runs.</p>\n            <p>If neither team scored 3 runs bets on 1st To 3 Runs will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st / Last Home Run</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>First/Last home run means betting on which team will score the first / last home run.\n            </p>\n            <p>If an Event is finished without any home run being scored then all wagers on First/Last home run will be void.</p>\n            <p>If an Event is abandoned after home run scored then all bets on First home run will stand while bets on Last home run will be void. If an Event is abandoned without any home run being scored then all wagers on First/Last home run will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Runs</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total Team Runs is similar to Over/Under Wager. Win/loss is determined by the number of runs accumulated by a named team.</p>\n            <p>The game must go at least 9 full innings (or 8½ innings if the home team is ahead) for bets to have action.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st Inning Winner (pre-match) and 1-9 inning money-line 3way (live)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner at the end of the first inning. Bets can be made by either selecting a Home Win, a Draw or an Away Win.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st Inning Run Line (pre-match) and 1-9 inning line-handicap (live)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bet type to predict the winner at the end of the first inning which includes preset advantage.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st inning O/U (pre-match) and 1-9 inning line-totals (live)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the number of total runs accumulated by both teams at the end of the 1st inning.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st inning O/E</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the total runs accumulated by both teams will be odd or even.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Team with highest inning</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Which team will score most runs in an inning. Push rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total 3/5/7 Innings</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the number of total runs accumulated by both teams after 3/5/7 Innings.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">3W Run Line and 3W Handicap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner with preset game advantage. There are 3 possible outcomes that include the preset game advantage – Home win, Draw and Away Win.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">3W Total</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the total runs accumulated by both teams will be Over, Under or Exactly preset number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Margin</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team and with how many runs exactly will win from given options.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team O/E</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the number of runs accumulated by the relevant team will be odd or even.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Result / HTFT</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of a match at half time(after 5 Innings) and fulltime(after 9 innings). Example: If you chose 1/X, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the match ending in draw. Extra Innings do not count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Qualify</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification/win the cup bets will be void for.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on final league position include play offs.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26225,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28217,"LinkTitle":"Baseball","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26227","Code":"resp-br-basketball","Content":"<!-- EN Basketball -->\n<div id=\"basketball\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-2\"></span>Basketball</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action. An exception is made if incorrect start time is announced on our website.</p>\n        <p>If a game venue is changed, bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n        <p>All bets on a game include overtime unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        <p>In 2-way markets push rules apply unless otherwise stated below. Stakes on single bets are returned, and in multiples/parlays the selection is treated as a non-runner.</p>\n        <p>48-minute games must go at least 43 minutes of play and 40-minute games must go at least 35 minutes of play in order for full time bets to take actions.</p>\n        <p> If a game is suspended after the minimum time has been played and not resumed the same day, then regardless of whether the game is completed at a later date, the score when the game is halted will determine the betting results.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">3x3, Streetball, Big3</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>For 3x3, Streetball and Big3 variations of this sport, settlement is based on official competition rules. When a match starts but is not completed, bets are void unless the specific market outcome is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Money Line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the winner.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the winner, applying the given spread to the score.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the points scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half markets (Money Line, Spread, Over/Under, Total Team Points, Total Odd/Even and Total Team Odd/Even) will be settled according to the result of the first half only. If the game is abandoned before half time, all 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half bets will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half markets (Money Line, Spread, Over/Under, Total Team Points, Total Odd/Even and Total Team Odd/Even) will be settled according to the result of the second half including overtime if played. If the game is abandoned bets will be void. An exception is made if there are 5 or less minutes of scheduled playing time remaining. In this case bets will be settled according to the result at the time of abandonment.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup>/2\n                <sup>nd</sup>/3\n                <sup>rd</sup>/4\n                <sup>th</sup> Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All Quarter markets (Money Line, Spread, Over/Under, Total Team Points, Total Odd/Even and Total Team Odd/Even, Margin of Victory) will be settled according to the result of the relevant quarter. The 4\n                <sup>th</sup> quarter result includes overtime if played. Quarters must be finished in order for bets on them to be settled. If the game is abandoned during the scheduled playing time, bets on the running and following quarters will be void. Example:</p>\n            <p>If the game is abandoned in the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Quarter, bets on the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Quarter will be settled, the rest (2\n                <sup>nd</sup>/3\n                <sup>rd</sup>/4\n                <sup>th</sup> Quarter) will be void.</p>\n            <p>If the game is abandoned in the 4\n                <sup>th</sup> Quarter (even if there are less than 5 min of scheduled playing time left), bets on it will be void. Bets on 1\n                <sup>st</sup>/2\n                <sup>nd</sup>/3\n                <sup>rd</sup> Quarter will be settled.</p>\n            <p>If the game is abandoned in overtime, all Quarter bets will be settled. 4\n                <sup>th</sup> Quarter bets will be settled according to the4th quarter result, adding any points scored in overtime up to the time of abandonment.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will score more or less points than a given number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the points scored by both teams will add up to an odd or an even number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the points scored by a certain team will add up to an odd or an even number. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Margin/Margin of Victory</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winning team and exactly by how many points this team will win by choosing from given options.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether or not the match will go into overtime. If the game is abandoned bets will be void, unless overtime has already started. If overtime is played, while the regulation time result was not tied, all bets will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Halftime/Fulltime</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of the game at half time and at the end of the game, including overtime if played. If a game is abandoned or for some reason ends in a draw and no overtime is played, bets will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Highest scoring Half/Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which half/quarter most points will be scored. This bet type includes overtime if played. Dead-heat rules apply. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race to 12/25/45 points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the first to reach 12/25/45 points. If the game is abandoned before any team reaches the quoted number of points, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner / Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets will be settled according to the final league position including Play offs and according to the official site of the event.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Qualify</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Players</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>There are several markets available for any named players: points, rebounds, assists, steals, etc.</p>\n            <p>If the relevant player doesn’t get any playing time in the match, bets on him will be void. Any stats achieved in overtime (if played) will be taken into account for settlement purposes. Win/Loss is determined by a comparison between the stats achieved by the named player and a pre-given number of stats.</p>\n            <p>A settlement will be made according to the statistics provided by the official site of the Tournament in which the game is played.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Teasers</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Teasers/Super Teasers/Monster Teasers allow adjustment of points spread and game totals on two or more teams.</p>\n            <p>A fixed number of points are bought on all selections in the teaser. The number of teams selected and the number of points selected determine the payout odds:</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>4-point Teasers:</strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -110/1.9\n                <br> Three teams = +170/2.7\n                <br> Four teams = +290/3.9\n                <br> Five teams = +450/5.5\n                <br> Six teams = +650/7.5 </p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>4.5-point Teasers:</strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -120/1.83\n                <br> Three teams = +150/2.5\n                <br> Four teams = +240/3.4\n                <br> Five teams = +400/5\n                <br> Six teams = +550/6.5 </p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>5-point Teasers:</strong>\n                <br> Two teams = -130/1.76\n                <br> Three teams = +130/2.3\n                <br> Four teams = +190/2.9\n                <br> Five teams = +350/4.5\n                <br> Six teams = +450/5.5</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>8-point Teasers (Super)</strong>\n                <br> Three teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>10-point Teasers (Monster)</strong>\n                <br> Four teams = -120/1.83 (push loses)</p>\n            <p>All selections must be successful in order for the bet to win.</p>\n            <p>If a selection in the teaser is a push, the teaser will drop to the next lower level, if a lower level is offered for that particular teaser.</p>\n            <p>A push in a two team teaser without a loss will make the entire bet lost.</p>\n            <p>When placing a bet on super/monster teaser, if there is a push result, the teaser will be lost.</p>\n            <p>Teaser bets will only be allowed on pre-match events and selected leagues, including:</p>\n            <p> 1. Regular teasers for NBA, NCAAB or any other league in which teaser bets are allowed: 4, 4½ and 5 points\n                <br> 2. SUPER TEASERS: 3 teams teaser - buying 8 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83\n                <br> 3. MONSTER TEASER: 4 teams teaser - buying 10 points, ties lose, odds-120/1.83</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 24 August 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26227,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28218,"LinkTitle":"Basketball","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26228","Code":"resp-br-boxing","Content":"<!-- EN Boxing -->\n<div id=\"boxing\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-20\"></span>Boxing</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>If the fight does not take place as scheduled and is not played in the same date (local time) all bets are void. The exception is if we advertise an incorrect kick-off time.</p>\n        <p>The bell sound is the sign for the beginning of the first round for betting purposes</p>\n        <p>When a fighter fails to answer the bell for the next round then his opponent will be deemed to have won in the previous round.</p>\n        <p>In declaration of a “No Contest” all bets will be void and stakes will be refunded, with the exception of markets where the outcome has already been determined.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets will be valid regardless of changes to number of rounds to be fought.\n                <br>Declaration of a draw - all bets will be void and stakes will be refunded. Tthis includes a fight which ends in a Majority Draw. Bets will be settled on the official result announced in the ring. Subsequent appeals/amendments do not affect settlement (unless the amendment was made due to human error when announcing the result).\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Method of Victory</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets will valid regardless of changes to number of rounds to be fought.</p>\n            <p>Draw or Technical Draw - Draw is scorecard draw. Technical Draw is if the referee stops the fight before the start of the 5th round, for any reason other than Knockout, Technical Knockout or disqualification.</p>\n            <p>Knockout - Knockout is when the boxer does not stand up after a 10 count.\n                <br>Technical Knockout is the 3 knockdown rule or if the referee steps in. Any corner retirement will be considered a technical knockout unless the fight is subsequently decided by the judges’ scorecards, or is a declared a No Contest.</p>\n            <p>Technical Decision - Decision is on scorecard points between the judges. Technical Decision is settled by the judges’ scorecards at any time other than at the end of the scheduled rounds.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Rounds</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>For settlement purposes where a half round is stated then 1 minute 30 seconds of the respective round will define the half to determine under or over.</p>\n            <p>If the number of rounds for a fight is changed after this market has been set then all bets will still have action unless the new number of rounds result in the quote being higher than the total number of rounds to be fought Half of the official time for a round will be used for O/U total round bets. For example: 90 seconds into the 7th round of a boxing fight equal 6.5 rounds</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26228,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":28219,"LinkTitle":"Boxing","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26229","Code":"resp-br-chess","Content":"<!-- EN Chess -->\n<div id=\"chess\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-65\"></span>Chess</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>In the event of a match starting but not being completed all bets will be void, unless otherwise stated in the rules. An exception is made if we advertise incorrect starting time. All bets will be settled based on the official site of the Federation governing the tournament, unless otherwise stated in the rules.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the tournament. Bets will be settled according to the final standings, including playoffs (if played), unless otherwise stated. All bets are considered valid, even if the player withdraws or doesn’t start the tournament at all. Dead-heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Moneyline</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the match according to the points collected by players based on played games. 1 point is awarded for a win, 0,5 points for a draw and 0 points for a loss. There are 3 possible outcomes:</p>\n            <p>1 – Designated home team player wins</p>\n            <p>X – Draw</p>\n            <p>2 - Designated away team player wins</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner (player who will collect most points) of the match/game, applying the given handicap (spread). If the statutory number of games/matches according to the official rules of the tournament is changed, all bets will be cancelled.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26229,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28220,"LinkTitle":"Chess","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26230","Code":"resp-br-cricket","Content":"<!-- EN Cricket -->\n<div id=\"cricket\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-59\"></span>Cricket</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.</p>\n        <p>Abandoned or postponed matches are void unless rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. An exception is made if incorrect start time is announced on our website.</p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed, then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n        <p>All wagers will be settled using the official result as declared by the relevant governing body of the match or competition concerned.</p>\n        <p>Push rules apply for all 2 way markets.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">One Day / Twenty20</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>In matches affected by adverse weather bets will be governed by the official competition rules with the following exception: if a match is decided upon either a bowl out or the toss of a coin or Super Over, then all bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned due to outside interference, then bets will be void unless a result is declared based on the official competition rules. In the event of a change of opponent from the one advertised then all bets for that match are void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Test Matches</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets will stand according to the official result provided in case at least one ball has been bowled. If a match is abandoned due to outside interference, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Money Line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Top Batsman/Top Bowler</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Player with the best batting average is considered Top Batsman. Player with the best bowling average is considered Top Bowler. Bets on players not selected in the starting 11 or designated as substitutes, will be void. If a player is selected but does not bat or field, bets on him will stand. Dead Heat rules apply. If two players or more end on an equal number of wickets, then the bowler with the least number of runs conceded will be deemed the winner. </p>\n            <p>There is a minimum number of overs that should be played before the game is interrupted, or All Out. Otherwise all bets will be void:</p>\n            <ul>\n                <li>One day International – 20 overs</li>\n                <li>All Domestic 40 Over Competitions – 10 overs</li>\n                <li>All Domestic 50 Over Competitions – 20 overs</li>\n                <li>All Twenty20 Cup – 6 overs</li>\n            </ul>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Man Of The Match</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are settled on the officially declared man of the match. Dead Heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win The Toss</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will win the coin toss at the beginning of the game. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Highest Opening Partnership</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will score more runs on their 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Partnership. Bets stand once 1 ball has been bowled in each team’s 1\n                <sup>st</sup> innings. If a market is offered in a 2-way option, Dead Heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Most Match Sixes</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will score most Sixes in the game. If a match is abandoned before needed Overs for different types of Matches have been reached, all bets will be void. In Test and County Championship matches the whole match counts. In Test drawn games a minimum of 200 overs must be bowled, otherwise bets will be void. In Twenty20 matches the match must be scheduled for the full 20 overs and there must be an official result. In One Day matches where the number of overs has been reduced and the outcome has not been determined yet bets will be void. For settlement purposes this is all deliveries from which a batsman is credited with exactly six runs (including All-run/Overthrows). In matches decided by a Super Over, sixes hit during the Super Over will not count for settlement purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Wicket Method</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the method by which the 1st Wicket in the game will be scored. If the game is abandoned before a wicket is scored or there is no wicket scored at all in the match, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">A Fifty/Hundred Score In Match</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if any player will score fifty/hundred or more runs in the match. For different types of games there is a certain minimum of Overs to be played or bets on this bet type will be void:</p>\n            <ul>\n                <li>Test Matches - The whole game counts. If the game is drawn, at least 200 overs must be bowled</li>\n                <li>One Day Matches – 40 overs must be bowled</li>\n                <li>Twenty20 Matches – 20 overs must be bowled</li>\n            </ul>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Most Run Outs</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will create most run-outs whilst fielding. If a match is abandoned, all bets will be void. If a match is reduced in overs and a match result is reached, then the team which achieved most run-outs whilst fielding regardless of the amount of overs bowled will be the winner. In matches determined by a Super Over any run out during the Super Over will not count for settlement purposes. In Test Matches all innings of the match will count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Over Total Runs</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total runs scored during the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> innings of the match. Extras and penalty runs will be included. If 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Over is not completed, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Runs At Fall Of 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Wicket</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the number of runs in the game at which 1st Wicket will fall. If a match is abandoned before the fall of 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Wicket, or there is no Wicket in the game, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Dismissal Method</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the method by which the first/next Batsman will be taken out. If there are no Wickets in the game as a whole or after the bet has been placed in Live Betting, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the sum of all runs scored in the relevant period (Match, Innings, Over) will be an odd or an even number. Extras and Penalty runs will be included for settlement purposes. If the relevant period is not finished, all bets on it will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Runs O/U</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the number of runs in the relevant period (Innings, Over) will be over or under a given number. If the relevant period is not finished, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race To 10 Runs</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will score first 10 Runs in the game. Bets stand if all the listed players start batting, otherwise all bets will be void. Bets stand no matter which of the players starts batting first. If neither of the listed players reaches 10 Runs, option Neither is the winner. If a game is abandoned before any of the listed players reaches 10 Runs, and if both players are Out, option Neither will be the winner. Otherwise, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Match Sixes</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if Sixes scored in the match will be over or under a given number. Push Rules apply. If a match is abandoned before needed Overs for different types of matches have been reached, all bets will be void. In Test and County Championship matches, the whole match counts. In drawn games a minimum of 200 overs must be bowled, otherwise bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>In Twenty20 matches the match must be scheduled for the full 20 overs and there must be an official result. </p>\n            <p>In One Day matches where the number of overs has been reduced and the outcome has not been determined yet bets will be void. For settlement purposes this is all deliveries from which a batsman is credited with exactly six runs (including All-run/Overthrows). In matches decided by a Super-Over, sixes hit during the Super-Over will not count for settlement purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Team With Highest 1\n                <sup>st</sup> 6/10/15 Overs Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will have the higher score after 1\n                <sup>st</sup> 6/10/15 Overs. Push Rules apply. If either team do not complete number of overs stated, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Batsman Matches</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which Batsman will score more runs in the game. Push Rules apply. In Test and County Championship matches only the first innings counts for settlement purposes. Bets will stand if each Batsman has faced at least one ball.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the league. Bets are settled on the final league position, unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win Pool</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the team which will finish top at their Pool. Dead Heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Finalists</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the two teams which will play in the Final of the Tournament.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Stage Of Elimination</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict at which stage of the Tournament a certain team will be eliminated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Reach The Final</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will reach the Final of the Tournament.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26230,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28221,"LinkTitle":"Cricket","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_26233","Code":"resp-br-darts","Content":"<!-- EN Darts -->\n<div id=\"darts\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-15\"></span>Darts</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.
