EN E-Sports -->\n<div id=\"e-sports\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-64\"></span>E-Sports</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>Settlement is made on the official result as declared by the relevant governing body of the specified competition. </p>\n        <p>If a match is not played or is postponed, bets on it will be void, unless it is played within 48 hours of the originally scheduled start time or new event will be opened for betting if necessary.</p>\n        <p>If a player/team plays with a misspelled nickname or with a smurf account, the result and the bets are still valid, unless it is clear that this is not the player/team that was supposed to play that match. </p>\n        <p>If a player/team is given a walkover for at least one game/map/round before the match starts, all bets will be void.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner Full Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player/team will win the match (map/round if specified in the title). If a match, game or map begins, but it is not completed, all bets will be void. An exception is made when player gets disqualified, in which case player/team awarded the victory according to an official source for the competition will be settled as a winner. If scheduled number of rounds/maps is changed, bets on Winner are still considered valid.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread & Over/Under Full Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Spread is a way of making odds more competitive by giving the outsider an advantage. </p>\n            <p>Spread markets are determined based on the league in which they are played. In Starcraft and Dota these are maps, in Counter Strike these are rounds, etc. The settlement is based on the final score (maps/rounds won by each team) with the given handicap (spread) being added.</p>\n            <p>Over/Under, or total betting, is a prediction whether over or under stated number of games/maps/rounds will be needed to decide the winner.</p>\n            <p>If the match is not completed for any reason or scheduled number of maps/rounds is changed after this market has been offered, bets on Spread and Over/Under will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Live</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If a match is replayed due to a draw or a disconnection, all bets will be void. The replayed match will be considered as a separate live event.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":26236,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28223,"LinkTitle":"E-Sports","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_27577","Code":"resp-br-football","Content":"<!-- EN Football -->\n<div id=\"football\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-1\"></span>Football</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All match markets are based on the result at the end of the regular time. This includes any added injury or stoppage time but does not include extra time, time allocated for a penalty shootout or a golden goal. </p>\n        <p>Video Assistance Referee (VAR) will be taken into account. Decisions made after a significant event occurs may result in confirmed bets being voided. Bets voided will be from the time of the significant event until the time the final VAR decision was officially announced.</p>\n        <p>An exception is made when this rule relates to friendly matches. In such cases, all match markets are settled based on the actual result at the end of the game (excluding any extra time), irrespective of whether the full 90 minutes is played. </p>\n        <p>Some Soccer matches may have different playing schedules. In that case the following will apply:</p>\n        <p>90 minutes scheduled play (3 x 30 minutes). Full-time bets are still considered valid. Half-time bets are considered void.</p>\n        <p>80 minutes scheduled play (2 x 40 minutes). All bets are still considered valid.</p>\n        <p>Should any match be played prior to the date or kick-off time denoted then bets will stand provided the wager is placed not later than the revised kick-off time. </p>\n        <p>All bets on a match abandoned before the completion of the regular time will be void unless the match is rearranged and played on the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules, except for bets on any markets that have been unconditionally determined.</p>\n        <p>If the game does not take place as scheduled and is not played on the same date (local time) all bets are void. An exception is made if incorrect kick-off time is announced on our website.</p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed then bets based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n        <p>Bets will stand if we list a team name without specifying the term 'XI' in the name.</p>\n        <p>In the absence of an official source, or when significant conflicting evidence is present, bets will be settled based on our own statistics.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Extra Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets are settled on the official statistics for the extra time period only. Any goals, corners, etc. that were taken or scored during the regulation time do not count. Extra time does not include a Penalty shootout.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Penalties Shootout</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>For handicap betting, all penalties taken in the shootout are counted, including sudden death (the additional penalties after the first 10 penalties).</p>\n            <p>In over/under betting, the result includes only converted penalty kicks from the standard ten penalties in the shootout and does not include sudden death. If the match does not go to a penalty shootout all bets are void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Next minute markets</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Each market refers to a specific 1 or 5 minute period in the match. It is split into minutes and seconds and it is displayed as part of the market title. 00:59 seconds counts as the first minute, 01:59 counts as the second minute, and so on. </p>\n            <p>Injury time does not count. For example: </p>\n            <p>The 5 minute period 40:00-44:59 refers to the first half only and does not include first half injury time.\n                <br> The 5 minute period 45:00-49:59 refers to the start of the second half only and does not include first half injury time.\n                <br> The 5 minute period 85:00-89:59 refers to the second half only and does not include second half injury time.</p>\n            <p>A settlement will be made based on data from the TV broadcaster covering the match, or if not available - based on the official website of the competition, or if not available – based on data transmitted by our data providers.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during any of these minute markets, all bets placed will be void if the time of the bet period was not completed. Bets in which the time of the bet period was completed will be settled and not declared void. </p>\n            <p>If a specified minute period is not completed, all bets will be void unless a winning market has already been established prior to the stoppage in play. All disallowed or cancelled goals, corner kicks, cards, penalties, free kicks, goal kicks and throw-ins will not count. </p>\n            <p>Goal will be settled on the time the goal is scored.</p>\n            <ul>\n                <li>Corner is considered to have happened when it is AWARDED (not when it is taken).</li>\n                <li>Cards - both yellow and red cards count. Only cards shown to players on the playing field count. A card is considered to have happened when it is shown.</li>\n                <li>Penalty is considered to have happened when it is AWARDED (not when it is taken).</li>\n                <li>Free kick is considered to have happened when it is AWARDED (not when it is taken).</li>\n                <li>Goal kick is considered to have happened when it is AWARDED (not when it is taken).</li>\n                <li>Throw in is considered to have happened when it is AWARDED (not when it is taken).</li>\n            </ul>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1X2</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets can be placed by either selecting a Home Win, a Draw or an Away Win. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n            <p> 1 - Home Win\n                <br> X - Draw\n                <br> 2 - Away Win</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Asians</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>The Asian Line is a special type of handicap used for Soccer matches. Depending on the strength of each team, a handicap is issued for the game. This enables the odds for each side to be more similar, allowing more competitive betting opportunities. All bets on the Asian Handicap in live betting (including 1\n                <sup>st</sup>/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half bets) are settled according to the score line. Any goals prior to the bet being placed are ignored for settlement purposes. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n            <table class=\"help-table\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>Asian Handicap</span>\n                        </th>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>What it means</span>\n                        </th>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>0</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match. If there's a draw (0 goals difference), your stake is refunded.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>0.25</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match. If there's a draw, your bet is split in half: one half is considered a win, the other half is considered a draw and its stakes are refunded.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>0.5</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team draws or wins the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>0.75</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins or draws the match. If it loses with a one goal difference, you lose half of the stake.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>1</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins or draws the match. If it loses with a goal difference of one, your stake is refunded.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>-0.25</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match. If it draws you lose half of the stake.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>-0.5</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>-0.75</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more. If it wins with one goal your bet is split in half: one half is considered a win, the other half is considered a draw and its stakes are refunded.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>-1</td>\n                        <td>You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more. If it wins with a goal difference of one, your stake is refunded.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n            <br>\n\n            <p>Live betting example:</p>\n            <p>Juventus vs Man United - Live score 1:0</p>\n            <table class=\"help-table\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>Team</span>\n                        </th>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>Asian Handicap</span>\n                        </th>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>Odds</span>\n                        </th>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Juventus</td>\n                        <td class=\"tdasian\">-0.75</td>\n                        <td>1.80</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Manchester</td>\n                        <td class=\"tdasian\">+0.75</td>\n                        <td>2.15</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n            <br>\n            <p> Final score 3:0\n                <br>If you bet on Juventus €100, your net win is €80\n                <br>\n                <br>\n                <br>Final score 2:0, 3:1\n                <br>If you bet on Juventus €100, your net win €40\n                <br>\n                <br>\n                <br>Final score 1:0, 1:1, 1:2, 1:3,2:1, 2:2, 3:2, 3:3\n                <br>If you bet on Man. United €100, your net win is €115\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals scored in a match. Goals are considered regardless of whether they are scored before or after the bets are placed (unlike Asians, where the result before the bet has been placed is ignored). If a game is abandoned, bets will be void unless settlement is already unconditionally determined.</p>\n            <table class=\"help-table\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>Over/Under</span>\n                        </th>\n                        <th>\n                            <span>What it means</span>\n                        </th>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Under 2</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there is either 0 or 1 goal scored in the match. If there are two goals exactly, the stake is returned. Bets lose if there are three or more goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Under 2.25</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there is either 0 or 1 goal scored in the match. If there are two goals exactly, half the stake will win and half will be returned. Bets lose if there are three or more goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Under 2.5</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match. Bets lose if there are three or more goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Under 2.75</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match. If there are three goals exactly, half the stake will be returned and half will be lost. Bets lose if there are four or more goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Over 2</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are three or more goals scored in the match. If there are two goals exactly, the stake is returned. Bets lose if there is 0 or 1 goal scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Over 2.25</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are three or more goals scored in the match. If there are two goals exactly, half the stake will be returned and half will be lost. Bets lose if there is 0 or 1 goal scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Over 2.5</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are three or more goals scored in the match. Bets lose if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>Over 2.75</td>\n                        <td>Bets win if there are four or more goals scored in the match. If there are three goals exactly, half the stake will win and half will be returned. Bets lose if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match.</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n            <br>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Goals/Total Goals 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals scored in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half by both teams. If an event is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless the outcome of the placed bet has already been determined.</p>\n            <p>Over 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if there are 3 or more goals in the match/ 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half </p>\n            <p>Under 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if there are 2 goals or less in the match/ 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Goals/1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Total Team Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals scored by a certain team in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half. Own goals count to the team credited with the goal. If an event is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless the outcome of the placed bet has already been determined.</p>\n            <p>For example:</p>\n            <p>Over 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team scores 3 or more goals in the match/ 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half </p>\n            <p>Under 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team scores 2 goals or less in the match/ 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half: 1X2, Asians and Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets will be settled on the first half result only. If a match is abandoned before half time, the bet will be void, unless the markets were unconditionally determined. If a match is abandoned during the second half then all first half bets are still valid.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half: 1X2, Asians and Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets will be settled on the second half result only. If a match is abandoned then all bets will be void, unless the markets were unconditionally determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1X2 Up to 30\n                <sup>th</sup> Min, Asians and Over/Under Up to 30\n                <sup>th</sup> Min</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets will be settled based on the score by the end of the 30-th min (29:59). If a match is abandoned before the 30\n                <sup>th</sup> min, bets will be void, except O/U bets which have already been determined. If a match is abandoned after the 30\n                <sup>th</sup> min, all bets will stand.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1X2 Up to 70\n                <sup>th</sup> Min, Asians and Over/Under Up to 70\n                <sup>th</sup> Min</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets will be settled based on the score by the end of the 70-th min (69:59). If a match is abandoned before the 70\n                <sup>th</sup> min, bets will be void, except O/U bets which have already been determined. If a match is abandoned after the 70\n                <sup>th</sup> min, all bets will stand.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Draw no bet</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the winner. In case of a draw, all bets will be void. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Chance</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A Double Chance market allows you to cover two of the three possible outcomes in a game with one bet. There is also Double Chance 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half market, which is settled according to the result of the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half only.</p>\n            <p>The following options are available:</p>\n            <p>1 or X - if the result is either a home win or a draw then bets on this option are winners.\n                <br> X or 2 - if the result is either a draw or an away win then bets on this option are winners.\n                <br> 1 or 2 - if the result is either a home win or an away win then bets on this option are winners.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Exact Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the exact score of the match by choosing from given results. There is another variation of this market available: Exact score 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half – you have to predict the score of the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Multi-Bet Exact Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the final score of the game by choosing from given options. Every option includes several results. You win if the final score is the same as any of the results featured in the option you have bet on.</p>\n            <p>Otherwise you lose. For example:</p>\n            <p>You have bet on line: 1:0, 2:0, 3:0.\n                <br> If the final score is either 1:0 or 2:0 or 3:0, you will win. If any other result occurs, your bet will be lost.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Halftime/Fulltime</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of a match at halftime and at the end of regular time. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Example: If you chose 1/X, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the match to end in a draw. Extra time and penalty shootouts do not count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both Teams to Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether both teams will score at least one goal in the game. Own goals count towards the team credited with the goal. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void, unless the outcome of these bets is already determined.</p>\n            <p>Yes” – meaning that both teams will score.</p>\n            <p>“No” – meaning that either team will not score.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both To Score No Draw</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\"Yes\" selection wins if:\n                <br>Both Teams score and the event finishes with a winner (example: 2-1).</p>\n            <p>\"No\" selections wins if:\n                <br> Either only one Team scores or Both Teams score but the event finishes in a draw (example: 1-0 / 1-1 / 2-2...).\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both Teams To Score In Both Halves</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Yes\" selection wins if:\n                <br>Both Teams score in both halves.</p>\n            <p>\"No\" selections wins if:\n                <br>If both teams score but not in both halves or if neither team scores at all.\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Team To Score First & Win / Draw / Lose</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Winning selection is the one that fully accomplishes the combination of which team will score first and either win, draw or lose afterwards.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">3 Way Handicap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>In a 3W Handicap, the line is set so that there can also be a draw outcome, giving you 3 potential bets. Bets are settled according to the final result. There is another option of this market: 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half 3 W Handicap, which is settled according to the result of 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half only. </p>\n            <p>For example:</p>\n            <p> Handicap (-2) - You will win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of three or more.\n                <br> Tie (-2) - You will win if the team with (-2) Handicap wins the match with exactly 2 goals difference.\n                <br> Handicap (+2) - You will win if your team wins/draws or loses by 1 goal.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First to Score/Last to Score/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Goal/3\n                <sup>rd</sup> Goal/4\n                <sup>th</sup> Goal….</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will score the first/2\n                <sup>nd</sup>/3\n                <sup>rd</sup>/4\n                <sup>th</sup>/…./last goal in the match. Own goals count towards the team credited with the goal. If a game is abandoned all bets will be void, unless the outcome of a bet is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Margin</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the team to win the match and the victory margin. For example in a match Team A vs Team B:</p>\n            <p>Bet on Team A to win by 2 or more goals wins if the result is 2:0, 3:0, 3:1, 4:0, 4:1, 4:2, etc.</p>\n            <p>Bet on Team A to win by 1 goal wins if the result is 1:0, 2:1, 3:2, etc.</p>\n            <p>Bet on Score Draw wins in case of any draw results with the exception of 0:0, i.e. 1:1, 2:2, 3:3, etc.</p>\n            <p>Bet on No score draw wins only if the result is 0:0.</p>\n            <p>Bet on Team B to win by 2 or more goals wins if the result is 0:2, 0:3, 1:3, 0:4, 1:4, 2:4, etc.</p>\n            <p>Bet on Team B to win by 1 goal wins if the result is 0:1, 1:2, 2:3, etc.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if accumulated goals by both teams will add up to an odd or even number. When no goals are scored, it is considered as\n                <strong>Even</strong> for settlement purposes. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void, unless an outcome is already determined. There are several variations of this market:</p>\n            <p>Odd/Even – bets on it are settled according to Full time score</p>\n            <p>1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Odd/Even – bets on it are settled according to the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half result only</p>\n            <p>2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half Odd/Even – bets on it are settled according to the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half result only</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Teams Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if accumulated goals by a certain team will add up to an odd or even number. If this team has 0 goals, it is considered as\n                <strong>Even</strong> for settlement purposes. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void, unless an outcome is already determined. There are several variations of this market:</p>\n            <p>Teams Odd/Even - bets are settled according to the goals scored by the named team for the Full time</p>\n            <p>1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Teams Odd/Even – bets are settled according to the goals scored by the named team for the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half</p>\n            <p>2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half Teams Odd/Even - bets are settled according to the goals scored by the named team for the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Goalscorer</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a player will score first/last/anytime goal in the match. Own goals are ignored for settlement purposes. If an own goal is scored, the previous or the next goal (if there are any) will be taken into consideration. If only own goals are scored in the match, it will be considered as No Goalscorer result for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>Bets on players not taking part in the match will be void. For First Goalscorer, bets on players coming on as substitutes after the first goal has already been scored will also be declared void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after the first goal has already been scored, all winning bets on First Goalscorer and on Anytime Goalscorer (bets on players who have already scored) will stand, all other bets on Goalscorer market will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned before a first goal is scored, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Goalscorer Premier</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Betting options available on this market are:</p>\n            <p>First or Last Goalscorer – Predict if a certain player will score either first or last goal in the match</p>\n            <p>2 or more – Predict if a certain player will score 2 or more goals in the match</p>\n            <p>3 or more - Predict if a certain player will score 3 or more goals in the match </p>\n            <p>Own goals are ignored for settlement purposes. If an own goal is scored, the previous or the next goal (if there are any) will be taken into consideration. Bets on players not taking part in the match will be void. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned, bets on this market will be void with the exception of any bets that have an already determined outcome.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Team Goalscorer</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player of a certain team will score the most goals in a League/Tournament.</p>\n            <p>Goals scored both in regular and extra time count. Penalty shootout goals do not count. In case two or more players score the same amount of goals, dead-heat rules apply. If there aren’t any goals scored by the named team, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Top Goalscorer</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Players who are nominated to play for their teams are considered VALID bets regardless of whether they are sidelined or injured during the tournament. In case a player is transferred to a different club within the same league, goals scored prior to the move will be counted. If a player is transferred to a club in another league, goals scored prior to the transfer cannot be brought over to his/her new league. All bets will stand in case of any of the above-mentioned scenario, unless otherwise stated: </p>\n            <p>Own goals will be ignored.</p>\n            <p>Only League goals scored are counted.</p>\n            <p>Goals scored in playoff matches are not counted. </p>\n            <p>If two or more players score the same amount of goals, dead-heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Teams to score in 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half/Both halves</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a team will score at least one goal in 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half/Both halves. Own goals count to the team credited with the goal for settlement purposes.</p>\n            <p>If an event is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless the outcome of the placed bet has already been determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Teams Clean Sheet</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Clean sheet means that a team will finish the game without conceding a goal. Own goals are valid for settlement purposes. If a game is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless settlement is already unconditionally determined. </p>\n            <p>For example:</p>\n            <p>Team Clean sheet team A “Yes” – in order for the bet to be settled as a winner team A should not concede any goal (including an own goal) in the game. If it does, the bet is lost.</p>\n            <p>Team Clean sheet Team A “No” – in order for the bet to be settled as a winner team A should concede a goal (an own goal counts as well) in the game. If it doesn’t, the bet is lost.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Head 2 Head</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If one or more contestants fail to start the tournament, all bets are considered void. If both teams reach the same stage, dead-heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Goals Min</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total Goals Min is the sum of the minutes of all goals scored in the regular time of the game. Goal times are recorded as the full minute according to the official source. Any goal scored in the added time of the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half will be recorded as the 45\n                <sup>th</sup> minute. Any goal scored in the added time of the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half will be recorded as the 90\n                <sup>th</sup> minute. As soon as a game kicks off it will be deemed to be in the first minute. So for example a goal scored after 24 minutes and 16 seconds will be settled as scored in the 25\n                <sup>th</sup> minute.</p>\n            <p>Win/Loss is determined by comparing Total Goals Min with preset number. If a game is abandoned, bets on this market will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">OU & Goal Crazy/Goal Crazy/1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Goal Crazy</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are settled on the total number of goals scored by both teams in the match - Goal Crazy, or for the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half - 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Goal Crazy. If an event is abandoned during the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half, all bets on this market will be void. If an event is abandoned after the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half is completed, bets on 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Goal Crazy will stand and bets on Goal Crazy will be void. Example: </p>\n            <p> If you pick 2-3, you win if 2 or 3 goals are scored in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half. Otherwise your bet is lost.\n                <br> If you pick 3+, you win if 3 or more goals are scored in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half. Otherwise your bet is lost.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Half with Most Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which half most goals will be scored. Bets will be void if the match is abandoned.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Number of Goals/Number of Goals 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the exact number of goals scored in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half by both teams. If an event is abandoned during the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half, all bets on this market will be void. If an event is abandoned after the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half is completed, bets on Number of Goals 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half will stand and bets on Number of Goals will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Number of Team Goals/Number of Team Goals 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the exact number of goals scored by a named team in the match/1\n                <sup>st</sup> half. Own goals count to the team credited with the goal. If an event is abandoned after the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half is completed, bets on Number of Team goals 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half will stand and bets on Number of Team Goals will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First Half/Second Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of first and second half separately. If a match is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Example: To win a bet on '1/X’, the home team must win the first half and the result of the second half should be a draw. Extra time and a penalty shootout do not count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1X2 rest of the match</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All bets are determined without taking into consideration the current result at the time the bet is being placed – as if the game was starting again from 0:0 score after the bet had been placed. If a match is abandoned, all bets are void.</p>\n            <p>Example: Current result is 1-0 and final result is 1-1. The result for the bet settlement is 0-1:</p>\n            <p> 1 - Bets on Home Team are lost\n                <br> X - Bets on Draw are lost\n                <br> 2 - Bets on Away Team are winners.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Penalty</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Penalty is similar to Over/Under Wager. Win/loss is determined by the number of penalties accumulated by both teams. If a match is abandoned, bets will be void, unless the outcome of a bet is already determined.</p>\n            <p>If a penalty is awarded, but not taken (referee changes his decision, the game is abandoned before the penalty is taken), this penalty will be ignored for settlement purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Win to Nil</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will win the game, without conceding a goal.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Win Either Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will win at least one half of the game – no matter 1\n                <sup>st</sup> or 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Own Goal</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if there will be an own goal scored in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Win From Behind</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will be down by one or more goals during any time of the match, but will eventually win the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Score/Miss a Penalty</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a certain team will score or miss a penalty during the game. Penalties that were cancelled by the referee will be ignored.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Added Time in 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Added Time is similar to Over/Under wagers. Win/loss is determined by the Added Time officially announced by the referee, not by the actual time played. If a game is abandoned in the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half, all bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a game is abandoned in the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> half, Added Time in 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half bets will be settled, Added Time in 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>For example: If the referee shows 1 min added time and 2 min are played, bets will be settled as 1 min added time.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> Goal Period</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict when the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> goal of the game will be scored by choosing from given time periods. Own goals will count for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>Betting periods at the end of either half include any injury/stoppage time added on by the match official at the end of normal time. Extra time does not count.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after the first goal is scored all bets will stand. If a match is abandoned before the first goal is scored, or a game finishes without any goals being scored, all bets will be void. As soon as a game kicks off it will be deemed to be in the first minute. So for example a goal scored after 24 minutes and 16 seconds will be settled as scored in the 25\n                <sup>th</sup> minute.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Goal up to 30\n                <sup>th</sup> Min</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if there will be a goal scored before the 30\n                <sup>th</sup> Min (29:59) of the game. If a game is abandoned before the 30\n                <sup>th</sup> Min, bets will be void, unless a goal has already been scored in the game. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Goal Scored 1-15Min, 16-30Min, 31-Half Time, Starting 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half-60Min, 61-75Min, 76-Full Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bet on whether a goal will be scored in the named periods. If the match is abandoned, bets on the periods before the time of abandonment still stand, while all bets on periods after that time will be cancelled. Bets on the period which includes the minute the game was stopped, will be settled in case there is a goal already scored in the named period. Otherwise bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Example: If the match is abandoned in the 38\n                <sup>nd</sup> minute: </p>\n            <p>Bets on minutes: 1 to 15 and 16 to 30 will be settled.\n                <br> Bets on minutes: start of second half-60, 61-75, 76-Full Time will be void.\n                <br> Bets on minutes: 31-Half Time will be settled if there was a goal scored between 31\n                <sup>st</sup> and 38\n                <sup>th</sup> min\n                <br> Bets on minutes: 31-Half Time will be void if there was no goal scored between 31\n                <sup>st</sup> and 38\n                <sup>th</sup> min </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both teams to score & over 2.5</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Yes = both teams to score and at least 3 goals to be scored in the game. </p>\n            <p>No = either team not to score or both teams to score but less than 3 goals altogether. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned, bets will be void, unless the outcome of a bet is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Match Winner & Both Teams to Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the game and if both teams will score/not score from the given options. If a match is abandoned, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Scorecast</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This is a prediction on both First to Score and Exact Score of the match. Both should be correct for a bet to win. Own goals are not counted for first to score: next goal scored which is not an own goal will be counted for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>If there are only own goals in the match, bet will be settled with Exact Score market odds at kick-off time. If game ends with 0:0 score, all bets will be void. </p>\n            <p>If player comes on the field after first goal is scored, or did not take part in the game at all, bets including him as first to score will be settled with Exact Score market odds at kick-off time.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after first goal is scored, bets will be settled with First to Score odds of Goalscorer bet type at kick-off time. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st Half Scorecast</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This is a prediction on both First to Score and Exact Score in the 1st half of the match. Both should be correct for a bet to win. Own goals are not counted for first to score: next goal scored which is not an own goal will be counted for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>If there are only own goals in the 1st half, bet will be settled with 1st Half Exact Score market odds at kick-off time. If 1st Half ends with 0:0 score, all bets will be void. </p>\n            <p>If player comes on the field after first goal is scored, or did not take part in the 1st Half at all, bets including him as first to score will be settled with 1st Half Exact Score market odds at kick-off time. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during the 1st Half, all bets will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Anytime Scorecast</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This is a prediction on both Anytime Goalscorer and Exact Score of the match. Both should be correct for a bet to win. Own goals are not counted for Anytime Goalscorer for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>If there are only own goals in the match, bet will be settled with Exact score market odds at kick-off time. If game ends with 0:0 score, all bets will be void. </p>\n            <p>If player did not take part in the game at all, bets including him as Anytime Goalscorer will be settled with Exact Score market odds at kick-off time. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after a goal or goals are scored, bets including players who have already scored will be settled with Anytime Goalscorer odds of Goalscorer bet type at kick-off time. All other bets will be void. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Wincast</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This is a prediction on both First to Score and Final Result (home win, away win or draw) of the match. Both should be correct for a bet to win. Own goals are not counted for First to Score: next goal scored which is not an own goal will be counted for settlement purposes. </p>\n            <p>If there are only own goals in the match, bet will be settled with 1X2 market odds at kick-off time. </p>\n            <p>If player comes on the field after first goal is scored, or did not take part in the game at all, bets including him as First to Score will be settled with 1X2 market odds at kick-off time. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after first goal is scored, bets will be settled with First to Score odds of Goalscorer bet type at kick-off time. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Half-time/Full-time & Over/Under 2.5</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the match result at half-time and full-time, and whether at least 3 goals will be scored in the match. Example: In order for the bet ‘1/X and Over 2.5’ to be successful, the home team must win the first half, then the final result should be a draw and 3 or more goals should be scored during the match. Extra time and penalty shootouts do not count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Match Winner & O/U 2.5/3.5</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the match and if there will be over or under 2.5/3.5 goals scored in the match from the given options.</p>\n            <p>If a game is abandoned, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Match Winner & O/U 1.5 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the match and if there will be over or under 1.5 goals scored in the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> half from the given options.</p>\n            <p>If a game is abandoned, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1X2 Corners Full Time/1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will take more corners. Available options are:</p>\n            <p> 1 – Home team to take more corners\n                <br> X – Both teams to take an equal number of corners\n                <br> 2 – Away team to take more corners</p>\n            <p>Corners 1X2 Full Time is settled according to the corners taken during the whole match.</p>\n            <p>Corners 1X2 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half is settled according to the corners taken in the first half only.</p>\n            <p>Corners 1X2 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half is settled according to the corners taken in the second half only.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Asians Handicap & Over/Under Corners FT/1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half/2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This market is similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the corners taken by each team, applying the given Handicap. Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by the corners taken by both teams. Push rules apply.</p>\n            <p>Asians & Over/Under Corners FT will be settled according to the corners taken during the whole match.</p>\n            <p>Asians & Over/Under Corners 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half will be settled according to the corners taken in the first half only.</p>\n            <p>Asians & Over/Under Corners 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half will be settled according to the corners taken in the second half only.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Corners</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total team corners are similar to Over/Under wager. Win/Loss is determined by the number of corners taken by the chosen team. Push rules apply. Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Corners 2 Way</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the total corners taken in the match (by both teams) will be over or under a given number. Push rules apply.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Corners Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the total corners taken in the match (by both teams) will add up to an odd or even number. Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Corners 3 Way HC</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>In 3 way HC betting, the line is set so that there can also be a draw outcome, giving you 3 potential bets. Bets are settled by comparing the corners taken by each team, applying preset handicap. </p>\n            <p>For example:</p>\n            <p> Handicap (-1) - You win if your team takes two or more corners more than the opponent.\n                <br> Tie (-1) - You win if the team with (-1) Handicap takes exactly one corner more than its opponent.\n                <br> Handicap (+1) - You win if your team takes a bigger or an equal number of corners than its opponent.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Corners 3 Way OU</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if corners taken by both teams during the match will be over, under or exactly a given number.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Corners Over/Under, Corners 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Half Over/Under, Corners 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> Half Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the total corners taken in the match (by both teams) will be over or under a given number. Push rules apply.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First/Last Corner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will take the first/last corner in the game.</p>\n            <p>Awarded, but not taken corners (there is a corner, but before it is taken the referee signals for the end of the first half or the match) will not count for settlement purposes. Also if a corner needs to be re-taken for any reason, it will be counted as 1 corner.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">2\n                <sup>nd</sup> /3\n                <sup>rd</sup>/4\n                <sup>th</sup>/… Corner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will take the named corner in the game. If this specific corner is not taken in the game, bets will be void. For example game finishes or is abandoned with 8 corners taken – all bets on any corner after the 8th will be void (9th, 10th, etc.). </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Kick Off</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will perform the first kick of the game. Bets accepted after the decisive toss of coin will be void. All bets stand if a kick off has been made in the match, no matter if the match is later abandoned.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Red Cards</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Red Cards is similar to Over/Under wager. Win/Loss is determined by the number of red cards accumulated by both teams.</p>\n            <p>Cards shown to non-players (managers, coaching staff, etc.) or substitutes on bench do not count.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Booking in Match</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>This market is similar to Over/Under wager. Win/Loss is determined by points accumulated for cards shown to both teams. A yellow card counts as one point and a red card counts as two points. The maximum number of points a player can accumulate during a match is three (if a player receives two yellow and a red card respectively, the 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> yellow card point is ignored). Cards shown to non-players (managers, coaches, substitutes on the bench, etc.) do not count.</p>\n            <p>Cards shown to non-players (managers, coaching staff, etc.) or substitutes on bench do not count.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First/Last Booking</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will receive first/last of any card (yellow or red) in the game. If players from both teams are booked for the same incident in which first or last card is received, bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Substitutes</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Substitutes are similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the substitutes used by each team, applying the given Handicap. Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by substitutes used by both teams. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First/Last Substitute</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will make first/last substitution in the game. If both teams make a substitution at the same time, which happens to be first/last in the game, bets on it will be void. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Offside</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Offside is similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the offsides ruled against each team, applying the given Handicap. Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by offsides ruled against both teams. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First / Last Offside</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be caught first/last in an offside position in the game. </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Fouls</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Fouls are similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the fouls committed by each team, applying the given Handicap. Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by fouls committed by both teams.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Ball Possession</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Ball Possession is similar to Handicap Wager. Win/loss is determined by the Ball Possession of both teams, then by comparing the ball possession with the handicap given before the game started.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Shots on Target</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\"Shots on Target\" is similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the shots on target of each team, applying the given Handicap.</p>\n            <p>Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by shots on target of both teams..</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned, all bets will be void, unless settlement is already unconditionally determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Throw In</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total Throw Ins is similar to Handicap and Over/Under wager. Win/Loss for Handicap part is determined by comparing the throw ins taken by each team, applying the given Handicap. Win/Loss for Over/Under part is determined by throw ins taken by both teams.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned all bets will be void, unless settlement is already unconditionally determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup>/Last Throw In</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be first/last to take a throw in in the game. If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup>/Last Free Kick</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be first/last to take a free kick in the game. If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup>/Last Goal Kick</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be first/last to take a goal kick in the game. If a match is abandoned all bets will be void unless settlement is already determined.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright/Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the relevant competition. Bets are settled on the final league position, after play offs (if played), unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Qualify/Win the Cup</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Winner is the team advancing to the next round or winning the cup. Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, then all qualification/win the cup bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Relegation / Promotion</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are settled on the final league position, after play offs (if played), unless otherwise stated. If a team is removed from the league before the season has started, then all bets on that market will be made void, and a new relegation/promotion book will be opened.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Group Winner / Qualify / Forecast / Points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on final Group standings. </p>\n            <p>Group Winner – Predict the team which will win the group. </p>\n            <p>Group Qualify – Predict if a team will qualify for the next round of the tournament without playoffs. </p>\n            <p>Group Forecast – Predict the exact place the named team or teams will finish in.</p>\n            <p>Group Points – Predict how many points a team will accumulate.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Elimination Stage</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which stage of a tournament a certain team will be eliminated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Player and Game Performance Markets</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Settlement is based on official competition rules and official competition feed information</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Player Performance</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the in-play performance of a single Player from each Team.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game Actions</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the in-play action that will determine the outcome of the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Transfer Specials</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Player to sign for before. - Club of player to sign includes Loan deals for settlement purposes. If he is recalled to his parent club or sold to another one later it does not matter. It only does matter where the player is playing on the date mentioned.</p>\n            <p>Next Permanent Manager - Bets are settled on the next permanent manager as announced by the club. Caretaker bosses and interim managers do not count for this market, unless they lead the team in at least 10 competitive matches. If they do, they will be settled as winners for betting purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 3.0 Last updated: 23 May 2018 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":27577,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28224,"LinkTitle":"Football","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_27578","Code":"resp-br-gaelic-sports","Content":"<!-- EN Gaelic Sports -->\n<div id=\"gaelic-sports\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-67\"></span>Gaelic Sports</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All bets are settled on the regular time result. Extra time does not count, unless otherwise specified. </p>\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action. If a market is offered as 2way (without a price for the tie) and after a handicap has been applied the result is a draw, bets will be refunded. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if the points scored by both teams, including goals (1 goal=3points) will be over or under a given number..</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Half-time/Full-time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the outcome at the end of the 1st half and the full time result.
