If a round is abandoned then bets on that round are void.</p>\n            <p>The winner will be the player with the lowest score over 18 holes.</p>\n            <p>If an individual match-up ends in a tie then bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Play-offs do not count.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">72 hole match- ups</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets stand once the players have teed off the first hole.</p>\n            <p>Whichever player completes the most holes is deemed the winner. If both players complete the same amount of holes the player with the lowest score is deemed the winner.</p>\n            <p>If an individual match-up ends in a tie then bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Play-off is taken into account.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Dead-heat rules</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If 2 or more selections finish in the same position, the stake will be divided proportionally.</p>\n            <p>\n                <strong>Example:</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>The final positions in golf are the following:</p>\n            <p>1st position: Player A\n                <br> 2nd position: Player B\n                <br> 3rd position: Player C\n                <br> 3rd position: Player D\n                <br> 3rd position: Player E\n                <br> 6th Position: Player F\n                <br> 6th Position: Player G</p>\n            <p>Let’s say you bet on Player E (e/w ¼ 1-2-3)</p>\n            <p>3rd position is shared by 3 players – Player E shares 3rd position with 2 other players - so the payment will be 1/3 stake X e/w odds</p>\n\n            <p>Let’s say you bet on Player E (e/w ¼ 1-2-3-4)</p>\n            <p>Positions 3 and 4 are shared by 3 players.</p>\n            <p>3rd and 4th (not really 4th position since there are 3 players in 3rd position) positions are shared by 3 players – that means 2 positions pay, out of the 3 players who reached those positions: 2/3 stake X e/w odds.</p>\n            <p>Note – Dead-heat rules apply to the stake and not to the odds </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":27579,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28226,"LinkTitle":"Golf","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_28194","Code":"resp-br-handball","Content":"<!-- EN Handball -->\n<div id=\"handball\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-10\"></span>Handball</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All bets will be settled based on the score at the end of regulation time, excluding overtime (if played), unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.</p>\n        <p>All games are based on the result at the end of a 60-minute scheduled play unless otherwise stated. If the scheduled 60 minutes are not played, then bets will be void, unless otherwise stated. An exception is made for games in which a mercy rule is used: the result at the time of the mercy rule call will be used for settlement purposes.</p>\n        <p>If a match is postponed or abandoned for any reason, all bets will be void, unless re-arranged and played on the same day or stated otherwise in the rules. An exception is made if incorrect kick off time is announced on our website.</p>\n        <p>The statistics provided by the official website of the relevant competition or fixture will be used for settlement purposes. In case statistics are not available on the official website or there is significant evidence that the official website is incorrect, we will use an independent source to settle bets.</p>\n      <br> 2 – Away Win</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Handicap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First team to score/ Last team to score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will score the first/last goal in the match. Own goals count towards the team credited with the goal. If a game is abandoned after a goal is scored, then all bets on First team to score will stand, while bets on Last team to score will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated goals by both teams will add up to an odd or even number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Chance</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A Double Chance bet allows you to cover two of the three possible outcomes with one bet. The following options are available:</p>\n            <p> The following options are available:</p>\n            <p> 1 or X - if the result is either a home win or a draw, then bets on this option are winners.\n                <br> X or 2 - if the result is either a draw or an away win, then bets on this option are winners.\n                <br> 1 or 2 - if the result is either a home or an away win, then bets on this option are winners.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Halftime/Fulltime</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the result of a match at halftime and at the end of regular time. If a game is abandoned, bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Example: If you choose 1/X, you bet on the home team to lead in the first half and the match to end in a draw. Extra time doesn’t count.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> To 3/5/10/20 Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the first team to reach 3/5/10/20 Goals.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Highest Scoring Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which half most goals will be scored. If a game is suspended before 55 complete minutes are played, all bets on the outcome of the game are refunded unless otherwise stated, except for bets on any markets that have been unconditionally determined.</p>\n        <p>Each one of the bet types available, either for pre-live or live betting, has been specified at the end of the respective bet market inside square brackets, clarifying how the settlement will affect the selections. OU\n                <br>Asian Lines – Handicap & OU\n                <br>Draw No Bet\n                <br>Double Chance\n                <br>Next Goal\n                <br>First to Score\n                <br>Last to Score\n                <br>Both Teams To Score\n                <br>Number of Goals\n                <br>Number of Team Goals\n                <br>Exact Score (with draw)\n                <br>Odd/Even\n                <br>Race To Goals\n                <br>Overtime\n                <br>Periods – All Periods bet types (1st, 2nd, 3rd)\n                <br>Team To Win Most Periods\n                <br>Team To Win All 3 Periods\n                <br>Race To Goals (2,3,4,5)\n                <br>Both Teams To Score At Least 2 Goals (3 Goals)\n                <br>To Win To Nil\n                <br>Winning Margin\n                <br>\n            </p>\n            <p style=\"text-decoration:underline;\">Live Betting</p>\n            <p>The following bet types will be settled\n                <strong style=\"text-decoration:underline;\">including</strong> overtime for all ice hockey leagues:\n\n\n                <br>Handicap FT (2 Way)\n                <br>When Will Game End\n                <br>Exact Score (without draw)\n                <br>Winning Margin\n                <br>Odd/Even\n                <br>Total Team Goals (2 Way)\n                <br>Total Goals (2 Way)\n                <br>2 Way Money Line\n                <br>2 Way Handicap\n                <br>2 Way Over/Under\n                <br>\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">NHL</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>NHL bets (pre-match and live) include overtime and penalty shootouts unless specifically stated otherwise.</p>\n            <p>If a game is decided by a penalty shootout, one goal will be added to the winning team’s score and the game total.</p>\n            <p>NHL regular time and pre-season match bets are settled on the score at the end of regulation time.</p>\n            <p>The following NHL bet types will be settled according to\n                <u>regulation time</u>:\n                <br>3 Way Moneyline\n                <br>Asian Lines – Handicap & OU\n                <br>Puck Line (Handicap) (3 Way)\n                <br>Double chance\n                <br>First To Score\n                <br>Last To Score\n                <br>Draw No Bet\n                <br>Number Of Team Goals\n                <br>Number Of Goals\n                <br>Highest Scoring Period\n                <br>Next Goal\n                <br>To Win Most Periods\n                <br>1\n                <sup>st</sup> To 3 Goals\n                <br>\n            </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">All Competitions (Excluding NHL)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All pre-match bets will be settled based on the score at the end of regulation time, excluding overtime if played, unless otherwise stated.</p>\n            <p>For live betting – see live betting rules.</p>\n            <p>Friendly and friendly international live matches will be settled based on regulation score unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st/2nd/3rd Period</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on the first/second/third period result only.</p>\n            <p>The 3rd period excludes overtime.</p>\n            <p>The relevant period must be completed for bets to have action.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during the second period, all first period bets are still valid.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned during the third period, all first/second period bets are still valid.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">2W ML</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the match including overtime and penalties</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the spread between both teams at the final score.</p>\n            <p>Spread bets on pre live games (exclude NHL) will be settling with the regulation result.</p>\n            <p>Spread bets on live events will be settling with the overtime/penalty shootout result.</p>\n            <p>Examples:</p>\n            <p style=\"padding-left:25px;\">+0.5 You win if your team draws or wins the match.</p>\n            <p style=\"padding-left:25px;\">-0.5 You win if your team wins the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals achieved in a match.</p>\n            <p>Over/Under bets on pre live games (exclude NHL) will be settling with the regulation result.</p>\n            <p>Over/Under bets on live events will be settling with the overtime/penalty shootout result.</p>\n            <p>Examples:</p>\n            <p style=\"padding-left:25px;\">Over 2 Bets win if there are three or more goals scored in the match. If there are two goals exactly, the stake is returned. Bets lose if there is 0 or 1 goal scored in the match.</p>\n            <p style=\"padding-left:25px;\">Over 2.5 Bets win if there are three or more goals scored in the match. Bets lose if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match.</p>\n            <p class=\"goTop\"></p>\n            <p style=\"padding-left:25px;\">Under 2.5 Bets win if there are 0, 1 or 2 goals scored in the match. Bets lose if there are three or more goals scored in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals achieved in the match.</p>\n            <p>Over 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if there are 3 goals or more in the match.</p>\n            <p>Under 2.5 - The bet will be a winner if there are no goals or less than 3 goals in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">3 Way Handicap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>In a 3-Way Handicap, the line is set so that there can also be a draw outcome, giving you 3 potential bets. Handicap (-1) - You win if your team wins the match with a goal difference of two or more. Tie: You win if the team with (-1) Handicap wins the match with exactly one goal difference. Handicap (+1) - You win if your team draws or win the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Regular Time Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner after regular time only.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Asian HC and O/U</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Asian markets are settled on the result after Regular Time. Live Asian Handicap bets are settled according to the score for the remainder of the game after the bet was placed. Goals scored before the bet was placed are not included.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Number of Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bet on the total number of goals scored by the two teams within the official 60-minute play. Own goals are counted for betting purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Team Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the total goals achieved by a named team.</p>\n            <p>Over 0.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team scores 1 or more goals</p>\n            <p>Under 0.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team doesn't score</p>\n            <p>Over 1.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team scores 2 or more goals</p>\n            <p>Under 1.5 - The bet will be a winner if the team scores 1 goal or less</p>\n            <p>Own goals are counted for betting purposes.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First to score / Last to score / Next Goal</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Which team will score the first/last/next goal in a match. Own goals count to the team credited with the goal.</p>\n            <p>If an Event is abandoned after a goal was scored then all bets on team of \"First to score\" will stand, \"Last to score\" will be void, team of \"Next Goal\" goal which has already been determined will stand and \"Next Goal\" which has not been determined will be void.</p>\n            <p>If an Event is abandoned without any goal being scored, then all \"First to score / Last to score\" bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Draw No Bet</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner team. In the event of a draw all bets are void and stakes are refunded.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both Teams To Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Yes = both teams to score.</p>\n            <p>No = either team not to score.</p>\n            <p>Bets stand if both teams have scored in the match irrespective of if the match is later abandoned.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Margin</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the margin in which the winning team will win. Over time and penalty shootouts are included for this bet type for all leagues.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Qualify</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Should a team be disqualified from the tournament prior to the match, and a bye is awarded, all qualification/win the cup bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>To qualify bets Include overtime/shootouts.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win Series</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are void if the statutory number of games (according to the respective governing organizations) are not completed or are changed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Head 2 Head</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If one or more contestants fail to start, all bets are considered void and stakes will be refunded.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First/Last/Anytime Goalscorer</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a player will score first/anytime goal in the match. Own goals are ignored for settlement purposes. If an own goal is scored, the previous or the next goal (if there are any) will be taken into consideration for settlement purposes. If only own goals are scored in the match, it will be considered a No Goalscorer result.</p>\n            <p>For all leagues (including the NHL), bets are settled according to regular time only. Stakes on players not included in the match lineup will be void.\n            </p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after the first goal has already been scored, bets onFirst Goalscorer market and on Anytime Goalscorer market for players, who have already scored, will stand. All other bets placed on Anytime Goalscorer market will be void.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned before a first goal is scored, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Odd/Even</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A prediction of whether the total number of accumulated goals in a match will add up to an odd or even number.</p>\n            <p>Any match resulting in 0-0 will be settled as an even number of goals.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Exact Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the score at the end of regular time (except NHL).</p>\n            <p>If an exact score occurs that is not an option in our offer, all bets are lost.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Chance</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A Double Chance bet allows you to cover two of the three possible outcomes in a Ice Hockey match with one bet.</p>\n            <p>The following options are available:</p>\n            <p>1 or X - if the result is either a home win or a draw, bets on this option are winners.</p>\n            <p>X or 2 - if the result is either a draw or away win, bets on this option are winners.</p>\n            <p>1 or 2 - if the result is either a home win or an away win, bets on this option are winners.</p>\n            <p>All bets are valid for regulation time in all leagues</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Time of 1st Goal</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If a match is abandoned after the first goal is scored, all bets stand.</p>\n            <p>If a match is abandoned before a goal is scored, all bets are void.</p>\n            <p>If a match ends without a goal being scored, all bets are void. This Bet Type is settled excluding Overtime.</p>\n            <p>As soon as a game starts, it is deemed to be in the first minute, so for example, a goal scored after 24 minutes and 16 seconds is settled as having been scored in the 25th minute.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Overtime</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether the game will go to overtime or not</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Most Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which period the most goals will be scored.</p>\n            <p>If 2 or more periods have the same score, all bets will be void.</p>\n            <p>Most goals excludes overtime (including NHL).</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st To 3 Goals</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be the first to score 3 goals. Over time is included for this bet type for all leagues. All penalty shootouts will be considered as one goal. For example: if team A is the first team to score in a penalty shootouts when the regulation time is tied with 2:2, and team B won the penalty shootouts, then team B is the first team to score for this purpose.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Finishing Position</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which team will be ahead in final tournament position.</p>\n            <p>If one or more teams fail to start the tournament, all bets are considered void and stakes will be refunded.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Shots on Goal</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Shots on Goal is similar to Handicap and Over/Under Wager.</p>\n            <p>Win/loss is determined by the number of shots on target by both teams, then comparing with the handicap given before the game start.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Relegation</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If a team is removed from the league/tournament before the season has started, all bets on that market will be void, and a new relegation book will be opened.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on final league/tournament position include playoffs.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Group Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets settled on final Group position.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Series score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets are void if the statutory number of games (according to the respective governing organizations) are not completed or are changed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Elimination Stage</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict in which stage of a tournament a team will be eliminated.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Penalty</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which penalty type will be first to be awarded.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Team To Win All 3 Periods</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if one of the two Teams will win all of the three Periods in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race To Goals (2,3,4,5)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which of the two Teams will reach the goals figure first. Neither Team added as an optional selection.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Both Teams To Score At Least 2 Goals (3 Goals)</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if both of the Teams will score 2 or more goals in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win To Nil</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which of the two Teams will manage to win the match without conceding a goal in regular time.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Highest Scoring Period</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which of the three Periods will have most goals scored in it.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Method Of Winning</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict what will be the winning method of the match – after: Regular Time, Overtime or Penalties</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st Period/Full Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which of the two Teams will be winning at the end of the 1st Period and of Regular Time in one combined bet type.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017 </p>\n the podium presentation.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Championship Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div demotions.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Constructors</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Each participant is priced to be the top constructor over the Formula 1 season in accordance with Constructors Championship standings, and rules as specified by the FIA.</p>\n            <p>First Retirement - First Retirement bets will have action once the 1st formation lap starts. A winning bet is on the constructor or driver of the first car to retire. Should more than one car/driver retire on the same lap then dead-heat rules apply.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Fastest Lap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>The official FIA result at the time of the podium presentation for the race will be used.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Podium Position</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>The result for settlement is at the time of the podium presentation.</p>\n            <p>Subsequent disqualifications and/or appeals will not affect bets.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Head to Head</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Both drivers must start the race for bets to be valid.</p>\n            <p>Two drivers may be paired for betting purposes and prices offered on which of them will finish in a higher position in a specific race.</p>\n            <p>In the event neither driver finishes the race, the driver completing more laps will be deemed the winner. If both drivers have completed the same number of full laps, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">NASCAR - Outright Race</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>The Official NASCAR winner of the race shall be the winner of the race for wagering purposes; this includes all raceswhich are halted prematurely for any reason.</p>\n            <p>Any drivers who do not qualify for the race will be deemed no action, i.e. all bets on such driver will be declared void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Rally</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All race bets are settled on the official classification as defined by the official race organizers and will not be affected by any subsequent enquiries.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">MOTORBIKES - Championship Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All-in compete or not. Bets will be determined by the number of points accumulated following the podium presentation of the final race of the season and will not be affected by any subsequent enquiries.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Non-Runner no-bet.</p>\n            <p>The podium positions will be used to determine the winner for betting purposes.</p>\n            <p>Subsequent disqualifications and/or appeals will not affect bets.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.1 Last updated: 13 June 2017</p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":28197,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28232,"LinkTitle":"Motor Racing","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_28198","Code":"resp-br-netball","Content":"<!-- EN Netball -->\n<div id=\"netball\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-63\"></span>Netball</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>In the event of a match starting but not being completed all bets will be void unless stated otherwise in the rules. All bets will be settled based on the regular time result only, unless otherwise stated in the rules. </p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. If the home and away team for a listed match are reversed, then bets placed based on the original listing will be void.</p>\n        <p>If a match is postponed or abandoned for any reason all bets will be void, unless re-arranged and played in the same day or stated otherwise in the rules. An exception is made if we advertise incorrect starting time. </p>\n        <p>If a market is offered as 2Way and happened to finish with a draw result, Push rules apply.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the league/tournament. Bets will be settled according to the final standings, including playoffs if played, unless otherwise stated.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Money Line</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the outcome: </p>\n            <p>1 – Home team wins</p>\n            <p>X – Draw</p>\n            <p>2 – Away team wins</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Spread</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner, applying the given handicap (spread) to the result.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Over/Under</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict whether the total points scored by both teams will be over or under a given number.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st/2nd Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets (money line, spread, over/under) on halves will be settled according to the relevant half score only. A relevant Half must be completed for bets to stand, unless they are already determined. If the game is suspended in the second half, first half bets will be settled, the others will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st/2nd/3rd/4th Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Bets (money line, spread, over/under) on quarters will be settled according to the relevant quarter result only. A relevant quarter must be completed for bets to stand, unless they are already determined. If the game is suspended - bets on finished quarters will be settled, while bets on running as well as not started quarters will be void, unless bets on the running quarter are already determined. For example: a game is suspended in the 3rd quarter:\n            </p>\n            <p>- bets on 1st and 2nd quarters will be settled</p>\n            <p>- if there are any O/U bets on the 3rd quarter that could be settled, they would be</p>\n            <p>- all other bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":28198,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28233,"LinkTitle":"Netball","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_28199","Code":"resp-br-other-sports","Content":"<!-- EN Other Sports -->\n<div id=\"other-sports\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-0\"></span>Other Sports</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>All games must start on the scheduled date (local time) for bets to have action.</p>\n        <p>Abandoned or postponed matches are void unless rearranged and played in the same date (local time) or stated otherwise in the rules. This scheduled period does not include extra time or time allocated for a penalty stroke shootout.        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>All rides count.</p>\n            <p>Bonus points do not count.</p>\n            <p>When Rider Total Points are offered for Grand Prix and European Championship events, settlement will be based on points accumulated in the main round (20 heats) only, and excluding the semi-finals and final ride-off.</p>\n            <p>If match is abandoned before full completion all bets are void, unless the outcome of the bet has already been determined. In Knockout Cup fixtures ‘Man on Man’ tactical rides do not count towards settlement.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outrights</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\n                <span style=\"text-decoration: underline\">Championship</span> - Outright betting will be determined by the positions immediately following the final event of the competition and will not be altered by any subsequent enquiries. Play-offs count.</p>\n            <p>\n                <span style=\"text-decoration: underline\">Grand Prix</span> - Stakes are refunded on non-participants and a Rule 4 deductions may be applied to winning bets.</p>\n            <p>\n                <span style=\"text-decoration: underline\">World Cup Winner</span> - 12 heats must take place for an official result.</p>\n            <p>\n                <span style=\"text-decoration: underline\">World Cup Individual betting</span> - 12 heats must take place for an official result.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 13 June 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":28202,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":28237,"LinkTitle":"Speedway","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_28203","Code":"resp-br-tennis","Content":"<!-- EN Tennis -->\n\n<div id=\"tennis\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-6\"></span>Tennis</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>In the event of any of the following circumstances, all bets will stand:</p>\n        <p>\n            - A change of schedule and/or day of match\n            <br> - A change of venue\n            <br> - A change from indoor court to outdoor court or vice versa\n            <br> - A change of surface (either before or during a match)\n            <br> - A delay in the start of a match will not affect the standing of wagers, nor will a suspension, as long as the play is resumed and the match completed.\n        </p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner Full Time including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>If the full statutory number of sets hasn’t been completed, all bets will be deemed as void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Asian Handicap & O/U Full Time including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Refers to the sets played in the match. Win/loss is determined by the number of sets accumulated by both players. If the full statutory number of sets hasn’t been completed, all bets will be deemed as void. A super tie break is considered as one set for bets on O/U.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Point Winner / 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Point Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will win the stated point. The nominated point will be featured in the name of the bet type, for example: 1\n                <sup>st</sup> set - 5\n                <sup>th</sup> game – 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Point Winner. If a point is not played for any reason – it is awarded by the umpire as a penalty point, the game or the match is over before the point is played, a player withdraws, etc. – bets on it will be void. Tie break points will not be counted for this bet type. </p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will win the stated game. The nominated game will be featured in the name of the bet type, for example: 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> set – 7\n                <sup>th</sup> game – Winner. If a game is not completed for any reason, bets on it will be void. Tie break points will not be counted for this bet type.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game Exact Score</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the points of the winner and his opponent in the stated game by choosing from the given options. The nominated game will be featured in the name of the bet type, for example: 1\n                <sup>st</sup> set – 8th game – Exact Score. If a game is not completed for any reason, bets on it will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game To Deuce</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a score of 40-40 will occur at any stage of the stated game. The nominated game will be featured in the name of the bet type, for example: 1\n                <sup>st</sup> set – 4\n                <sup>th</sup> game – Game To Deuce. “Yes”, meaning there will be a score of 40-40 in the game. “No”, meaning that a score of 40-40 will not occur in the game. If a game is not played for any reason or it is abandoned before a score of 40-40 is reached, bets on it will be void. Once a score of 40-40 is reached, bets on that game will be settled, even if the game is abandoned for any reason at a later stage.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Game Total Points</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>3 way bet type to predict Over, Under or the exact given number of points will be played in a stated game. The nominated game will be featured in the name of the bet type, for example: 1\n                <sup>st</sup> set – 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> game – Total Points. If a game is not played for any reason, bets on it will be void. If a game is abandoned due to injury or withdrawal, bets on it will be void, unless the respective settlement is already determined. Tie break points will not be counted for this bet type.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Race To Games</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which Player/Team will win a specified number of games first.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Games including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Games betting refer to the games played in the match. Win/loss is determined by the number of games accumulated by both players. Bets will be deemed as void if the full statutory number of sets is not completed, or changed. A tie break is considered as one game for Games purposes. A super tie break is considered as one game for all Games bets.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First/Second/Third/Fourth/Fifth Set (Money Line/Handicap or Over/Under) including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>In the event of the set not being completed, all bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Exact Score (Set Betting) including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the sets score at the end of the match. Bets are void if the full statutory number of sets is not completed, or changed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Player Games including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the number of games achieved by a player in a match. Bets will be deemed as void if the full statutory number of sets has not completed, or changed. A tie break is considered as one game for Games purposes. A super tie break is considered as one game for all Games bets.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Tie Break / Tie Break in a match including Live Betting</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total Tie Break is similar to Over/Under Wager. Win/loss is determined by the number of tie breaks in the match. A super tie break is not considered as a tie break for bets on Total Tie Break. If there was a Tie Break in an unfinished event, bets will be valid. If there's no Tie Break in an unfinished event, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Result</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict a player to win or lose the 1\n                <sup>st</sup> set and then go on to win or lose the match. Bets will be deemed as void if the full statutory number of sets is not completed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Total Aces</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Total Aces is similar to Asian and Over/Under Wager. Win/loss is determined by the number of aces accumulated by both players. Bets are void if the statutory number of sets has not completed, or changed. If a match is not completed because of a player retirement or disqualification, all bets will be void</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First Ace</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will serve the first ace in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Point</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will win the first point. All bets placed after the coin toss will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win 1\n                <sup>st</sup> Game</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will win the first game. All bets placed after the coin toss will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1\n                <sup>st</sup> to win 3 games</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will be the first to win three games. All bets placed after the coin toss will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First Break</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will break the opponent's whole game serve first. All bets will be void if a break does not take place. All bets placed after the coin toss will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Double Faults</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Refers to the double faults served in the match. Win/loss is determined by the number of double faults accumulated by both players. Bets will be deemed as void if the full statutory number of sets is not completed, or changed.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">First Double Fault</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will serve the first double fault in the match.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Fastest Serve</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will serve the fastest serve in the match in KM/H or MPH as stated in the bet type name</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the tournament. In the event of a non-runner, all bets are void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winner</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the tournament. The player must start Round 1.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Winning Quarter/Winning Half</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the Quarter/Half the winner of the tournament will come from. All players taking part in the tournament are divided into 4 groups (Quarters), with one of the top 4 seeds in each Quarter.</p>\n            <p>Winning Quarter: choose which Quarter the winning player will come from (eg. 1\n                <sup>st</sup>, 2\n                <sup>nd</sup>, 3\n                <sup>rd</sup>, 4\n                <sup>th</sup>). Winning Half: choose which Half the winning player will come from (eg. top or bottom).</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">To Win a Quarter</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the quarter</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Finalists / To reach the final</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the players that will reach the final of the tournament.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Head To Head</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict which player will reach the higher round in (or win) the tournament. In the event of a non-runner, all bets are void. Push rules apply</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Stage of Elimination</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Player must start the first match of the tournament for bets to be valid.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 24 August 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":28203,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":29969,"LinkTitle":"Tennis","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_28204","Code":"resp-br-volleyball","Content":"<!-- EN Volleyball -->\n<div id=\"volleyball\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"betting-rule\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        <span class=\"br-icon icon i-24 i-c-sport-19\"></span>Volleyball</h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>If a match is not completed, all full time bets will be void.</p>\n        <p>If a match venue is changed then bets already placed will stand providing the home team is still designated as such. <p>Predict the winner of the relevant set.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">1st/2nd/3rd/4th/5th Handicap</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the relevant set, considering the given\n                <strong>point</strong> Handicap.</p>\n        </div>\n\n both teams in the match/relevant set will be an odd or an even number.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span Bets will be settled according to the official result declared after the race has finished. Any later appeals and disqualifications will not affect bets.</p>\n        <p>If an event does not take place as scheduled, unless it is postponed due to weather conditions, all bets are void. An exception is made if incorrect kick-off time is announced on our website. If an event is abandoned or suspended and not staged within 36 hours (local time) and on the same field (track) all bets are void. Dead heat rules apply.</p>\n        <p>Dead heat rules apply.</p>\n        <p>Bets on any participant who takes part in qualifying for a specified event but then fails to qualify for the main Round(s) will be classed as losers.</p>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Outright</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict the winner of the stage, race (it will be specified in the name of the outright). If the participant does not start the official event, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Podium Position</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Predict if a participant will finish on the podium (1\n                <sup>st</sup>, 2\n                <sup>nd</sup> or 3\n                <sup>rd</sup> place). If the participant does not start the official event, bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n        \n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Head to head / Winner Full Time</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>Both participants must start the race for bets to stand. If both of them don’t finish the event, bets will be void, unless it is a multistage event. In that case the player that completes later stage will be settled as winner. For example if Player A withdraws or gets disqualified in 1st Round and Player B finishes 1st Round, Player B will be the winner.</p>\n            <p>If both of them withdraw or get disqualified at the same stage – bets will be void.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 2.0 Last updated: 05 May 2017 </p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":28205,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":"","CustomURL":"","HashClientIncludeIn":"","ID":31452,"LinkTitle":"Winter Sports","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]}]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23675","Code":"resp-bt-singles-acc-system","Content":"<!-- EN Singles Combos Systems -->\n<div id=\"bt-single-accumulator-system\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"bet-type\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        Singles, Combos and System bets\n    </h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>Broaden your betting possibilities by going beyond the 1 selection opportunities offered by singles betting...                      <td>19-Fold</td>\n                        <td>19</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>20-Fold</td>\n                        <td>20</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n            <br>\n\n            <p>In all cases, all selections must be successful to be a winner. If one or more selections from the accumulator are cancelled, the bet stands as soon as at least one of the remaining selections is settled as a winner or loser.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Push</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>This is a game / selection that is tied after taking the handicap/spread into account. All bets will be void.\n            </p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Non-Runner</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>A non-runner is a selection that is named but doesn't take part in the event. If your selection is a non-runner, your bet will be void (and your stake returned). If the selection is part of a accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Void</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>In all cases where the term ‘void’ is used, settlement will be as follows:</p>\n            <ul>\n                <li> Single bets - stakes will be refunded. </li>\n                <li> Accumulator (Multiple) bets - void selections will be treated as non-runners within the bet, meaning If the selection is part of an accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.</li>\n            </ul>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">System Bets</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\n                <strong>What is a system bet?</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>System bets are similar to accumulators or accumulators in that you choose several selections within one bet, but all possible combinations of bets from those selections are covered, with the advantage of winning even if not all picks are winners.</p>\n            <p>Systems bets are presented as two numbers separated by a slash: eg. 2/4, with the first number denoting the type of bets involved (in this case, doubles), and the second number denoting the number of selections involved.</p>\n            <p>For example, in a 2/4 system bet, you would choose 4 selections and click on the System tab at the top of the bet slip, where you would then see your system bets options. The 2/4 system bet is made up of the 6 possible combinations using your 4 selections, so a stake of €0.50 would cost €3. Even if only 2 of those possible combinations were winners, your bet would win, with the return amount dependant on how many possible combinations actually win. If none or only one of your picks wins, your system bet loses. When you place your system bet, the amount of winnings shown is the maximum winnings possible if all picks win.</p>\n            <p>You can see the details of active system bets by checking Open Bets under My Account.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h3>Systems involving 3 selections</h3>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">System 2/3</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A 2/3 system consists of 3 bets involving 3 selections in different events - 3 doubles. Any two winning bets guarantee a return. More winning bets means a higher return. Please note that a €1 System 2/3 costs €3.</p>\n\n            <table class=\"help-table help-table-vertical\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Number of bets placed</td>\n                        <td>3</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Single bet</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"heading-cell\" colspan=\"2\">Accumulator bet</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Double</td>\n                        <td>3</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Treble</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">4folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">5folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">6folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">7folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">8folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Trixie</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A Trixie consists of 4 bets involving 3 selections in different events, 3 doubles and 1 treble. Any two winning bets guarantee a return. More winning bets means a higher return. Please note that a €1 Trixie costs €4.</p>\n\n            <table class=\"help-table help-table-vertical\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td </div>\n</div>","Id":23675,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22806,"LinkTitle":"Bet Types","LinkType":30,"SubItems":[{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23671","Code":"resp-bt-each-way","Content":"<!-- EN Each Way -->\n<div id=\"bt-each-way\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"bet-type\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        Each-Way\n    </h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>\n            <strong>What is an Each-Way bet?</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>An Each-Way (E/W) bet is a bet consisted of two separate parts - a win part and a place part. The win part of the bet is on your selection to win the event, and the place part is on your selection to finish either first or within the race's specified place terms (e.g. 2nd, 3rd, 4th, etc). The bet is very popular in horse racing since it allows you to gain returns even if your horse doesn't finish first.</p>\n\n        <p>\n            <strong>How do Each-Way bets work?</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>When you place an Each-Way bet (by ticking the e/w check box), your stake is doubled, with half allocated to the outright win, and the other half allocated to your runner finishing within the place terms. Each race has specified place terms depending on the number of runners, eg. ¼ 1-2-3. In this example, an Each-Way bet placed on a runner that finishes 1st will pay in two ways: you will win the outright portion of the bet, but you will also win the place portion at ¼ the outright odds as it finished in the top 3.</p>\n\n        <p>\n            <strong>Example:</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>You place a 2 EUR Each-Way bet on a 12/1 shot in a race with E/W terms ¼ 1-2-3</p>\n        <p>If your selection finishes 1st:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>You win 12 EUR plus your stake for the outright win</li>\n            <li>You also win 3 EUR (quarter the outright odds: 3/1) plus your stake for placing (ie. finishing in the top 3)</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>If your selection finishes 2nd or 3rd:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>The outright portion of the bet will lose</li>\n            <li>You win 3 EUR plus your stake for placing</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>If your selection finishes outside the place terms for the race, both bets lose.</p>\n\n        <p>\n            <strong>How do Each-Way Accumulators work?</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>In the case of settling Each-Way Accumulators, the win portion of the first bet will be carried over to the win portion of the following bet, and similarly, the each-way portion of the bet will be carried over to the each-way portion of the following bet.</p>\n\n        <p>\n            <strong>Example:</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>You place a 1 EUR e/w accumulator on selection A in Race A and selection B in Race B. This means you have an outright (win) accumulator and a place accumulator</p>\n        <p>If selection A wins and selection B only places, the outright portion of the accumulator will lose, but the place portion will win.</p>\n        <p>If selection A only places and selection B wins, again, the outright portion of the accumulator will lose, but the place portion will win.</p>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017</p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":23671,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22807,"LinkTitle":"Each-way","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23672","Code":"resp-bt-fast-markets","Content":"<!-- EN Fast Markets -->\n<div id=\"bt-fast-markets\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"bet-type\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        Fast Markets\n    </h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>Fast Markets allow you to bet on whether you think a specific event will happen within the next 1 or 5 minutes of a live football match, giving you the incredible potential to win on every minute of your favourite live games!</p>\n        <p>Think Rooney's about to lose it? class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>The Asian Line is a special type of handicap used for soccer matches. Depending on the strength of each team, a handicap is issued for the game. This enables the odds for each side to be more similar, allowing for more competitive betting opportunities. All bets on the Asian Handicap in live betting (including 1st/2nd half bets) are settled according to the score line. Any goals prior to the bet being placed are ignored for settlement purposes.</p>\n\n        <table class=\"help-table\">\n            <tbody>\n                <tr>\n                    <th>\n                        <span>Asian Handicap</span>\n                    </th>\n                    <th>\n                        <span>What it means</span>\n                    </th>\n                </tr>\n                <tr>\n                    <td>0</td>\n                    <td>You win if your team wins the match.                      <td>19-Fold</td>\n                        <td>19</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td>20-Fold</td>\n                        <td>20</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n            <br>\n\n            <p>In all cases, all selections must be successful to be a winner. If one or more selections from the accumulator are cancelled, the bet stands as soon as at least one of the remaining selections is settled as a winner or loser.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Push</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>This is a game / selection that is tied after taking the handicap/spread into account. All bets will be void.\n            </p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Non-Runner</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>A non-runner is a selection that is named but doesn't take part in the event. If your selection is a non-runner, your bet will be void (and your stake returned). If the selection is part of a accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.</p>\n\n            <p>\n                <strong>Void</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>In all cases where the term ‘void’ is used, settlement will be as follows:</p>\n            <ul>\n                <li> Single bets - stakes will be refunded. </li>\n                <li> Accumulator (Multiple) bets - void selections will be treated as non-runners within the bet, meaning If the selection is part of an accumulator (multiple), the bet will become the next accumulative bet down, e.g. a treble becomes a double, a double becomes a single, etc.</li>\n            </ul>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">System Bets</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>\n                <strong>What is a system bet?</strong>\n            </p>\n            <p>System bets are similar to accumulators or accumulators in that you choose several selections within one bet, but all possible combinations of bets from those selections are covered, with the advantage of winning even if not all picks are winners.</p>\n            <p>Systems bets are presented as two numbers separated by a slash: eg. 2/4, with the first number denoting the type of bets involved (in this case, doubles), and the second number denoting the number of selections involved.</p>\n            <p>For example, in a 2/4 system bet, you would choose 4 selections and click on the System tab at the top of the bet slip, where you would then see your system bets options. The 2/4 system bet is made up of the 6 possible combinations using your 4 selections, so a stake of €0.50 would cost €3. Even if only 2 of those possible combinations were winners, your bet would win, with the return amount dependant on how many possible combinations actually win. If none or only one of your picks wins, your system bet loses. When you place your system bet, the amount of winnings shown is the maximum winnings possible if all picks win.</p>\n            <p>You can see the details of active system bets by checking Open Bets under My Account.</p>\n        </div>\n\n        <h3>Systems involving 3 selections</h3>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">System 2/3</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A 2/3 system consists of 3 bets involving 3 selections in different events - 3 doubles. Any two winning bets guarantee a return. More winning bets means a higher return. Please note that a €1 System 2/3 costs €3.</p>\n\n            <table class=\"help-table help-table-vertical\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Number of bets placed</td>\n                        <td>3</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Single bet</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"heading-cell\" colspan=\"2\">Accumulator bet</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Double</td>\n                        <td>3</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Treble</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">4folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">5folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">6folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">7folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">8folds</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                </tbody>\n            </table>\n        </div>\n\n        <h2 class=\"section-header inner-header\">\n            <span class=\"header-title\">Trixie</span>\n        </h2>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <p>A Trixie consists of 4 bets involving 3 selections in different events, 3 doubles and 1 treble. Any two winning bets guarantee a return. More winning bets means a higher return. Please note that a €1 Trixie costs €4.</p>\n\n            <table class=\"help-table help-table-vertical\">\n                <tbody>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Number of bets placed</td>\n                        <td>4</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Single bet</td>\n                        <td>-</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"heading-cell\" colspan=\"2\">Accumulator bet</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Double</td>\n                        <td>3</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td class=\"title-cell\">Treble</td>\n                        <td>1</td>\n                    </tr>\n                    <tr>\n                        <td
