bets","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23674","Code":"resp-bt-teaser-bets","Content":"<!-- EN Teaser Bets -->\n<div id=\"bt-teaser-bets\" class=\"rules-tab firstBettingRule help-accordion\" data-type=\"bet-type\">\n    <h2 class=\"section-header firstHeader\">\n        Teaser Bets\n    </h2>\n    <div class=\"section-holder firstHolder\">\n        <p>A teaser bet allows you to adjust the points spread and game totals on two or more American Football or Basketball teams by choosing a fixed number of points. The number of teams and points selected determines your payout odds.</p>\n\n        <p>\n            <strong>How do teaser bets work?</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>All selections must be successful for the teaser bet to win. If a selection in a two team teaser is a push, the bet will be a loser. A push in teasers of more than two teams will result in the bet dropping to the next level down, if available, or losing if not.</p>\n        <p>Teaser bets will only be allowed on pre-match events and only for selected leagues, including:</p>\n        <p>i. Regular teasers for NBA, NCAAB, NFL, NCAAF or any other league in which teaser bets are allowed (4, 4.5 and 5 for Basketball and 6, 6.5 and 7 for American Football)\n            <br> ii. SUPER TEASERS: 3 teams teaser - buying 8 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83\n            <br> iii. MONSTER TEASER: 4 teams teaser - buying 10 points, ties lose, odds -120/1.83</p>\n\n        <h4>Buying points</h4>\n        <p>Buying points allows you to change the point-spread or game total of an American Football or Basketball game. You can move the point-spread so you get more points when betting the underdog, and fewer points when betting on the favourite. You can move the total so you get a higher total when betting the under or a lower total if betting the over.</p>\n\n        <p class=\"last-update\">Version 1.0 Last updated: 14 March 2017</p>\n    </div>\n</div>","Id":23674,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22812,"LinkTitle":"Teaser Bets","LinkType":0,"SubItems":[]}]}]},{"SectionElements":[{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23477","Code":"resp-help-promotions-terms","Content":"<!-- EN Promotion Terms -->\n<div id=\"promotion-terms\" class=\"help-right-section terms-block isHidden help-accordion\">\n\n    <h2>Betrally General Promotion Rules</h2>\n\n    <ol class=\"cms-content-list\">\n        <li>These Betrally General Promotional Rules, Sports Bonus Terms, Free Bet Terms and No-Deposit Bonus Terms are inseparably linked to our\n            <a href=\"javascript:void(0)\" data-action=\"Application.blockAction\" data-params=\"help-section, Center_MyAccountResponsiveBlock_22802, onNavigationChanged, 27\" class=\"help-inner-link\" rel=\"terms-and-conditions\">Terms & Conditions</a>, of which they form a part, and their acceptance is a prerequisite to account registration. Any capitalized terms used herein which are not defined shall take their meaning from the\n            <a href=\"javascript:void(0)\" data-action=\"Application.blockAction\" data-params=\"help-section, Center_MyAccountResponsiveBlock_22802, onNavigationChanged, 27\" class=\"help-inner-link\" rel=\"terms-and-conditions\">Terms & Conditions</a>. </li>\n        <li>All customer offers are limited to one per person, family, household address, email address, telephone number, same payment account number (e.g. debit or credit card, Skrill and etc.), shared computer (e.g. school, public library or workplace) and shared IP.</li>\n        <li>A Customer’s total Account Balance is comprised of the aggregate of their Sports Cash Account, Casino Cash Account, Sports Bonus Account and Casino Bonus Account. Withdrawals cannot be made from either of the Bonus Accounts, but they can both be used to make wagers. Funds from the Sports Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Sports”, “Live Betting”, “Virtuals” and “Games” products and funds from the Casino Bonus Account can be used to place wagers on “Casino” products.</li>\n        <li>Withdrawals may only be processed from your Sports Cash Account. Any withdrawals from your Casino Cash Account can only be made by first transferring your withdrawal amount to your Sports Cash Account and then requesting the Withdrawal be processed from the Sports Cash Account. Please note that any transfer of funds from the Casino Cash Account to the Sports Cash Account will be construed as a Withdrawal from the Casino Cash Account and may consequently result in the cancellation and forfeiture of “Casino” product bonuses and promotions.</li>\n        <li>Any wagers made are deducted from the Sports Cash Account or Casino Cash Account first, as the case may be. Real money funds will always be used to place wagers/bets before bonus funds.</li>\n        <li>All Betrally bonuses and promotions are intended for recreational players and Betrally may, in its sole discretion, limit the eligibility of Customers to participate in all or part of any promotion. Where a Customer transfers funds from their Sports Cash Account to Casino Cash Account for the sole purpose of realizing game play with funds from their Sports Bonus Account, and then transfers such funds back to the Customer’s Sports Cash Account without wagering them twice, such transfer shall be deemed as bonus manipulation (i.e. outside of recreational play) and the amount of the originally awarded sports bonus shall be deducted from the Customer’s account.</li>\n        <li>When: (1) you have no open bets; (2) the remaining balance of your Sports Bonus Account is less than €1.00; and (3) your total sports balance is also less than €1.00; then the balance of your Sports Bonus Account shall automatically be transferred to your Sports Cash Account. This will have the effect of removing the active Sports bonus from your account so that you can take up another promotion.</li>\n        <li>Unless otherwise specified, all bonus and promotion offers are only redeemable once per Customer and a Customer may have no more than one active Casino bonus and one active Sports bonus on his account at any given time.</li>\n        <li>Any bonus and any associated winnings will be automatically removed from a Customer's account upon the Customer requesting a Withdrawal before meeting the rollover or eligibility requirements of the applicable bonus.</li>\n        <li>Cashed-Out (including Partial Cash-Outs) bets shall not contribute to meeting the rollover or eligibility requirements of any Sports promotion.</li>\n        <li>If you wish to find out how much rollover requirement remains in respect of a given bonus, please contact\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\" class=\"color\">support@betrally.com</a>. </li>\n        <li>If you wish to cancel an active bonus, please contact\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\" class=\"color\">support@betrally.com</a>. Please note that in such circumstances, any amount (in the Casino Bonus Account or Sports Bonus Account, as the case may be) attributable to the active bonus will be removed, including any associated winnings.</li>\n        <li>All Betrally bonuses and promotions are intended for recreational players and Betrally may, in its sole discretion, limit the eligibility of Customers to participate in all or part of any promotion. Betrally reserves the right to request identification verification documents, including a photograph of the Customer with his identification document, prior to crediting a bonus to a Customer’s account.</li>\n        <li>Betrally reserves the right to amend, cancel, reclaim or refuse any promotion at our discretion.</li>\n        <li>All management decisions are final.</li>\n\n\n        <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"sports-bonus-terms\">Sports Bonus Terms</h4>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <li value=\"16\">Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of your deposit and the corresponding Sports Bonus funds five (5) times before the funds in your Sports Bonus Account are transferred to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.</li>\n            <li>Unless otherwise specified, you must fulfil the rollover requirements within 15 days of the bonus being taken up, otherwise the funds held in your Sports Bonus Account will be forfeited.</li>\n            <li>Unless otherwise specified, to fulfil the bonus rollover requirements, all wagers must be made on odds of at least 3/5 (1.60) or higher, excluding any type of handicap (except 3Way Handicap), Forecast/Tricast and on Over/Under bets.</li>\n            <li>Bets will only count towards rollover requirements once they have been finally settled.</li>\n            <li>Any bet ‘win’ resulting from funds wagered from the Sports Cash Account is credited into the Sports Cash Account as 'stakes and winnings' up to the amount of the initial deposit used to claim the bonus. Any further realised gains (stake and winnings) exceeding the initial deposit amount, are credited to the Sports Bonus Account and continue to be subject to the remaining applicable bonus rollover requirements.</li>\n            <li>Any bet profit resulting from mixed Sports Cash Account and Sports Bonus Account funds wagered, is credited into the Sports Bonus Account as ‘stake and winnings’ and is subject to the remaining applicable bonus roll-over requirements.</li>\n            <li>Only once the roll-over requirements are met in their entirety, within the designated period of time, shall the Sports Bonus Account funds associated with the bonus be automatically transferred from the Sports Bonus Account to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.</li>\n            <li>Unless otherwise specified, should a Withdrawal from the Sports Cash Account be requested while there are funds in the Sports Bonus Account, the balance of the Sports Bonus Account shall be cancelled and forfeited.</li>\n            <li>Betrally reserves the right to cancel the bonus eligibility, bonus amount and any associated bonus winnings of a customer or a group of customers following suspicious common betting patterns that could result in generating guaranteed profit and/or guaranteed bonus eligibility. This suspicious activity might include, without being limited to, common betting patterns across identical events/markets/selections that could be identified in one or across several accounts.</li>\n            <li>Without derogating from anything stated herein, detection of an apparent relation between users, common betting pattern or any other abusive betting strategic which unfairly exploits or manipulates one or more bonuses or promotions offered by Betrally (to be determined at Betrally’s sole discretion) may result in the cancellation of the applicable promotion and any associated winnings, and may further result in the irreversible suspension of promotion and bonus eligibility.</li>\n        </div>\n\n        <h4 class=\"section-header\">Sports No-Deposit Bonus</h4>\n Bonus Account are transferred to the Sports Cash Account and a Withdrawal of any of these funds may be made.</li>\n            <li>The Customer shall have five (5) days (unless otherwise stated in the specific promotion T&Cs) to meet the rollover requirements, at which time the bonus shall be cancelled and forfeited.</li>\n            <li>The maximum withdrawable winnings from a Sports No-Deposit <h4 class=\"section-header\">Free Bet</h4>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <li value=\"31\">Unless otherwise specified, any winnings earned from a Free Bet shall be credited to a Customer’s Sports Cash Account, and are withdrawable. The Free Bet amount shall not be stake-returned.</li>\n            <li>A Free Bet shall only be valid on specified bet types, sports, leagues or events – as stated in the specific promotion terms.</li>\n            <li>No Free Bet may be used in portions. For example, if a €10 Free Bet is used for a €5 bet, then the unused €5 shall be forfeited.</li>\n            <li>The Free Bet shall always be used prior to real money funds from the Sports Cash Account - for example, if a customer is placing a €20 bet and selects a €10 Free Bet token, while having a balance of €100 in his Sports Cash Account, then the total amount of the Free Bet will be used (€10) and €10 will be drawn from the Sports Cash Account.</li>\n            <li>Any bet that satisfies the eligibility requirement to be awarded a Free Bet may not later be the subject of a Cash-Out.</li>\n            <li>Any bet the subject of a Cash-Out shall not contribute to any eligibility requirement to receive a Free Bet.</li>\n            <li>Bets placed on Asian Handicap or Over/Under, and are half-lost, shall not count towards the eligibility requirements of a Free Bet, when such conditions are considered for lost bets only or for missed selections in an accumulator.</li>\n            <li>If a bet which contributed to the eligibility of a Free Bet or which was placed with a Free Bet has been cancelled, Betrally reserves the right to remove the Free Bet from the Customer’s account and shall, in its sole discretion, determine whether the Customer may be eligible for the promotion again.</li>\n            <li>If a bet contributing to the eligibility of a Free Bet and a bet placed with the Free Bet cover opposite selections of one and the same event, any winnings shall be cancelled and forfeited.</li>\n            <li>Combo and System Bets, regardless of the number of individual bets placed, may contribute to the eligibility requirement for only for one Free Bet. For example, if a customer places three singles, as one bet, they shall contribute to the eligibility requirement for only one Free Bet. Further, if a Customer places a system of three doubles and one treble, the bets shall contribute to the eligibility requirement for only one Free Bet.</li>\n            <li>Any bets which contributed to eligibility requirement for a Free Bet shall not contribute to the eligibility requirement of any other offer.</li>\n            <li>Unless otherwise specified, any bets placed shall contribute to the eligibility requirements of a Free Bet first, before contributing the eligibility requirement of any other offer.</li>\n        </div>\n\n        <h4 class=\"section-header\">Casino Bonus Terms</h4>\n        <div class=\"section-holder\">\n            <li value=\"43\">Unless otherwise specified, you must rollover the amount of Casino Bonus funds thirty five (35) times before the funds in your Casino Bonus Account are transferred to the Casino Cash Account and a Withdrawal of these funds may be made.</li>\n            <li>Betrally may, at its sole discretion, exclude Canadian Customers depositing with € as a currency, from being eligible for promotions</li>\n            <li>Unless otherwise specified, Customers must meet the rollover requirements within 15 days of the bonus being taken up.</li>\n            <li>Stakes from all game categories on the Betrally ‘Casino’ product will contribute towards the rollover requirements. Any winnings resulting from such transfer being inadvertently accepted as a qualifying deposit, shall be considered as a result of irregular gaming.</li>\n            <li>Before any Withdrawal is processed, your play will be reviewed for any irregular playing patterns. In the interests of fair gaming, equal, zero or low margin bets or hedge betting, shall all be considered irregular gaming for the purpose of meeting any roll-over requirements. Other examples of irregular game play include but are not limited to (1) placing single wagers (a) equal to or in excess of 5% more of the value of the bonus credited to their account; or (b) equal to or in excess of 5% more of the value of the deposit used for claiming the bonus or (c) equal to or in excess of €6.25 (US$6.25) (whichever is lower of a, b or c) until such time as the wagering requirements for that bonus have been met; and (2) placing large bets which result in a substantial gain followed by a drop in bet size equal to or more than seventy five percent of the previous average bet size until the bonus roll-over requirements have been met. Should Betrally deem, at its sole discretion, that irregular game play has occurred, it reserves the right to withhold any Withdrawals and/or confiscate any associated winnings.</li>\n            <li>Betrally considers all of the above General Promotional Rules, and Sports and Casino terms to be fair. Accordingly, we have put in place this Privacy Policy, which outlines our data protection practices, including how we collect, use, disclose and protect your Personal Information, as well as your rights with respect to your Personal Information.</p>\n    <p>We encourage you to read the Privacy Policy carefully and use it to make informed decisions. By visiting the Group’s websites, mobile apps or other online properties, or by creating an account through our Services, you hereby agree to the Privacy Policy.</p>\n\n    <br>\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor1\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">1.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">The Group</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>\n            The Group includes the following companies:\n            <strong>Zapzap Marketing Limited, Comfortlink N.V.</strong>\n        </p>\n        <p>The Group provides the Services through the following applications and platforms (collectively the “\n            <strong>Platforms</strong>”):</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>This internet website;</li>\n            <li>Downloadable applications and software (\"Software\"), such as native applications which are distributed through mobile application stores and PC and Mac desktop software which can be downloaded to your computer;</li>\n            <li>Non-downloadable online applications (e.g. flash applications, HTML5 applications, etc.); and</li>\n            <li>Facebook applications.</li>\n        </ul>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor2\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">2.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">What information we collect?</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We collect two types of information from our Users:</p>\n        <br>\n        <ul>\n            <li>\n                <b>Personal Information</b>\n                <br>The first type of information is information that identifies or may reasonably identify an individual reasonable effort (“\n                <strong>Personal Information</strong>”). Personal Information which is being gathered may consist of the following:\n                <br>\n                <br>\n                <ul>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Registration details</strong>: When you open an account and register to use the Services, you will be asked to provide us certain details about yourself, such as: first and last name, email address, gender, birth data, physical address, ID number, phone number, occupation, etc. In addition, we may collect certain information as required under various Know KYC and Anti-Money Laundering regulatory requirements, such as your source of funds.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Governmental-issued ID</strong>: In certain instances, you will be required to provide a copy of a governmental-issued ID, for identity verification process. Please note that this information is required for certain features of our Services.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Gaming information: in order for us to provide the Services, we automatically record different information related to your account and use of our Services, including with respect to your transactions, deposits, balances, bets, withdraws, bonuses and winnings.</strong>\n                    </li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Payment information</strong>: In order for you to enjoy all of the functions of the Services (e.g. place bets, perform purchases etc.), payment information will be collected from you, such as your currency, credit card number and bank account details.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Voluntary information</strong>: We also collect information which you provide us voluntarily. For example, when you respond to communications from us, communicate with us via email or share additional information about yourself through your use of the Services, such as on the chat feature and in games.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Device information</strong>: We collect specific types of connection details and information with regard to your device, software or hardware that may identify you, such as: device’s unique identifiers (e.g. UDID, IMEI, MAC address), browser fingerprinting, IP address and geo-location data.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Telephone calls</strong>: We record or monitor telephone calls for customer support, training and/or security purposes.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Social networks</strong>: When you register through your social network account (such as your Facebook account), to use the Services or connect your player account with such account, we will have access to basic information from your social network account, such as your name, birthdate, profile picture and friends' list, as well as information you made publicly available on such account. </li>\n                    <li>In addition, when using the Services, you may be able via your social network to \"Invite a Friend\" to use the Services. Should the person accept your invitation, we may obtain Personal Information from him/her such as: name, email address, phone number and date of birth. We will use the Personal Information for the purposes set out herein and disclose such information only to third parties as detailed in this Privacy Policy.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Information we collect from third parties</strong>: We collect Personal Information from third party service providers, such as information about your credit history from credit agencies and other financial information which is relevant to the provision of the Services, as well as information which is gathered in order to verify your identity and prevent fraudulent or illegal activity.</li>\n                </ul>\n            </li>\n            <li>Non-personal information\n                <br>\n                <br> The second type of information is un-identified and non-identifiable information pertaining to a User(s), which may be made available or gathered via the User’s use of the Services (“Non-Personal Information”).\n                <br>\n                <br> Non-Personal Information which is being collected consists of technical information and aggregated usage information, and may contain, among other things, the User’s operating system, type of browser, screen resolution, browser and keyboard language, the User’s ‘click-stream’ and activities on the Services, the period of time the User visited the Services and related time stamps, etc.\n                <br>\n                <br>\n                <strong>For avoidance of doubt, any Non-personal Information connected or linked to any Personal Information shall be deemed as Personal Information as long as such connection or linkage exists.</strong>\n                <br>\n                <br> Types of Non-personal Information we collect from or about you:\n                <br>\n                <br>\n                <ul>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Technical information</strong>: In order to enhance the functionality of the Services and to provide you with a better user experience, we collect technical information transmitted by your device, including certain software and hardware information (e.g. the type of browser and operating system your device uses, language preference, access time and the domain name of the website from which you linked to the Services; etc.).</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Gameplay information</strong>: We record game play information including, amongst other things, your deposits, bets, bonuses, game session duration and your high scores. We may also share and publish such information through any of our Platforms.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Device and connection information</strong>: If you download the Software to your device, we may collect information from the particular device you are using, for security and fraud detection and prevention purposes. For example, we may gather information with regard to other software which is running simultaneously with the Software for detecting if you are using software which is associated with fraudulent activity (e.g. robots, malware, etc.) or checking if the connection you are using is via a VPN or proxy.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Analytics information</strong>: We collect information about your use of the Services, such as applications' usage, log files, user activity (e.g. pages viewed, the amount of time spent on particular pages, online browsing, clicks, actions, etc.), time stamps, alerts, etc. This information is collected for amongst other things troubleshooting errors and bugs as well as for research and analytics purposes about your use of the Services.</li>\n                    <li>\n                        <strong>Anonymous information</strong>: We may anonymize or de-identify the information collected by the Services or via other means so that the information cannot, on its own, personally identify you. Our use and disclosure of such aggregated or de-identified information is not subject to any restrictions under this Privacy Policy, and we may disclose it to others without limitation and for any purpose, such as for advertising or marketing purposes.</li>\n                </ul>\n            </li>\n        </ul>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor3\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">3.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Minors</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>The Services are not designed or directed to persons under the age of 18 or persons under the age of legal consent with respect to the use of the Services of any jurisdiction, whichever is higher (“Legally of Age”). If you are not Legally of Age, you should not download or use the Services nor provide any Personal Information to us.</p>\n        <p>We reserve the right to access and verify any Personal Information collected from you. In the event that we become aware that a user who is not Legally of Age has shared any information, we may discard such information. If you have any reason to believe that a minor has shared any information with us, please contact us at\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\">support@betrally.com</a>\n        </p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor4\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">4.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">How we use the collected information?</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We use your Personal Information for the purposes listed below: </p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>To set up, manage and update your account;</li>\n            <li>To provide and operate the Services (such as for betting and payment processing);</li>\n            <li>To communicate with you and to keep you informed of our latest updates to our Services and special offers;</li>\n            <li>To market our Services (see more below under “Marketing”), as well as to serve you advertisements, including behavioral advertising;</li>\n            <li>To conduct analytics, statistical and research purposes, in order to improve and customize the Services to your needs and interests (such as by compiling aggregated reports about the usage of certain features of our Services);</li>\n            <li>For Customer Relationship Management purposes, and to support and troubleshoot the Services and to respond to your queries;</li>\n            <li>To enable us to further develop, customize and improve the Services based on Users’ common preferences and uses;</li>\n            <li>To provide you with a responsible gaming environment;</li>\n            <li>To communicate with your and to process any of your requests to exercise your User Rights;</li>\n            <li>To identify and authenticate your access to certain features of the Services;</li>\n            <li>To detect and prevent fraudulent and illegal activity or any other type of activity that may jeopardize or negatively affect the integrity of the Services, including by identifying risks associated with your activity on our Services;</li>\n            <li>To investigate violations of our policies and User Agreement as well as enforce our policies and the User Agreement;</li>\n            <li>To investigate and resolve disputes in connection with your use of the Services; and</li>\n            <li>As required by law or regulation (such as Know Your Customer (\"KYC\") and Anti-Money Laundering regulatory requirements), or as required by other governmental authorities, or to comply with a subpoena or similar legal process or respond to a government request.</li>\n        </ul>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor5\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">5.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Marketing</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>The Group will use your Personal Information, such as your name, home address, email address, telephone number etc., ourselves or by using our third party subcontractors for the purpose of providing you with promotional materials, concerning the Services as well as products, services, websites and applications which relate to: (i) other companies within the Group; (ii) or (ii) the Group's business partners and affiliates (collectively: “\n            <strong>Marketing Affiliates</strong>”), which we believe may interest you.</p>\n        <p>We may also share and disclose Personal Information with our Marketing Affiliates for the purpose of providing you different marketing offers, which we, or our Marketing Affiliates, believe are relevant for you. Our Marketing Affiliates may use this Personal Information for different marketing techniques, such as direct email, post, SMS and telephone marketing purposes.</p>\n        <p>You may at any time decline receiving further marketing offers from us or from Marketing Affiliates by contacting us at\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\">support@betrally.com</a> or by unsubscribing from receiving marketing materials by following the guidelines available on the marketing communications (such as clicking on an “unsubscribe” button). Please note that even if you unsubscribe from our marketing mailing list, we may continue to send you service-related updates and notifications.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor6\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">6.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Cookies Policy</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We use cookies in order to provide you with a high-quality and personalised experience.</p>\n        <p>A cookie is a small text file that is stored on your computer, laptop or mobile device when you visit a website or use applications. Cookies may be used for many different purposes such as remembering your preferences, following your use of the Website and improving your user experience.</p>\n        <p>We use three different types of cookies:</p>\n        <p>Essential Cookies- These cookies are necessary for the Website to function properly or to provide a service which you request. These cookies are usually only set in response to your actions, such as in the case of auto form filling or logging in. Your browser can be set to block these cookies but the Website will not perform properly if you decide to do so.</p>\n        <p>Functionality Cookies - These cookies help to provide you with a more personalised user experience and are used by us and select third parties whose services feature on our pages. Blocking these cookies will disable these services and may affect your Website experience.</p>\n        <p>Performance Cookies - These cookies collect information about how you use a website or application and assist us in improving the performance of our Website. Blocking these cookies means that we cannot work effectively to improve the usability of our Website.</p>\n        <p>Cookies may be stored either for the duration of your visit to the Website or for repeat visits:\n            <br> Session Cookies - These cookies allows us to link your actions during a browser session. A browser session starts when you open the browser window and finishes when you close it. Session cookies are created temporarily and are deleted once the browser window is closed.</p>\n        <p>Persistent Cookies - These cookies remains on your device for a set period of time specified in the cookie and activated each time you visit the Website that created that particular cookie.</p>\n        <p>You may modify your browser so that it will not accept cookies. Please see the \"Help\" section of your browser for instructions.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor7\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">7.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Targeted Advertising</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We use third-party advertising technology to serve advertisements when you visit the Platform and use the Services. You may opt-out of many third-party ad networks, including those operated by members of the Network Advertising Initiative (\"\n            <strong>NAI</strong>\") and the Digital Advertising Alliance (\"\n            <strong>DAA</strong>\"). </p>\n        <p>For more information regarding this practice by NAI members and DAA members, and your choices regarding having this information used by these companies, including how to opt-out of third-party ad networks operated by NAI and DAA members, please visit their respective websites:\n            <a href=\"http://www.networkadvertising.org/optout_nonppii.asp\" target=\"_blank\">www.networkadvertising.org/optout_nonppii.asp</a> and\n            <a href=\"http://www.aboutads.info/choices\" target=\"_blank\">www.aboutads.info/choices</a> . </p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor8\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">8.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">With whom we share information?</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We do not rent, sell, or share your Personal Information with third parties (“Recipients”) except as described in this Privacy Policy. The Personal Information will be disclosed to Recipients only to the extent required for the specific purpose, as stipulated in this Privacy Policy.</p>\n        <p>We share Personal Information with any of the following recipients:</p>\n\n        <ul>\n            <li>Any replacement service provider that we engage with to operate the Platforms;</li>\n            <li>Companies within the Group and other affiliated companies;</li>\n            <li>Gaming providers;</li>\n            <li>Subcontractors and third party service providers, as well as their subcontractors, which by way of example include (but is not limited to) cloud computing companies, marketing affiliates, identity verification and fraud prevention services, and other data verifiers;</li>\n            <li>Credit reporting agencies;</li>\n            <li>Payment service providers, payment processors and banks;</li>\n            <li>Any third parties who provides services in relation to the operation or promotion of the applicable Group’s brands;</li>\n            <li>Any third parties who organize offline events or tournaments on behalf of or in conjunction with any companies within the Group;</li>\n            <li>Hotels and flight companies (such as in the context of offline events and promotions);</li>\n            <li>Auditors, contractors or legal/financial/other advisers of any of the Group’s business processes;</li>\n            <li>Any third parties who investigate, detect or prevent fraudulent or illegal activity (e.g. governmental authorities, police, banks and other investigatory organizations);</li>\n            <li>Licensing authorities, governmental and regulatory bodies, in accordance with applicable laws and regulations; and</li>\n            <li>Potential purchasers, successors or investors in any of the companies within the Group, or in the event of a corporate transaction (e.g. sale of a substantial part of our business, merger, reorganization, bankruptcy, consolidation or asset sale of an asset or transfer in the operation thereof) in relation to any company within the Group (in such event, the acquiring company or transferee will assume the rights and obligations as described in this Privacy Policy).</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>In addition to the purposes listed in this Privacy Policy, we share Personal Information with those Recipients for any of the following purposes:</p>\n        <br>\n        <ul>\n            <li>Storing such information on our behalf, for example by using cloud computing service providers;</li>\n            <li>Processing such information to assist us with our business operations (e.g. to process payments and your deposits; authenticate your access; auditing our operations; detect and prevent fraudulent or illegal activity; etc.);</li>\n            <li>Performing research, technical diagnostics or analytics; </li>\n            <li>Communicating targeted advertising, as well as promotional and informational materials, in accordance with our marketing policy (see above, in the section titled \"Marketing\"); and</li>\n            <li>Whenever we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights or legal claims, enforce our policies (including our User Agreement and Privacy Policy), protect your safety or the safety of others, as well as to investigate or prevent any fraud, for security reasons or to help us with any other related technical issue.</li>\n        </ul>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor9\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">9.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Transfer Of Information</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>Since we operate globally, it may be necessary to transfer your Personal Information to countries outside the European Union. The data protection and other laws of these countries may not be as comprehensive as those in the European Union. </p>\n        <p>We use best efforts to ensure that your Personal Information is protected in accordance with our privacy policy, through contractual means (such as by using the contractual clauses approved by the relevant regulators for data transfer) or other means (such as ensuring that the jurisdiction imposes adequate safeguards for data protection).</p>\n        <p>If you feel that your privacy was treated not in accordance with our policy, or if any person attempted to abuse the Services or acted in an inappropriate manner, please contact us directly at\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\">support@betrally.com</a>\n        </p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor10\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">10.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Third Party Tracking Technologies</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>When you visit or access our Services (for example when you visit our websites), we use (and authorize third parties to use) web beacons, cookies, pixels, scripts, tags and other technologies (\"\n            <strong>Tracking Technologies</strong>\").</p>\n        <p>The Tracking Technologies allow us to automatically collect information about you and your online behavior, as well as your device (for example your computer or mobile device), for different purposes, such as in order to enhance your navigation on our Services, improve our Services’ performance and customize your experience on our Services. We also use this information to collect statistics about the usage of our Services, perform analytics, deliver content which is tailored to your interests and administer services to our Users, advertisers, publishers, customers and partners.</p>\n        <p>We also allow third parties to collect information about you through Tracking Technologies. To learn more please visit our\n            <u>Cookie Policy</u>.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor11\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">11.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Third Party Services</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>While using the Services you may encounter links to third party websites, services or applications. Please keep in mind that this Privacy Policy does not apply to any third party websites, services or applications, even if they are accessible, downloadable, or otherwise distributed through the Services. </p>\n        <p>Please be advised that such third party websites, services or applications are independent from the Group. We assume no responsibility or liability whatsoever with regard to privacy matters or any other legal matter with respect to such third party websites and/or services. We encourage you to carefully read the privacy policies and the terms of use of such third party websites and/or services, as their terms, not ours, will apply to any of your interactions with such third parties.</p>\n        <p>You should always review their privacy practices carefully before providing Personal Information to such third parties.</p>\n        <p>You are knowingly and voluntarily assuming all risks of using any third-party websites, services or applications. You agree that we shall have no liability whatsoever with respect to such third party sites and your usage of them.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor12\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">12.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Retention Of Personal Information</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>If you have registered with an account through our Services, the Group will retain your Personal Information during the period your account is active. In addition, the Group will retain your Personal Data for additional periods, to enable the Group to meet its legal obligations under applicable laws or regulations, such as the applicable gambling regulations, Know-Your-Customer and Anti-Money Laundering regulations.</p>\n        <p>In addition, the Group may retain your Personal Information for longer periods, provided that retaining such information is necessary for the Group’s legitimate interests, such as fraud prevention and record keeping.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor13\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">13.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Your Rights</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>You may contact us at any time by email (at:\n            <a href=\"mailto:support@betrally.com\">support@betrally.com</a>), and request:</p>\n        <ol>\n            <li>To access or delete any Personal Information relating to you; </li>\n            <li>To change or update any Personal Information relating to you (for example, if you believe that your Personal Information is incorrect, you may ask to have it corrected or deleted). Note that you may also request that we will correct errors with regard to your Personal Information (except in cases where the information is required to be kept in its original format under any applicable laws and regulations);</li>\n            <li>That we will restrict or cease any further use of your Personal Information;</li>\n            <li>That we will provide the Personal Information you volunteered to us in a machine-readable format.</li>\n        </ol>\n        <br>\n        <p>Please note that these rights are not absolute and requests are subject to any applicable legal requirements, including gambling regulations and other legal and ethical reporting or document retention obligations. We may also rectify, replenish or remove incomplete or inaccurate information, at any time and at our own discretion, in accordance with our internal policies.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor14\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">14.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">How We Keep Your Information Secured</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>We take great care in implementing and maintaining the security of the Services and your information. We have put in place appropriate physical and technological safeguards to help prevent unauthorized access, to maintain data security, and to use correctly the information we collect online. These safeguards vary based on the sensitivity of the information that we collect and store.</p>\n        <p>We employ industry standard procedures and controls to ensure the safety of our users’ information, such as:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>Secure network topology, which includes intrusion prevention and Firewall systems;</li>\n            <li>Encrypted communication;</li>\n            <li>Authentication and Access Control;</li>\n            <li>External and Internal audit tests; etc.</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>\n            <br>Although we take reasonable steps to safeguard information, we cannot be responsible for the acts of those who gain unauthorized access or abuse the Services, and we make no warranty, express, implied or otherwise, that we will prevent such access.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\" id=\"anchor15\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\">15.</span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Changes To The Privacy Policy</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>\n            We reserve the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time, so please re-visit this page frequently. Such substantial changes will take effect seven (7) days after such notice was provided on any of the above mentioned methods. As such, we are certified and accredited by the major parties in terms of encryption, firewall protection, account protection and verification protocols.</p>\n    <p>All financial transactions are secured using state-of-the-art 128-bit SSL digital encryption technology, indicated by the page's padlock icon.</p>\n    <p>To prevent fraudulent credit card use, all card transactions are verified via secure line or secure FTP (file transfer protocol). We do not share sensitive information nor do we request any during the verification process. Any discrepancies found during the verification process will result in automatic suspension of the associated account until the matter is resolved.</p>\n    <p>The Betrally.com website is secured via firewall for added protection and our 'auto time-out' feature automatically logs you out after periods of inactivity, with both measures aimed at protecting your account against unauthorized access.</p>\n</div>","Id":23525,"IsContentAsynchronous":0,"Title":"","Type":"HTMLBlock"},"CSSClass":null,"CustomURL":null,"HashClientIncludeIn":null,"ID":22820,"LinkTitle":"Security","LinkType":34,"SubItems":[]},{"Block":{"AllowDevices":{"IsDesktop":1,"IsMobile":1,"IsTablet":1},"BlockUniqueID":"Center_HTMLBlock_23476","Code":"resp-help-responsible-gaming","Content":"<!-- EN Responsible Gaming -->\n<div id=\"responsible-gaming\" class=\"help-right-section terms-block isHidden help-accordion\">\n\n    <h2>Responsible Gaming</h2>\n\n    <p>At Betrally.com, we're committed to providing our customers with the very best in sports betting entertainment. Sports betting and gaming can be a fun and enjoyable experience and we work hard to make sure it stays that way. As such, we take the matter of responsible gaming very seriously and recommend our customers do the same to ensure a positive experience every time and prevent any possible issues arising before they have the chance to become a problem.</p>\n    <p>If you think you may have gambling issues, consider the following questions:</p>\n    <ul>\n        <li>Have you ever missed work, school, college or other responsibilities in order to gamble?</li>\n        <li>Do you gamble as a way out from boredom or unhappiness?</li>\n        <li>If you lost money gambling, how would you feel? Would it make you want to gamble more?</li>\n        <li>Have you ever gambled money set aside for bills, rent, food, etc.?</li>\n        <li>Do you feel any guilt over the amount of time you spend gambling?</li>\n        <li>Has anyone ever mentioned the time you spend gambling?</li>\n        <li>Would you consider stealing, lying or selling to obtain gambling money?</li>\n        <li>Do you feel out of control regarding much you spend on gambling? Would you be upset if you had to spend it on other things or activities?</li>\n        <li>Do you choose to gamble instead of spending time with friends or family?</li>\n        <li>If you lose, do you feel an immediate need to win back your losses?</li>\n        <li>Does stress make you want to gamble more?</li>\n        <li>Is gambling making you unhappy?</li>\n    </ul>\n    <br>\n    <p>If you answered yes to one or more of these questions, you may have gambling issues - we recommend that you visit www.responsiblegambling.org or www.gamblersanonymous.org</p>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Deposit Limits</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>This facility allows you to manage the amount of money that you can deposit into your account. Deposit limits may be set for the following periods:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>Daily – calculated on a 24-hour basis</li>\n            <li>Weekly – calculated on a 7-day basis</li>\n            <li>Monthly – calculated on a 30-day basis</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>At your request, deposit limits may be decreased, increased or removed entirely. Any update of deposit limits will come into effect immediately. You can set or adjust the limit settings by contacting Customer Service.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Self-exclusion</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>If you feel that your gambling has become problematic, you have the ability to self-exclude yourself by contacting\n            <a href=\"mailto: support@betrally.com\" class=\"color\">Customer Service</a> and requesting a self-exclusion period be applied to your account.</p>\n        <p>The following Self-Exclusion periods are available:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>1 week</li>\n            <li>2 weeks</li>\n            <li>1 month</li>\n            <li>3 months</li>\n            <li>6 months</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>We will endeavor to apply your self-exclusion as soon as practically possible, however, please note that this process takes a reasonable working period to implement. We will not consider the self-exclusion period as having commenced until it has been fully implemented and communicated to you. If after this you find that you can still access any of our services, it is your responsibility to contact us immediately to inform us.</p>\n        <p>Any unsettled bets with Betrally at the time that you enter into self-exclusion will be settled on the result of the event. If your bet is a winner, your winnings will be automatically withdrawn to your applicable credit/debit card or other financial account from which the funds were deposited.</p>\n        <p>Please note that upon your selected self-exclusion period expiring, your account will be automatically re-activated.</p>\n        <p>It is possible to revoke Self-exclusion upon written request (and thereafter only after 24 hours has elapsed from the submitted written request), and Betrally will always do all it can to detect and close any new duplicate accounts that you may open. Once the self-exclusion is applied, you will also no longer receive any further marketing materials from us.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Protection of Minors</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>In line with our 'over 18s only' policy, here are some steps you can take to protect minorsand prevent them from accessing any Betrally.com site or associated information:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>Do not leave your account logged in and unattended</li>\n            <li>Do not share your username, password, card details or sensitive data with anyone</li>\n            <li>Do not use the “Remember Me” feature if you access Betrally from a shared computer, especially if you share your computer with children.</li>\n            <li>Untick the 'save password' option</li>\n            <li>Use separate computer profiles for yourself and minors</li>\n            <li>Use child protection software such as Net Nanny or CYBERsitter to filter internet content</li>\n        </ul>\n        <br>\n        <p>If you become aware of any underage user registered at Betrally.com, please bring it to our attention immediately by emailing us at support@betrally.com.</p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Rules</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>Betrally.com operates according to a variety of rules to ensure a safe and fair online sports betting experience for everyone. </p>\n        <p>Please ensure you read and understand these rules:</p>\n        <ul>\n            <li>Terms and Conditions</li>\n            <li>Betting Rules</li>\n            <li>You must be at least 18 years of age to register an account with Betrally.com. It is a criminal offense for those under age to bet on this site.</li>\n            <li>Customers will be asked to verify that they are 18 or over by providing requested documentation.</li>\n            <li>Account holders are responsible for the confidentiality of their account details. Once a bet has been placed, it cannot be changed.</li>\n            <li>Residents of American Samoa, Belgium, Bulgaria, Curacao, Cyprus, Hungary, France, France (Metropolitan), French Guiana, Guam, Guernsey, Gibraltar, Ireland, Isle of Man, Israel, Jersey, Martinique, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, New Caledonia, Northern Mariana Islands, French Polynesia, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Reunion, French S. and An. Lands, United States Minor Outlying Islands, Mayotte, Palau, Romania, Turkey, Saint Barthélemy, Saint Martin, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, Scotland, Spain, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, Virgin Islands and Wallis and Futuna are not permitted to open an account, bet or make any kind of transaction at this site.</li>\n        </ul>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Privacy Policy</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>Betrally.com uses your personal details for the processing of bets, management of your account, providing services and carrying out research. We are the sole owners of the information you provide us and we do not share your details with any other third party. Please contact us if you wish to view or change your personal details. </p>\n    </div>\n\n    <h4 class=\"section-header\">\n        <span class=\"term-number\"></span>\n        <span class=\"header-title\">Use of Cookies</span>\n    </h4>\n    <div class=\"section-holder\">\n        <p>The Betrally.com site uses cookies in line with our privacy policy to enhance your sports betting experience. EN -->\n<div id=\"contact-us\" class=\"help-right-section terms-block isHidden help-accordion\">\n\n    <h2>Contact Us</h2>\n\n    <p>Here at Betrally, we want you to be as passionate about our fantastic range of sports betting opportunities and online casino games as we are.                  Application.registerBlock("help-section", myAccountResponsiveBlock, "Center_MyAccountResponsiveBlock_22802");
 
                 function initializeItemBlock(myAccountResponsiveBlock, item) 
                 {
                     var child = Application.AllBlocks[item.Block.BlockUniqueID];
                     myAccountResponsiveBlock.addChild(child);
                 }
 
                 myAccountResponsiveBlock.Configuration.Sections.forEach(function (section) 
                 {
                     var sectionElements = section.SectionElements;
                     sectionElements.forEach(function (item) 
                     {
                         if (item.Block) 
                         {
                             initializeItemBlock(myAccountResponsiveBlock, item);
                         }
 
                         if (item.SubItems) 
                         {
                             item.SubItems.forEach(function (subItem) 
                             {
                                 if (subItem.Block) 
                                 {
                                     initializeItemBlock(myAccountResponsiveBlock, subItem);
                                 }
                             });
                         }
                     });
                 });
             });
            </script>
            <div class="" id="master-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23475">
             <div id="html-container-Center_HTMLBlock_23475">
              <script>
               //Manage Terms Menu
     (function() {
         var helpMobileNav = document.getElementsByClassName('help-mob-nav')[0],
             helpMobileNavItems = document.getElementsByClassName('terms-nav-item'),
             sectionsList = document.getElementsByClassName('help-right-section'),
             bettingRulesNav = document.getElementById('betting-rules-nav'),
             bettingRulesSection = document.getElementById('betting-rules'),
             betTypesNav = document.getElementById('bet-types-nav'),
             betTypesSection = document.getElementById('bet-types'),
             helpSectionMain = document.getElementById('help-section'),
             panelCenter = document.getElementById('panel-center-inner'),
             bodyElement = document.body,
             isMobileDevice = (window.location.href.indexOf('help') != -1) && (UI.detects.getDeviceType() != 'IsDesktop'),
             isAnchorElementClicked = false,
             anchorElementTarget;
 
         // Sticky sub-menu for Betting Rules and Bet Types
         if (isMobileDevice) {
             window.onscroll = function() {
                 if (!bettingRulesNav.classList.contains('isHidden')) {
                     subMenuControl(bettingRulesNav, bettingRulesSection);
                 } else if (!betTypesNav.classList.contains('isHidden')) {
                     subMenuControl(betTypesNav, betTypesSection);
                 }
             }
         }
 
         // Sticky Menu Function
         function subMenuControl(element, elementSection) {
             if (window.scrollY > element.offsetHeight + 51) { // +51 because of the breadcrumbs
                 element.classList.add('help-mob-submenu-sticky');
                 elementSection.classList.add('help-section-sticky');
             } else {
                 element.classList.remove('help-mob-submenu-sticky');
                 elementSection.classList.remove('help-section-sticky');
             }
         }
 
         // Functionality for anchor tags to open tabs from the navigation on click
 
         function navigateInnerLinks(ev) {
             var target = ev.target,
                 targetSectionTab,
                 targetSectionHolder,
                 hasParentHolder,
                 isDeepLink;
 
             isDeepLink = target.classList.contains('help-deep-link');
 
             // Deep Links are used for simple anchor links leading to sections in help sections
             // Inner Links are used for navigation between different main tabs from the navigation only for mobile - for web it is hardcoded in the html anchor tag
 
             if (target.classList.contains('help-inner-link')) {
                 var targetName = target.getAttribute('rel');
 
                 if (isDeepLink) {
                     // Select target section
                     targetSectionTab = document.getElementsByClassName(targetName)[0];
 
                     if (!targetSectionTab.parentNode.classList.contains('rules-tab')) {
                         hasParentHolder = true;
                     } else {
                         hasParentHolder = false;
                     }
 
                     // Traverse to find parent or sibling (ex. betting rules or bet types which are separate blocks)
                     if (hasParentHolder) {
                         targetSectionHolder = targetSectionTab.parentNode;
                         while (!targetSectionHolder.classList.contains('help-right-section')) {
                             targetSectionHolder = targetSecionHolder.parentNode;
                         }
                     } else {
                         targetSectionHolder = targetSectionTab.previousElementSibling;
                         while (!targetSectionHolder.classList.contains('help-right-section')) {
                             targetSectionHolder = targetSecionHolder.previousElementSibling;
                         }
                     }
 
                     anchorElementTarget = targetSectionHolder.id;
                 } else {
                     // Not Deep Link
                     anchorElementTarget = targetName;
                 }
 
                 isAnchorElementClicked = true;
 
                 if (isMobileDevice) {
                     helpMobileNav.click();
                 } else {
 
                 }
 
                 if (isDeepLink) {
                     targetSectionTab.click();
                 }
 
             } else {
                 isAnchorElementClicked = false;
                 return;
             }
 
 
 
             // 1. Get clicked anchor rel
             // 2. Find target section ID by given rel -- set id to the corresponding section
             // 3. Select parent where class is .help-right-section
             // 3.1 If target section ID parent has class .rules-tab --> while (previousElementSibling) --> until finding help-right-section
             // 4. Get ID of selected .help-right-section element
             // 5. Set anchorElementTarget to the ID of the selected parent
             // 6. Simulate click on helpNav
             // 7. Simulate click on the target section
             // 8. CHECK FOR click on submenu
 
         }
 
 
         // Show desktop terms
         if (!isMobileDevice) {
             for (var p = 0, len = sectionsList.length; p < len; p += 1) {
                 sectionsList[p].classList.remove('isHidden');
             }
 
             helpSectionMain.addEventListener('click', navigateInnerLinks, false);
         } else if (isMobileDevice) {
             // Mobile Main Nav Control
             helpMobileNav.addEventListener('click', function(ev) {
                 var target = ev.target,
                     targetPosition;
 
                 // Fix if user clicks between spans or does not click on anchor element
                 // If navigation item is not clicked but the event is triggered by anchor clicked it passes
                 if (!target.classList.contains('terms-nav-item') && !isAnchorElementClicked) {
                     return;
                 }
 
                 var targetSectionId;
                 if (isAnchorElementClicked) {
                     targetSectionId = anchorElementTarget;
                 } else {
                     targetSectionId = target.getAttribute('data-tab');
                 }
 
                 // Section Class Toggle
                 var targetSection = document.getElementById(targetSectionId);
                 for (var i = 0, lenSect = sectionsList.length; i < lenSect; i += 1) {
                     sectionsList[i].classList.add('isHidden');
                 }
                 targetSection.classList.remove('isHidden');
 
                 // Navigation Class Toggle
                 for (var j = 0, lenNav = helpMobileNavItems.length; j < lenNav; j += 1) {
                     helpMobileNavItems[j].classList.remove('terms-nav-item-active');
 
                     // Loop over the nav items to determine which one has the data-tab value that corresponds to the anchor tag target tab ID
                     if (isAnchorElementClicked && helpMobileNavItems[j].getAttribute('data-tab') == anchorElementTarget) {
                         target = helpMobileNavItems[j];
                         positionOfTarget = target.getBoundingClientRect();
                         if (positionOfTarget.left < 0) {
                             helpMobileNav.scrollLeft += positionOfTarget.left;
                         } else {
                             helpMobileNav.scrollLeft = positionOfTarget.left;
                         }
 
                         // Reset scroll to top when navigating through inner lins
                         window.scrollTo(0, 0);
 
                         // Reset the variable
                         isAnchorElementClicked = false;
                     }
                 }
 
                 target.classList.add('terms-nav-item-active');
 
                 // SubMenu Show/Hide - Betting Rules
                 if (targetSectionId == 'betting-rules') {
                     bettingRulesNav.classList.remove('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.add('betting-rules');
                 } else if (targetSectionId != 'betting-rules' && !bettingRulesNav.classList.contains('isHidden')) {
                     bettingRulesNav.classList.add('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.remove('betting-rules');
                 }
 
                 // SubMenu Show/Hide - Bet Types
                 if (targetSectionId == 'bet-types') {
                     betTypesNav.classList.remove('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.add('bet-types');
                 } else if (targetSectionId != 'bet-types' && !betTypesNav.classList.contains('isHidden')) {
                     betTypesNav.classList.add('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.remove('bet-types');
                 }
 
                 // SubMenu Show/Hide - FAQ
                 if (targetSectionId == 'faq-section') {
                     // betTypesNav.classList.remove('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.add('faq-section');
                 } else if (targetSectionId != 'faq-section') {
                     // betTypesNav.classList.add('isHidden');
                     bodyElement.classList.remove('faq-section');
                 }
 
                 // Remove active class from submenu items
                 var submenuItems = document.querySelectorAll('.help-mob-submenu span');
 
                 for (var i = 0, len = submenuItems.length; i < len; i += 1) {
                     submenuItems[i].classList.remove('submenu-item-active');
                 }
             }, false);
 
             bettingRulesNav.addEventListener('click', controlSubMenuTabs, false);
             betTypesNav.addEventListener('click', controlSubMenuTabs, false);
             panelCenter.addEventListener('click', navigateInnerLinks, false);
 
             //Open specific tab based on URL query string. Ex. /?target='betting-rules'
             function openTabByUrlQuery() {
                 var qs = (function(a) {
                     if (a == "") return {};
                     var b = {};
                     for (var i = 0; i < a.length; ++i) {
                         var p = a[i].split('=', 2);
                         if (p.length == 1)
                             b[p[0]] = "";
                         else
                             b[p[0]] = decodeURIComponent(p[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
                     }
                     return b;
                 })(window.location.search.substr(1).split('&'));
                 if (qs.target && qs.target != '') {
                     for (var i = 0, len = helpMobileNavItems.length; i < len; i++) {
                         if (helpMobileNavItems[i].dataset.tab == qs.target) {
                             isAnchorElementClicked = true;
                             anchorElementTarget = qs.target;
                             helpMobileNavItems[i].click();
                         }
                     }
                 }
             }
 
             setTimeout(function() {
                 openTabByUrlQuery();
             }, 1000);
 
             function controlSubMenuTabs(ev) {
                 var target = ev.target,
                     subMenuItems = this.children,
                     rulesTabId = target.getAttribute('rel'),
                     rulesTab = document.getElementById(rulesTabId),
                     rulesTabs = document.getElementsByClassName('rules-tab'),
                     offset = 47;
 
                 if (target.nodeName != 'SPAN') {
                     return;
                 }
 
                 for (var i = 0, len = subMenuItems.length; i < len; i += 1) {
                     subMenuItems[i].classList.remove('submenu-item-active');
                 }
 
                 target.classList.add('submenu-item-active');
 
                 // Closes all opened rules tabs except the clicked one
                 for (var i = 0, lenRules = rulesTabs.length; i < lenRules; i += 1) {
                     rulesTabs[i].children[0].classList.remove('active-header'); // Remove active-class to switch arrow
                     rulesTabs[i].children[1].style.display = 'none';
                 }
 
                 rulesTab.childNodes[1].click();
                 window.scrollTo(0, rulesTab.offsetTop + offset + 51); // +51 because of the breadcrumbs
             }
         }
 
         // Accordion functionality
         var accordionWrappers = document.getElementsByClassName('help-accordion');
 
         for (var k = 0, lenWrappers = accordionWrappers.length; k < lenWrappers; k += 1) {
             accordionWrappers[k].addEventListener('click', function(ev) {
                 var target = ev.target,
                     panel;
 
                 // Checks if the target is element inside the heading tag and changes target
                 if (ev.target.parentNode.classList.contains('section-header')) {
                     target = ev.target.parentNode;
                 }
 
                 if (target.classList.contains('section-header')) {
                     target.classList.toggle('active-header');
                     panel = target.nextElementSibling;
 
                     if (panel.style.display == 'block') {
                         panel.style.display = 'none';
                     } else {
                         panel.style.display = 'block';
                         panel.style.padding = '1em';
                     }
 
                     //Refresh scroll hеight
                     if (Application.getCurrent().ID === 'RegistrationInformationPopUp') {
                         Application.getCurrent().customScroller.update()
                     } else if (UI.detects.getDeviceType() == 'IsDesktop') {
                         Application.getCurrent().getBlock("MyAccountResponsiveBlock").updatContentScroll();
                     }
                 }
             }, false);
         }
     })();
 
     function openPaymentMethods(url) {
         var device = Application.deviceType.get();
 
         if (device == 'IsDesktop') {
             window.open(url, '_blank', 'width=690, height=790, left=50%, top=50%, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, status=no, toolbar=no');
         } else if (device == 'IsMobile' || device == 'IsTablet') {
             window.location = url;
         }
     }
 
     function ageVerAnchor() {
         var ageAnchor = document.getElementById('anchor4'),
             scrollContainer = document.querySelectorAll('.myacc-block-content.scrollable-wrapper')[0];
         ageAnchor.click();
         scrollContainer.style.transform = 'translate(0px, -1500px)';
         //Application.getCurrent().getBlock("MyAccountResponsiveBlock").updatContentScroll();
     }
              </script>
             </div>
            </div>

     .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android {
         width: 21px;
         background-image: url(https://dzg55pa4lbwd6.cloudfront.net/resp/icons/android.svg);
     }
 
     html.IsTablet .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android,
     html.IsMobile .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android {
         width: 28px;
     }
 
     .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android:after {
         background-position: 0 -23px;
     }
 
     html.IsTablet .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android:after,
     html.IsMobile .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android:after {
         background-position: 0 -31px;
     }
 
     /* CACHING RESOURCES - ICON HOVER FIX */
 
     .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-apple:before,
     .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-android:before,
     .social-icon-fb:before,
     .social-icon-twitter:before,
     .social-icon-instagram:before,
     .social-icon-telegram:before {
         content: '';
         visibility: hidden;
         width: 0;
         height: 0;
     }
 
     .footer-menu-section .mobile-icon.mobile-icon-apple:before {

     }

         <script>
          (function () {
         var licenseSeal = document.getElementById('apg-seal-container'),
             // licenseSealLink = document.getElementById('apg-seal-link'),
             location = window.location.href,
             licenseArabia = document.getElementsByClassName('apg-arabia')[0],
             licensePl = document.getElementsByClassName('apg-pl')[0],
             licenseRu = document.getElementsByClassName('apg-ru')[0],
             footerCopyrightText = document.getElementsByClassName('footer-copyright-text')[0];
 
         if (location.indexOf('api.betrally.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('betrallyru.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('betrallyru1.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('betrallyarabia.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('betrallymena.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('arabiagoal.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.rallyarabia.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.betrallypl.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.betrallydk.com') != -1) {
             licenseSeal.style.display = 'none';
             // licenseSealLink.href = '';
         }
 
         // Hide footer copyright text only for the following two domains
         if (location.indexOf('arabiagoal.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.rallyarabia.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.betrallydk.com') != -1) {
             footerCopyrightText.innerHTML = '';
         }
 
         if (location.indexOf('betrallyarabia.com') != -1) {
             licenseArabia.style.display = 'inline-block';
             // licenseSealLink.href = 'https://validator.antillephone.com/validate?domain=www.betrallyarabia.com&seal_id=3cab5a810a277479c5f2665d7a3387aef4595bb6124288329e5e3e33a4b1b6e9be3a6be57516b36fe6d5b2566ea67235&stamp=2ccf64c4ac21a2f283cac611ce28efdd';
         }
         
         if (location.indexOf('www.betrallypl.com') != -1) {
             licensePl.style.display = 'inline-block';
         }
         
         if (location.indexOf('ww.betrallyru.com') != -1) {
             licenseRu.style.display = 'inline-block';
         }
         
         // Link to Arabic promotions page for all arabic domains
         if (location.indexOf('www.betrallymena.com') != -1 || (location.indexOf('www.betrallyarabia.com') != -1 || location.indexOf('www.rallyarabia.com') != -1) || location.indexOf('www.arabiagoal.com') != -1) {
             var promoLink = document.getElementsByClassName('promo-page-link')[0];
             promoLink.setAttribute('href', '/promotions-arabic/');
         }  
     }());
         </script>

         <script>
          (function () {
         if (window.location.href.indexOf('/casino/') != -1) {
             document.body.classList.add('casinoPage');
         }
     }());
 
     function openHelpSection(page) {
         var device = Application.deviceType.get(),
             paramLink = CONSTANTS.AccountMenuLinkTypes[page];
 
         if (device == 'IsDesktop') {
             Application.navigateTo('help-section', false, [paramLink]);
         } else if (device == 'IsMobile' || device == 'IsTablet') {
             window.location = '/help'
         }
     }
 
     function goToTopFooterBtn() {
         var device = Application.deviceType.get();
         if (device == 'IsDesktop') {
             document.body.scrollTop = document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
         } else {
             Application.goToBodyTop.goToTop();
         }
     }
 
     function bonusTermsToggle() {
         var el = document.getElementsByClassName('BonusTermsList');
         for (var i = 0; i < el.length; i++) {
             el[i].classList.toggle('hideIt');
         }
     }
         </script>
         <script>
          //Payments Slider
     jsRequire('/JSComponents/custom/ui.scarousel.js');
 
     var device = Application.deviceType.isDesktop() ? 0 : Application.deviceType.isTablet() ? 1 : 2;
 
     var paymentOptions = {
         containerID: 'paymentSlider',
 
         items: [{
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon visa"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon visa-electron"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon master-card"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon maestro"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon skrill"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon neteller"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon bank-transfer"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon paysafe-card"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon eco"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon mastercard-secure-code"></div></div>'
         }, {
             content: '<div class="payment-item"><div class="p-icon verified-by-visa"></div></div>'
         }],
 
         forDevice: device,
         hasArrows: false,
         classes: ['footer-payments-carousel'],
         step: 850, // the sum of width and margin-right of one slide
         useMouseWheel: false,
         isDraggable: true,
         hasPages: true,
         hasDelay: true
     };
 
     PaymentSlider = Object.create(UISCarousel);
 
     setTimeout(function () {
         PaymentSlider.init(paymentOptions);
     }, 2000);
 
     /* Methods for Desktop version */
     var desktopPayments = document.getElementsByClassName('footer-payment-methods')[0],
         paymentMethods = '';
 
     for (var i = 0, len = paymentOptions.items.length; i < len; i += 1) {
         paymentMethods += paymentOptions.items[i].content;
     }
 
     desktopPayments.innerHTML = paymentMethods;
         </script>
        </div>
